[\[35a.7\]]'dzin pa zhes bya lcags kyu ma/_/rdo rje lcags kyu lcags sgrog ste/_/zhags pa zhags pa che zhes brjod/_/dbang phyug dri dang shin tu dga'/_/stobs kyi lha dang bden par smras/_/klu yi phyag dang rgyal mtshan gzugs/_/rgyal ba'i blo dang ye shes khyab/_/bdud rtsi bro dang nyi ma 'char/_/_
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]blo rab zhi dang gzugs mtha' yas/_/rgyal ba'i blo dang snang bar mdzad/_/rin chen tog dang don grub dang /_/yid 'dod pa dang nyon mongs bral/_/legs par zhi dang rtog pa 'chang /_/me tog dang ni dbang po rgyal/_/gzi brjid can dang don ston mdzad/_/don gnas can dang mi
[\[35b.2\]]shigs grags/_/tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa lngar rkang pa gcig ma tshang /_rgyal ba lnga la sum cu rtsa lnga lngas thabs shes rab kyi tshul gyis gnyis gnyis spros/_bsdus pas brgya drug cus bstod/_rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor bstan to/_/rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dkyil 'khor
[\[35b.3\]]bstan pa ni dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog mthing ga zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa phyag sa gnon no/_/gzhan gong dang mthun no/_/rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed pa ni log par lta ba'i mtshan no/_/ha la ha la ni mdog go/_/gdong brgya pa ni thod pa'i phreng ba'o/_/khro bo'i
[\[35b.4\]]rgyal po ni sku'i rnam pa'o/_/keng rus mche ba ni phyag mtshan no/_/gdul bya zhe sdang can no/_/sku'i khro bo ni/_gshin rje gshed do/_/rdo rje shugs can ni phyag mtshan no/_/rdo rje grags pa ni rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i rgyan no/_/sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus po che ni sku'i rnam pa'o/_/snying po mkha' 'dra
[\[35b.5\]]ba ni sku mdog go/_/gdul bya ni gti mug las gyur pa'i zhe sdang ngo /_/rdo rje 'jigs byed ces bya bas gtso bo la bstod/_keng rus mche ba zhes bya bas ni rnam par snang mdzad la bstod/_gshin rje gshed ces bya bas rin chen 'byung ldan skyel bstod/_sgyu 'phrul zhes bya bas
[\[35b.6\]]ni snang ba mtha' yas la'o/_/rdo rje snying po zhes bya bas ni don yod grub pa la'o/_/rdo rje 'jigs byed las 'jigs byed dang dur khrod bdag go/_/'joms mdzad rgyal dang khams gsum rgyal/_/sgyu 'phrul dra bas rdo rje rnam par 'phrul/_/phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur bas/_/rnam par
[\[35b.7\]]'joms dang me ltar 'bar/_/rdo rje rgyan las bi lo ki/_/rig pa mchog las gzhan gyis mi thub pa/_bde mchog las rta mchog go/_/rdo rje 'dus las khu tshur/_don yod zhags pa las 'dod pa'i rgyal po/_rdo rje thod pa las zla ba'i gtso/_gsang ba 'dus pa las gnod mdzes/_
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]rnam snang dra ba las hUM mdzad/_dam tshig chen po las rdo rje gnod sbyin/_zla gsang thig le las rdo rje lcags kyu/_gnyis med mnyam spyor las bdud kyi sde pa/_zla gsang thig le las pad+ma 'khyil pa'o/_/khri drug stong pa las phyag na rdo rje dang /_rdo rje khrag
[\[36a.2\]]'thung /_'byung po'i phyis zhags nas rdo rje lcags sgrog_/rdo rje sa 'og nas stobs po che/_rdo rje rgyan nas rdo rje zhags pa/_gsang ba'i mdzod nas mi g.yo ba/_sgyu 'phrul dra ba nas drag po chen po/_cod pan nas drag po chen po dang rdo rje 'khor lo'o/_/gsung gi khro bo ni mi g.yo ba'o/_/_
[\[36a.3\]]ral pa gcig ni sku'i rnam pa'o/_/glang chen ko rlon ni rgyan no/_/mkha' 'dra ba ni sku mdog go/_/gdul bya ni 'dod chags las gyur pa zhe sdang ngo /_/drag chen sems ma rdo rje ma/_/hi hi rin chen rdo rje ma/_/gad mo las kyi rdo rje ma/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i rdo rje ma'o/_/'jigs byed che dang nam
[\[36a.4\]]mkha'i mdog_/drag shul 'joms dang rdo rje'i bdag_/bdud sde 'joms dang zhags pa che/_/nag po che dang zhe sdang 'joms/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/_/dang po sems dpa' legs pa ste/_/gnyis pa rgyal po chags pa'o/_/rdo rje drag po rin chen dpal/_/dga' ba che ni
[\[36a.5\]]nyi ma'i dpal/_/rdo rje hUM dang mda' thogs la/_/sems dpa' gnyis ni rim bzhin no/_/rdo rje ral gri ma lus nas/_/rdo rje can zhes bya bas ni/_/sems dpa' gnyis ni rim bzhin du'o/_/rdo rje gcig pu sems kyi rgyud/_/g.yul sel bas ni gsal bar smra'o/_/rdo rje 'bar bas
[\[36a.6\]]bsrung ba ste/_/mig mi bzang ni khu tshur ro/_/skra yang rdo rje 'bebs pa ches/_/des ni sems dpa' gnyis la bstod/_/'od zer 'phro dang bdud sde 'joms/_/drag shul 'joms dang shugs chen no/_/shin tu khros dang khrag 'dzag dang /_/thod pa 'chang dang ut+pal mdog_/rdo rje
[\[36a.7\]]'dus dang phrin las mdzad/_/gtum khro 'bar dang grags chen po/_/khams gsum 'joms dang drag po'i stobs/_/thal ba'i mdog dang ma ha'i zhal lo/_/rdo rje sems dpa' nas dga' ba che zhes bya bas mtshan no/_/mtshon du nas g.yul sel bas ni phyag mtshan 'di dang 'di 'dzin
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]pa'o/_/rdo rje 'bar ba nas brgyan pa ste ni sku 'di lta bu la rgyan gyi rnam pa 'di zhes pa'o/_/yi ge drug pa nas sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ni/_de la gsung 'di dang 'di sgrogs zhes bya ba'o/_/rdo rje lcags kyu 'be+ebs pa zhags pa'o/_/mig brgya lcags sgrogs rdo rje dril bu'o/_/_
[\[36b.2\]]lus ni nas pags pa mkhregs zhes bya bas ni phyi'i lha mo bzhi la go rims bzhin du'o/_/rdo rje phreng thogs phreng ba ma/_/dpal dang ldan ni sgeg mo ma'o/_/rdo rje rgyan nas nges par zhes bya bas go rims bzhin du gnyis la bstod do/_/yi ge drug pa byams pa ste/_/rdo rje sgra ni spos
[\[36b.3\]]glang po/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs te sgra chen ni/_/ye shes tog ces bya ba'o/_/'jig rten zhes bya bzang skyong ste/_gsum ni blo gros rgya mtsho ste/_/sgra gcig blo gros mi zad pa'o/_/nam mkha'i zhes pa spobs brtsegs so/_/mtha' klas zhes pa mthu chen thob/_/sgra sgrogs zhes pa
[\[36b.4\]]ngan song 'dren/_/sgra dang ldan pa mya ngan 'joms/_/rnams kyis dra ba can la bstod/_/mchog ces zla 'od gzhon nu la/_/brgyan pas 'od dpag med la bstod/_/gad rgyangs nam mkha'i mdzod la'o/_/bdud rtsi phyag dang nam mkha'i mdog_/dra ba'i 'od 'phro mi shigs rnams/_/_
[\[36b.5\]]thugs rje zhags dang rin chen zhags/_/pad+ma khros dang rdo rje khros/_/las kyi khros dang rin chen khros/_/'bar ba'i 'od dang dbyug pa can/_/'jam dpal khros dang dpa' bo che/_/gshin rje gshed dang brtul zhugs che/_/thabs chen rdzogs dang stobs po che/_/rgyud sde lnga bcu rtsa
[\[36b.6\]]gsum las mtshan ni bdun cu rtsa lnga/_rgyal ba lnga la bcu bzhi bcu bzhi thabs dang shes rab tshul du spro'o/_/tshigs su bcad pa rkang pa gcig ma tshang ste bcu'o//_//da ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi dkyil 'khor ni dbus snang ba mtha' yas dang /_dang po'i sangs rgyas rtsa ba'i zhal
[\[36b.7\]]dmar po/_'khor lo dmar po gzhan gong dang mthun/_yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid/_/ces bya bas zab pa bstan to/_/de yang smra ba dang brjod pa thams cad dang bral te yi ge med ce'o/_/'o na brjod pa dang bral na rtogs par nus sam zhe na/_stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog gis
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]nus she'o/_/ji lta bas she na/_rgya che bas zab mo ston to/_/zab cing rgya che zhes pa'o/_/dper na byin rlabs zhu las sgra byung ba bzhin du rang las so/_/dung chen ni zab pa'i dpe'o/_/gaN+Di ni me long lta bu'i dpe'o/_/rnga ni so sor rtog pa dang bya ba grub pa dang mnyam
[\[37a.2\]]pa nyid kyi dpe'o/_/de ltar gong ma ni zab pa'i dpe'o/_/'og mas rgya che ba'i dpe'o/_/'o na rgya che ba'i don ji ltar ston zhe na/_gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste/_/sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes te gzugs med pa dang /_gzugs dang 'dod pa la sogs
[\[37a.3\]]pa'i sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyis so/_/'o na gcig du mar snang ba cang 'thad dam zhe na/_yid las skyes pa dang snang ba du mar snang ba'i phyir ro/_/thams cad du khyab pa'i gzugs khyad med ce na/_gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba'i mtshungs pa med cing ste/_'dra ba med
[\[37a.4\]]pa'i bcom ldan 'das ni che ba'i bdag nyid kyi sku du mas so/_/che ba'i bdag nyid kyi sku du mar gzhan gyis kyang nus so zhe na/_khams gsum dbang phyug dang chen po'i bdag nyid yin pas so/_/de'i rgyu mtshan ci zhe na/_'phags pa'i lam shin tu mtho la gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/de
[\[37a.5\]]bas na thams cad 'jam dpal yin zhing gzugs med kyi khams dang /_gzugs khams dang 'dod khams kyi bdag por gyur pa'o/_/de yang thams cad la ste/_zab mo mtshon te/_'jig rten gyi de nyid shes shing legs pa'i lam ston pas ni slob dpon no/_/slob dpon
[\[37a.6\]]des bstan pa'i yon tan ni 'jigs pa sel zhing mgon skyabs yid bde ba skyed pas na de la phyag dang bkur sti bya bar 'os pa'i phyir ro/_/rgya chen pos don byed de nam mkha'i mtha' zhes bya ba'o/_/de yang zad mi shes pas ldan pas mtsho zhes bya'o/_/yang dag bdag med nas khyu
[\[37a.7\]]mchog ces bya ba'i mthar pad+ma rdo rje ma/_zab cing nas dgra che'i mthar rin chen rdo rje ma'o/_/mi gnas nas dam pa'i mthar sems ma rdo rje ma'o/_/sna tshogs nas che bar grags kyi mthar las kyi rdo rje ma'o/_/khams gsum nas ye shes rgya mtsho'i mthar snang ba mtha' yas dbus
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]kyi gtso bo la bstod pa'o/_/yon tan 'od dang khyad par che/_/rnam shes grags dang kun du grags/_/zla ba gang dang pad+ma'i 'od/_/dka' thub rgyal dang mar me rgyal/_/glog gi tog dang rgyal ba'i 'od/_/gsang ba ldan dang dpe bral grags/_/pad+ma grags dang me tog mtshan/_/_
[\[37b.2\]]spyan mchog bzang dang grags med don/_/drag po sde dang bsod nams 'od/_/khyad par can dang thogs med blo/_/sgra gcan 'dzin dang ye shes 'od/_/grags ldan dang ni ye shes dbang /_/skar ma'i tog dang rA hu la/_/sman chen po dang sman rgyal po/_/bsod nams glang po rgyu yi
[\[37b.3\]]stobs/_/skar ma rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sku/_/nyi 'od 'joms dang chos kyi mdzod/_/legs pa'i blo gros dang rgyal po/_/rdo rje sde dang shes rab brtsegs/_/legs par bzhugs dang rgyal ba'i blo/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang klu yi dbang /_/yon tan gsal dang ye shes dag_/tog
[\[37b.4\]]gi 'od dang tshangs pa dge/_/'o na skyob pa ji ltar nus she na/_ye shes dbang bskur cod pan zhes pa nas/_nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das/_/zhes bya bas rang don spangs pa bstan to/_/sa bcu la dbang bskur bas sdug bsngal zhi nas 'bras bu thob pa dang /_shes bya dang nyon
[\[37b.5\]]mongs pa spangs pa'o/_/gzhan don ji ltar 'gro zhe na/_nam mkha'i mtha' klas nas/_nam mkha'i lam la rab tu gnas/_/zhes bya bas bstan te/_gong 'og tu 'brel pa des ni shes bya'i sgrib pa'i sbubs nas grol ba dang 'khor ba las sgrol ba dus thams cad la sgrib pa med pa
[\[37b.6\]]shes bya la thogs pa med pa'o/_/des sems can kun gyi gtso bo'o/_/de la ni rang dang gzhan gyi yon tan mthar phyin pa lus med pa'i chos sku'o/_/de la brten pa ni lus kyi mchog go/_/de mi 'gal lam zhe na/_yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang /_/zhes pa ste rtog pa dang bral kyang ston
[\[37b.7\]]pa dang 'dra'o/_/yang na yon tan gyi che ba'i khyad par chos sku dang gzugs sku gnyis go rims bzhin du bstan to/_/dbyings nam mkha' lta bu dang ye shes zad mi shes pa las skye ba med kyang skye ba'i tshul ston to/_/dang po ye shes chen pos ma rig pa sel ba dang /_srid pa'i dra ba 'joms
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]pa'i shes rab kyi mes bsregs nas gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir des srid pa'i rgyun bcom nas rang don grub ste/_'khor ba rgya mtsho'i 'dam nas pha rol tu phyin te/_gzhan don thugs rje dang ldan te/_mi nub pa'i dbang bskur nas rang gi sdug bsngal
[\[38a.2\]]zhi zhing /_sems can mang po'i sdug bsngal sel cing 'bras bu sku gsum la sbyor bar byed do/_/'o na nus pa cis she na/_sgrib pa kun las grol zhing nam mkha' 'dra ba'i lam la rab tu gnas pas na rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/'o na rtog pa med par gzhan don
[\[38a.3\]]nus sam zhe na/_thugs rje'i nus pa ste/_dpag bsam zhes bya ba la sogs pas so/_/de yang bsam pa dang bag la nyal shes te/_dus shes shing dbang po shes pa'o/_/yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan zhing sems can sdug bsngal can dbugs 'byin par byed
[\[38a.4\]]cing bde ba la 'god pa de la ni bkur sti dang mchod pas skyabs su 'os pa'i phyir ro/_/'o na skyabs su phyin pa'i yon tan ci zhe na/_'jig rten dgra ste rab kyi mchog_/'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po/_/zhes bya'o/_/brtul zhugs ni gtsug phud dang /_ral pa zhes bya ba'i phyi rol
[\[38a.5\]]pa'i spyod pa/_gdong lnga ni 'jig rten pa tshangs pa'i spyod pa/_mgo zlum ni nyan thos so/_/de rnams kyang mthar gyis theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la 'god de/_dka' thub mthar phyin cing /_dka' thub chen po ni tshangs par spyod pa mchog 'di yin pas 'di la dgod par byed do/_/_
[\[38a.6\]]de yang tshul khrims gtsang zhing dam par gyur pa nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu la rim gyis brod pa bskyed nas mthar legs par mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba ni 'di kho na ste/_gzhan gyis thub pa med pa 'di'i bsod nams dpes
[\[38a.7\]]brjod par mi nus pa/_'bras bu rang don gzhan don dang ldan pa 'di mu stegs pa dang nyan thos kyis mi rtogs pas thob byed kyi nus pa ma yin no/_/'o na 'bras bu ci zhe na/_mi 'gyur ba chos sku dang /_kun la khyab pa gzugs sku'o/_/'o na mi 'gyur ba ci zhe na/_shes rab shin
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]tu phra bas ma rig pa zag pa'i rten spangs te/_gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dri ma dang bral ba ni dri med do/_/de'i phyir nyes pa'i skyon med pa ni mi 'gyur ba'o/_/'o na kun la khyab pa ci'i phyir zhe na/_shin tu zad pa sangs rgyas dang /_sad pa'i bdag byang chub sems dpa' dang /_
[\[38b.2\]]yang na ji lta ba dang /_ji snyed pa mkhyen pas thams cad la yod par mkhyen nas thams cad la ston to/_/des khyab pa'o/_/ma rig nas grol gsum thob ces bya bas rdo rje sems dpa' la bstod/_sgrib pa kun nas rab tu gnas/_/zhes pa'i mthar rin chen 'byung ldan la
[\[38b.3\]]bstod/yid bzhin nas yon tan shes zhes pa'i mthar don yod grub pa la bstod pa'o/_/chos shes nas skyabs kyi 'os zhes pa'i mthar rnam par snang mdzad la bstod pa'o/_/'jig rten dgra ste zhes pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa'i mthar dang po'i sangs rgyas la
[\[38b.4\]]bstod pa'o/_/sgra mi snyan dang rol pa'i gar/_/glu yis sbyin dang bde ba'i tog_/mkhas pas sbyang dang gzhan thub min/_/ri 'od sbyin dang gsung dbyangs can/_/seng ge dang ni sna tshogs nyid/_/dpal gyi ye shes pad+ma chung /_/me tog dang ni rnam grol lus/_/bsod nams spungs
[\[38b.5\]]dang mtshan 'gyur blo/_/gsal ba dang ni mar me zla/_/mi zad pa dang blo bzang spyan/_/yan lag mchog dang shes rab yul/_/mchog tu gyur dang rab 'joms zer/_/shes rab sbyin dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs/_/thogs med mdzad dang mthu yis sbyin/_/dag pa dang ni ye shes gnas/_/_
[\[38b.6\]]bde gshegs 'od dang dbang po 'od/_/thub pa che dang lha chen dang /_/'od zer bzang dang gzugs mdzes dang /_/rgyal ba'i sku dang don yod ston/_/sing sang la dang dran stobs dang /_/grags pa'i mtshan dang bkra shis dang /_/snying po mchog dang bsod nams dge_/nyan pa chags dang
[\[38b.7\]]nyan 'dod pa/_/mi thub pa dang rgyal mar me/_/rin chen brtsegs dang tshogs med lha/_/sa yi bdag dang grol bar 'gro/_/gtsug phud gser dang sgra gcan bzang /_/mi thub sde dang rang bzhin thub/_/zla 'od can dang gser mdog bzang /_/dge ba'i 'od dang yon tan lha/_/chos kyi
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]gdugs dang yon tan lag_/'dra ba'i mtshan dang yi ge rdzogs/_/blo gros 'phro dang 'dod rnams 'bar/_/sman gyi skyabs dang rnam grol tog_/shes rab mchog dang ye shes rgyal/_/gzugs 'jigs pa dang glo bur 'joms/_/thogs med grags dang bde
[\[39a.2\]]bar ldan/_/ngag snyan rigs dang grags dbang po/_/chos kyi brtsegs dang 'gro ba'i 'od/_/legs pa'i rgyan dang rang bzhin lus/_/ye shes gsung dang rta mchog dang /_/nyon mongs sel dang 'gro ba'i mchog_/seng ge reg dang chos kyi mtshan/_/skal ba bzang dang mi bskyod 'dor/_/_
[\[39a.3\]]'bar ba'i rgyal dang rtog pa'i gsung /_/bzang po can dang rig don blo/_/'jigs pa bral dang dri yod 'od/_/don yod 'gro dang khro thal mdog_/gzungs mchog dang ni brtan pa'o/_/rtog par byed dang shes rab spyan/_/don rig blo dang grags pa'i bzhin/_/lha yi nyi dang shes rab
[\[39a.4\]]gsal/_/shin 'joms phyag dang shing rta 'gros/_/gser btso ma dang skal ldan gtsug_/dbang phyug dang ni dga' bas bstan/_/myos pas 'joms dang ye shes mdzod/_/tshangs par gshegs dang tsan+dan dang /_/mya ngan 'joms dang seng ge 'od/_/yul gyi tog skye dang pad+mo'i snying /_/mtha' yas 'od
[\[39a.5\]]dang snying po lha/_/me tog mdzes dang reg pa'i haM/_/ye shes dbang dang tshangs dbang po/_/rin chen phyag dang dbang po ldan/_/dpe med dri dang the tshom bral/_/mchod par 'os dang 'bar ba'o/_/pad+ma'i gdugs dang 'dum gyi mchog_/ye shes 'od dang bya rtsal bral/_/gsal ba'i mdog dang chos
[\[39a.6\]]ldan dang /_/phan ldan gzugs dang ye shes dang /_/grags pa dang ni 'od zer 'bar/_/snying po be+e rUr 'bar ba dang /_/skar ma'i tshogs dang lha nyid do/_/'o na byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas kyi thugs rjes ji ltar khyab ce na/_rnam par shes pa chos nyid 'das/_/ye shes gnyis med ces
[\[39a.7\]]bya bas chos sku las thabs shes rab kyi longs skus khyab ste/_rtog pa spangs pa mi 'gyur ba las/_dus gsum sangs rgyas de las lhun gyis grub cing gzhan gyi don byed pa'i phyir rang byung gi sku 'byung ba'i rgyu rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa'i ye shes kyi lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras gsung thams
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]cad la dbang thob cing chos ston pa ni zhal lnga dang ldan te/_tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che/_/smra ba'i skye mchog smra ba'i rgyal/_/smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas/_/smra ba'i seng ge mtshungs pa med/_/ces bya ba ste/_rdo rje dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_/rin chen dang /_pad+ma dang /_las kyi
[\[39b.2\]]rigs te zhal lnga'o/_/de sku shin tu mdzes shing 'od zer 'phro ba/_lag na 'od 'bar ba'i ral gri/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dpal be'u'i tshul du thugs kar 'dzin pa'i gtso bo de sman pa dang /_sman gyi shing ljon pa dang 'dra bas skyob pa de chags pa dang bral zhing gdul
[\[39b.3\]]bya chags shing phyir pad+ma'i sbubs bye na gnas pa la bde bar gshegs pa yab yum kyi 'od nyi ma dang zla ba lta bur phog ste/_kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_skyil krung dang bcas pa/_dar sna tshogs dang /_rgyan sna tshogs 'dzin pa pad+ma las 'thon te/_rdo rje rin chen nas/_sangs
[\[39b.4\]]rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin/_/zhes bya bas ni rdo rje dang /_rin po che dang /_pad+ma dang /_las dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ste/_rigs lnga yum dang bcas pas sku'i che ba gsung gi che ba thabs dang shes rab nyi ma dang zla ba'i tshul du dbang bskur/_thugs ka na rigs drug pa'i
[\[39b.5\]]ye shes sems dpa' bzhugs pa ni sangs rgyas nas thugs la gnas zhes bya ba dang /_rdo rje rnon po nas don bzhin rig ces bya bas bstan nas/_rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig_/pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa/_/zhes bya bas chos sku dang gzugs sku bstan te/_rnam par dag pa
[\[39b.6\]]nas/_ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang /_/lam ma lus pa thob ste/_'bras bu mtha' dag thob nas gzhan don ston pa ni kun mkhyen pa'i bcom ldan 'das de rgyal po'am gtso bo'o/_/rang bzhin gsang sngags te/_sangs rgyas dang rig sngags kyi phyag na rdo rje'i lte ba la
[\[39b.7\]]rnam par 'phrul pa 'di pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sa bcu rdzogs pa'i rtags na rnam par dag pa'i khri 'phang lnga pa dang /_bum pa 'khor lo bcu gsum dang /_chos kyi tog dang /_bdag gnyis dang bral ba'i bya ru cod pan dang /_zla ba dang rin po che yis yang dag pa'i ye shes
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]mtshon pa/_log par lta ba zil gyis gnon cing skyob pa/_kun kyis mchod par 'os pa'i sku gdung de'i bum par brtson 'grus chen pos rnam par 'phrul te/_gdan ni ma lus te gzhal yas khang gi 'phrul pa/_ye shes sku rnams te lha'i 'phrul pa'o/_/de
[\[40a.2\]]lta bu de rdo rje 'chang gi bum par ro/_/de nas gtso bos bstod pa de las 'od zer las bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed pa 'gro ba dang /_/'dug pa dang /_nyal ba la sogs pa bstan pa ni rnam par gzigs/_gtsug tor can/_thams cad skyob/_
[\[40a.3\]]log pa dad sel/_gser thub/_'khor ba 'jig rnams so/_/de'i phyir dpal ldan rgyu skar nas bstan pa gcig ces pa'i mthar ro/_/de nas lha mo 'dud kyis bstod nas dkyil 'khor mi snang bar gyur to/_/de las gtso bos rgyud 'khor la bstan pas na/_rgyud kun gyi ni bdag
[\[40a.4\]]po mchog_/ces bya bas ni kun du bzang po dang /_'jam dpal dang /_sa'i snying po dang /_spyan ras gzigs la sogs pas lus snying po'am len pa lha'i rang bzhin du mthong ngo /_/rtsa rnams mtshan du gyur par mthong ngo /_/de nyid thig ler gyur pa na 'dud kyis bstod pas zab par mthong
[\[40a.5\]]ba ni/_sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po nas ngo bo nyid 'chang ba zhes bya bas bstan/_de yang skad cig la khong du chud cing rtogs te/_de yang sgrib g.yogs med par rtogs so/_/tshig gi bdag po nas mtshungs pa med ces pa'i mthar gsal bar smra ba la'o/_/kun du lta nas dpal
[\[40a.6\]]gyi be+e'u zhes bya bas sems dpa' gsum la go rims bzhin/_lag na 'od 'bar nas gtso bo zhes bya bas rdo rje khu tshur la'o/_/zug rngu 'byin pa nas dgra che'i mthar sems dpa' gsum la go rims bzhin no/_/sdu gu nas rin chen gdugs zhes bya bas/_sems dpa' la sogs
[\[40a.7\]]gnyis gnyis bstan/_/sangs rgyas zhes byas nyi ma'i dpal/_/sku 'chang zhes byas rin chen dpal/_/rnal 'byor zhes byas tog gi dpal/_/bstan pa gcig ni bzhad pa'o/_/zla ba'i 'od dang dri yi 'od/_/dge ba'i 'od dang yon tan can/_/dam chos brjod dang tshig las rgyal/_/_
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]smra ba'i stobs dang smra ba'i tshig la dbang sgyur ba'o/_/legs pa'i yid dang rigs kyi 'od/_/spyod lam zhi dang ye shes mtsho/_/chos dbang phyug dang rigs sku lha/_/yon tan las dang 'khor lo stobs/_/legs par sbyangs dang legs par reg_/don grub dpal dang gzi
[\[40b.2\]]brjid dpal/_/thams cad snyoms dang bdud rtsi dbyangs/_/snang ba bde dang legs pa'i blo/_/rnam grol don dang dbang phyug 'phags/_/rol pa'i mchog dang lhag par mthong /_/nyes pa spangs dang nyi ma'i 'od/_/bkra rgyal blo dang pad+ma'i mchog_/nyi ma'i 'od dang so sor
[\[40b.3\]]gsung /_/legs pa'i mu dang tshogs dbang po/_/'jigs pa bral dang ye shes sred/_/rdo rje rin chen nas sdug bsngal gcod ces bya bas ye shes sems dpa' la bstod/_mtshon cha chen po nas mchod pa zhes bya ba ni lha mo bzhi'o/_/sa rnams nas dra ba ste zhes bya ba'i
[\[40b.4\]]mthar mchod pa'i lha mo la bstod/_rgyud kun nas blo gros bzang gi mthar mthu chen thob la sogs pa la bstod/_sa'i snying po nas dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin zhes pa'i mthar zla 'od gzhon nu la sogs pa bzhi la bstod do/_/dngos po kun gyi nas skad cig gcig la zhes pa'i
[\[40b.5\]]mthar blo gros rgya mtsho la sogs pa la bstod/_chos kun nas dang ba'i bdag gi mthar go rims bzhin du rdo rje rigs kyi bzhi la bstod/_spobs pa'i mtshan dang blo 'chang ba/_/tsan+d+ra dang ni rin chen zla/_/mi 'jigs pa dang me 'od che/_/tshangs pa'i sgra dang snyan pa'i gsung /_/_
[\[40b.6\]]shes rab ma dang kun mnyam blo/_/rdo rje tshig dang blo spobs ldan/_/nam mkha'i dbang dang ngag dbang phyug_/yon tan mchog dang gnas kyi mchog_/'phags pa'i 'od dang gsal ba'i ri/_/rnga yi sgra dang 'dod spyod sbyin/_/ye shes legs dang zhi bas bzhugs/_/ye shes gsung
[\[40b.7\]]dang shin tu gdugs/_/rgyal mtshan gdugs dang dri ma bral/_/ye shes dbang dang skal bral brjod/_/gzi brjid 'od dang drang srong che/_/shes rab 'phags dang 'khor lo spor/_/zla ba'i zhal dang nyi zla'i 'od/_/yon tan mtsho dang yon tan sdud/_/blo med tog dang bsod nams
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]tog_/yul spangs pa dang rigs skyes dang /_/rgyal po'i rigs dang rnam grol gsung /_/dbang phyug po dang mchog shes dang /_/bdud rtsi 'od dang pad+ma dang /_/ye shes spyan dang nam mkha'i khams/_/mchod dang dpung tshogs bcas pa'o/_/rdzogs sangs
[\[41a.2\]]zhes bya zhags pa ma/_/byang chub 'chang ni lcags kyu ma/_/sangs rgyas zhes bya dril bu ma/_/ye shes me lce lcags sgrog go/_/rin chen 'phro dang zla ba'i sku/_/seng ge gdong dang ye shes sku/_/zhe'o/_/gzhung tshad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan nyis brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga/_rgyal ba lnga la lnga
[\[41a.3\]]bcu rtsa lnga la'o//_//da ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor ston pa ni/_bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan ser po lte bar bsam/_dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rtsa ba'i zhal ser po/_gzhan mthun/_de la snying rjes don sgrub pa dang /_shes rab bo/_/dam pa'i
[\[41a.4\]]gang zag gi sems can ji ltar bde ba thob par 'dod pas don bsgrub par bya/_de ni ngan song sbyong bar byed pa'i mgon po grol bar byed pa'i thabs ston pa ni nyon mongs pa bsal ba dang /_mi shes pa bsal ba'i phyir nga rgyal can de 'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang gzugs med
[\[41a.5\]]bsal bar mi nus she na/_nga rgyal can 'dul ba ni rgyu shes rab dang snying rjes sku che ba'i bdag nyid du ston pa ni dpal ldan zhes bya ba nas tshangs pa'i yul sa zhes bya bas bstan te/_phyag rgya 'khor lo dang shaka ti 'dzin pa'o/_/don ston pa ni don gcig ces bya bas so/_/'o na
[\[41a.6\]]'jigs pa chen po ston pa des rtogs mi nus so zhe na/_'jigs pa med par ro/_/de ltar zil gyis mnan nas stong pa nyid ston te/_ming bzhi las rten med pa la ni ming bzhi'i phung po bstan nas theg pa la dgod pa ni rnam par rig pa'i gzugs su'o/_/don ston pa ni don zhes
[\[41a.7\]]pa'o/_/gdul bya ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs so/_/'dod pa'i nas grol bar byed ces pa'i mthar sems dpa' bzhi la go rims bzhin/_nyon mongs nas gzugs 'chang mthar rin chen rigs kyi sems dpa' bzhi'o/_/lag pa brgya po nas gar byed ces pa'i
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]mthar pad+ma'i sems dpa' bzhi'o/_/sa yi dkyil 'khor nas gnon zhes pa'i mthar rdo rje rigs kyi sems dpa' bzhi la bstod/_don gcig gnyis med nas rgyud dang ldan zhes pa'i mthar sgo ba mi bzhi la go rims bzhin no/_/don grub dpal dang ye shes nyi/_/don yod
[\[41b.2\]]grub dang ri rab brtsegs/_/sgra sbyin dang ni pad+ma dpal/_/dgra bcom grags dang ye shes stobs/_/nyon mongs 'joms dang ye shes don/_/bde ba'i dri dang dpe bral bzhad/_/dri yi 'od dang mtha' yas ston/_/so ma dang ni rat+na so/_/seng ge mchog dang bsam gtan 'od/_/_
[\[41b.3\]]dpa' bar 'gro dang rnam par rol/_/rin chen yon tan don ston pa'o/_/da ni 'dod chags kyi don du bstan pa ni/_dngos don ma lus te chags pa can la/_stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo/_/des 'dul ba'i sku ston pa ni srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs pas ston te/_mdog dang
[\[41b.4\]]dbyibs dang rgyan dang spyod pa la sogs pas yid tshim pa bskyed nas lam la 'god do/_/dngos don gyis ni rin chen sems ma'o/_stong pa nyid dga' nas spangs pas ni zhes bya bas pad+ma'i sems ma dang las kyi sems ma la bstod/_srid gsum zhes bya bas sems
[\[41b.5\]]ma rdo rje ma la bstod/_sprin dkar dag pa nas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan zhes pa'i mthar ye shes sems dpa' la bstod/_dgra bcom grags dang rin chen 'od/_/srid bcings gol dang spyod ngan spangs/_/nam mkha'i mdzod dang spobs pa grags/_/rdo rje nor bu tshe dpag
[\[41b.6\]]med/_/nor bu bkod dang rin chen dang /_/yon tan mgon dang ri bo grags/_/bcu 'od ldan dang gnyid dang bral/_/klu stobs shin tu grags pa'o/_/gti mug can la de nyid dran pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba la sogs pa dang /_de bzhin
[\[41b.7\]]gshegs pa'i yon tan ni chos sku dang gzugs sku'o/_/chags pa can 'dul ba ni nam mkha' ltar ma chags pa bsgom pa'o/_/da ni shes rab bstan pa'i phyir/_ril por 'dzin pa dgag pa'i phyir dang /_zhen pa spang ba'i phyir phung po lnga stong pa nyid du bstan/_de yang nges
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]par 'dzin pa spangs pa'o/_/des don dam med kyang sdom pa'i rten kun rdzob du bstan pa 'thad pa'i phyir/_yan lag bcu gnyis zhes bya bas rang sangs rgyas kyi lam bstan/_bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po/_/zhes bya bas nyan thos kyis rtogs pa'i lam
[\[42a.2\]]mo/_/bden pa bzhi zhes bya ba nas rnam pa nyi shus zhes bya bas rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos las khyad par ston pa ni skad cig ma'am stong pa nyi shus khyad par du byas pa'o/_/'o na de'i 'bras bu ci zhe na/_byang chub pa ni chos sku rnam par sangs rgyas pa ni longs sku sangs rgyas
[\[42a.3\]]kyi sprul pa ste 'bras bu de'o/_/de'i phyir theg pa ni 'di'o/_/'o na 'bras bu sku gsum theg pa 'dis grub pa ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyon mongs khams rnams dag par byed pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa zad par byed pa'i phyir na 'khor ba'i dri ma spangs shing 'jigs su rung ba'i
[\[42a.4\]]gnas las grol bar byed pa'i sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa spong ba ni 'di yin pas so/_/de'i phyir snying rje chen po shes rab thabs dang ldan nas don yod cing 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan no/_/'o na rang zhen pa dang ldan pa lta bu snying rje skyed pa byed dam zhe na/_de lta
[\[42a.5\]]ma yin te/_rtog pa thams cad spangs shing rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas yid du 'ong ba dang mi 'ong ba'i rtog pa spangs te/_rtog pa med pa'i ye shes ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa rig pas sems can thams cad kyi rgyud rig cing bsam pa ji lta ba ste/_de yang rim dang rim
[\[42a.6\]]ma yin pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen po'i lam la 'god de/_phyin ci log dang nor ba spangs nas phyin ci ma log pa'i 'bras bu chos sku longs sku ste/_rang don gzhan don dang ldan pa thob par byed do/_/de ltar shes pas 'bras bu sku gsum thob par ston to/_/'o na 'bras bu
[\[42a.7\]]de thob pa'i 'khrul pa de ci zhe na/_grangs can la sogs pa ste/_dngos po kun yon tan gsum du 'dod pa dang /_bdag la sogs pa 'dod pa dang /_gzhan yang bye brag pa la sogs pa phung po lnga'i skye mched kyi rdzas don dam par 'dod cing dus gsum rdzas su 'dod pa de
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]dag ni mi 'thad do /_/glog dang me lce bzhin du thams cad skad cig mar bye brag med pa'i phyir ro/_/'o na thams cad skad cig mar song nas 'bad pa don med do zhe na/_khyed kyi rdzas su 'dod pa rtag pa la mi 'thad de 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/skad cig ma ni rang bzhin du
[\[42b.2\]]grub pas sangs rgyas kun skad cig gcig la rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i phyir 'bras bu grub pa'o/_/'o na 'bras bu ji lta bu zhe na/_lus med lus te lus kyi mchog_/lus kyi mtha' ni kun du ston/_/zhes bya ba'o/_/de la chos sku dang gzugs sku ste 'bras bu mthar thug
[\[42b.3\]]rtogs pa'o/_/de bas chos sku ni lus kyi mthar thug ste/_de rtogs par byed pa ni shes rab phyin ci ma log pa ste/_de ni bcom ldan 'das so/_/'o na stong pa nyid skad cig thabs dang bral bas gzhan don ji ltar byed ce na/_gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun du ston/_/zhe'o/_/_
[\[42b.4\]]'o na de la gzugs sna tshogs mos pa bzhin du 'thad dam zhe na/_nor bu chen po rin chen tog_/ces bya bas so/_/'jig rten zhes byas gar ma la/_/rdzu 'phrul zhes byas glu ma la/_/de nyid ces byas phreng ba ma/_/dran pa zhes byas sgeg ma'o/_/byang chub ces byas spos me ma/_/de
[\[42b.5\]]bzhin zhes byas dri chab ma/_/lam gyi zhes byas me tog ma/_/yang dag ces byas mar me ma'o/_/yid du 'ong dang rin chen zla/_/shugs can dang ni gsal bar byed/_/dga' ba'i dbang phyug gtsug phud 'od/_/'jigs pa bral dang yon tan snying /_/dri med grags dang gzi
[\[42b.6\]]brjid gzhi/_/gdung ba grags dang lha gnas pa/_/legs par mnyam dang rin chen sku/_/sangs rgyas 'byung dang sangs rgyas stobs/_/rin chen khyab dang grong khyer mthong /_/blo gros 'od dang 'jig rten 'od/_/rin chen lha dang yang dag rgyal/_/skal ldan shing rta dga' bas
[\[42b.7\]]bkod/_/mu yi 'od dang dka' thub rgyal/_/byang sems zla dang chos 'chang ba/_/gzhan gyis mi thub zla ba'o/_/sems can kun la zhes bya bas dang po'i sangs rgyas la bstod pa'o/_/yan lag bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ste/_dkyil 'khor lha grangs dag tu mi gtogs/_/mtshan gyi
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]grangs su 'di brjod do/_/rnam pa sangs rgyas zhes bya'i mthar shes rab 'khor lo bstod pa'o/_/bye ba dpag med nas snying rje chen po zhes bya bas byang phyogs bskal bzang bzhi la bstod/_'gro ba'i don nas 'bras bur gnas/_/zhes bya bas lho'i bskal
[\[43a.2\]]bzang ste/_mtha' ma la gnyis go rims bzhin/_nyon mongs khams rnams kun las rgal/_/zhes bya bas nub kyi bskal bzang ste dang po gnyis la go rims bzhin no/_/sbyor ba'i dgon pa nas gtan du spangs zhes bya bas shar gyi bskal bzang ste mtha' ma la gnyis go
[\[43a.3\]]rims so/_/snying rje che nas 'gag par byed ces bya bas don yod grub pa la bstod pa'o/_/sems can kun gyi yid gnas pas rdo rje sems dpa' la bstod pa'o/_/de dag sems dang zhes pas ni snang ba mtha' yas la bstod pa'o/_/phung po lnga don zhes bya bas rin
[\[43a.4\]]chen 'byung ldan la bstod pa'o/_/ri yi 'od dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs/_/bde ba'i lha dang yon tan brtsegs/_/lha yi stobs dang thub pa'i don/_/nor bu can dang seng ge'i bla/_/zla ba'i mtshan dang sgra gcan mtshungs/_/grags chen dang ni gzi brjid shugs/_/chos kyi
[\[43a.5\]]grags dang dga' bar ldan/_/dri bzang po dang ri rgyal mtshan/_/dga' ba'i 'od dang mchod par 'os/_/sprin mtha' dang ni bden pa gsung /_/rnam snang mdzad dang rnam par nges/_/grags pa'i mtha' dang grogs tshangs pa/_/seng 'od gser dang srog dang ldan/_/'gro ba'i
[\[43a.6\]]theg dang thun tshod dang /_/grags pa'i mchog dang blo bzang chub/_/nor lha dka' thub drag po dang /_/'od gsal byed dang nor gyi 'khor/_/'jig rten 'das dang seng ban glang /_/yon tan rgyal dang rin chen 'od/_/ce'o/_/tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/_/mtshan ni brgya
[\[43a.7\]]dang bcu dag ste/_/so sor nyi shu rtsa gnyis so/_/de la lha grangs su ma gtogs pa tshigs bcad gnyis te/_shes rab 'khor lo'o/_/de la 'khor lo ste/_shes rab 'khor lo ji lta bu zhe na/_dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis te/_a A'o/_/des 'brel pa bzhi tshul mu
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]khyud bzhi dang 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa gang gi phyed spangs pa'i dag pa dang brgyad pa ni brgyad po dang drug po rig go/_/'ching ba gcod pa dang 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' gnyis dag par byed pa dang /_bden pa bzhi gsung ba dang /_thugs rig pa'i ye
[\[43b.2\]]shes lngar gsal ba/_sku ye shes kyi sku'i bdag nyid du byang chub pa'o/_/mtshan gyi grangs su ma gtogs pa ni rkang pa ya gcig ces bya ba'i tshigs bcad gcig rkang pa gnyis so/_/lar gzhung tshad nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/_/da ni don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ston pa
[\[43b.3\]]ni dbus su don yod grub pa ljang gu'o/_/dang po'i sangs rgyas rtsa ba'i zhal ljang gu'o/_/so so'i yum sbas pa'i yum du sbyar bar bya'o/_/de la sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba/_/zhes pa ste rtogs par bya ba de rtogs par bya'o/_/gang gi zhe na/_byang chub sems dpas so/_/_
[\[43b.4\]]gang rtogs par bya zhe na/_sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs pa de'o/_/'o na ci'i phyir ram gang gi phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste/_'bras bu bla na med pa thob pa'i phyir ro/_/'o na de gang la brten zhe na/_gsang sngags la brten nas so/_/gang ltar zhe na/_bsod nams kyi
[\[43b.5\]]tshogs mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du bsags nas yi ge med pa ste/_stong pa nyid ye shes kyi tshogs bstan nas/_gsang sngags chen po ste sa bon rigs gsum pa ni thabs rnam pa gsum gyis bskyed pa'o/_/de yang rten dang brten pa ma lus pa bskyed pa'i don to/_/de ltar
[\[43b.6\]]bskyed pa'i rim pa la brtan pa thob nas/_sangs rgyas kun nas don kun skyed pa po'i mthar dang po'i sangs rgyas la bstod pa'o/_/dbang byed rgyal dang bdud rab zhi/_/mnyam sangs rgyas dang rtog dang bral/_/ri rab zhi dang rmongs pa sel/_/rol pa'i stobs bzhi zhes pa'o/_/_
[\[43b.7\]]de la bzhi ni 'khor lo bzhi'o/_/bcu drug phyed phyed rtsa ba'i dbye ba ste/_thig le ni byang chub kyi sems so/_/stong pa ni sreg pa'o/_/rtse mo ni gtum mo'o/_/'dab ma'i grangs ni bye ba phyed dang bcu/_/de la stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis so/_/de las 'khor lo bzhi ste/_dkyil 'khor
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]dang po gnyis pa yis/_/bde ba chen po'i sum cu mtshon/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gsum pa yi/_/gnyis pa'i tshigs bcad drug bsnan pas/_/bcu drug mgrin pa'i 'khor lo'o/_/de las tshig gcig dang po'i mgo/_/lhag pa bde chen dkyil du bsam/_/_
[\[44a.2\]]dkyil 'khor bzhi pa lnga pa gnyis/_/drug pa'i dang po tshigs bcad gnyis/_/tshig gsum 'og tu phyed dang drug_/bsnan pas sprul pa'i 'khor lo'o/_/tshig gsum po ni lte bar bsam/_/dkyil 'khor lnga pa'i mtshan med tshig_/tshig rkang drug dang lha yi ni/_/bstod pa ma
[\[44a.3\]]gtogs tshigs bcad gnyis/_/rdo rje nyi ma nas dpal ldan sangs rgyas zhes pa'i tshigs bcad drug gis gtso bo gsum bsten/_dkyil 'khor drug pas thugs kar chos kyi 'khor lo'o/_/bcu drug phyed phyed ni bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu drug go/_/chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis te/_
[\[44a.4\]]dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhi'o/_/rtsol ba'i grangs kyis mtshan bzung ngo /_/srog ni lha'i rang bzhin te/_/rtsa ni brtan du gsal bar bsgom/_/de ltar lus gnas dkyil 'khor ro/_/bcu drug phyed phyed 'grib sa nas/_/'phel dang 'grib pas mtshon pa'o/_/yang na dbyangs yig gi
[\[44a.5\]]phyed kyi tha ma aM ngo /_/yan lag med pa ni haM ngo /_/rtse mo ni ze 'bru la'o/_/rnam pa ni kha dog so sor ro/_/yi ge drug ni mgrin pa dang snying ga la'o/_/yi ge brgya ni yon tan no/_/de dang ldan pa 'dzag pa'o/_/de 'dzag par byed pa'i thabs gzhan yod pas bsam gtan yan lag
[\[44a.6\]]kun shes pa'o/_/'o na yon tan ci zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin rig dang rgyud rig pa'o/_/thig le nas rnam pa kun ldan zhes pa'i mthar gsang ba yum bzhi go rims bzhin/_bcu drug nas ting nge 'dzin lus dang zhes pa'i mthar ye shes sems dpa' la bstod pa'o/_/dge ba bzang
[\[44a.7\]]dang ye shes thugs/_/smra ba'i dbang dang lha chen po/_/blo gros bzang dang tshe dpag med/_/chos kyi stobs dang 'jig rten chos/_/sgra gcan nyid dang rgyal mtshan grags/_/sman pa'i mchog dang me tog 'od/_/ting 'dzin lus dang lus kyi mchog ste chos sku'o/_/longs spyod
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]rdzogs sku dang sprul pa'i sku ste zhes bya bas gzugs sku gnyis so/_/phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed de lha mi la sogs pa'o/_/de gang las she na/_mchog gi sku de las so/_/de rnams la chos dang zang zing gi sbyin pa byed pa/_de ltar yul de la las khyad par can
[\[44b.2\]]ston pa de la mchod par 'os bstod par 'os phyag la sogs pa 'os pa'i phyir ro/_/longs spyod rdzogs sku nas rgyud 'chang ba zhes pa'i mthar byang phyogs kyi bzhi la bstod pa ste mtha' ma la gnyis so/_/phyogs bcu nas ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa zhes pa'i mthar lho'i ste
[\[44b.3\]]gnyis gnyis so/_/lha'i dbang po nas dbang phyug ces pa'i mthar nub kyi bzhi la go rims bzhin/_srid pa'i dgon pa nas 'gro ba'i bla zhes pa'i mthar shar gyi shes rab sems dpa' bzhi ste gnyis gnyis so/_/'jig rten phyogs bcu nas sel bar byed ces bya bas bskal
[\[44b.4\]]pa bzang po bcu drug shar nas brtsams nas gnyis gnyis so/_/bdud dpung zhes byas dril bu ma/_/pham par byed pa lcags sgrog go/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes zhags pa ma/_/'jig rten 'dren zhes lcags kyu ma/_/mchod 'os bstod 'os nas rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i mthar nang
[\[44b.5\]]gi lha mo bzhi la go rims bzhin du bstod/_bkur 'os nas brjod par bya ba ni phyi'i lha mo bzhi la ni tshig rkang phyed phyed kyis bstod pa'o/_/dge gtsug phud dang bdud rtsi 'od/_/byang chub che dang rgya mtsho bstan/_/rin chen stobs dang rol pa'i stobs/_/nyi ma can dang dga' ba'i 'od/_/gtsug
[\[44b.6\]]na nor dang srid bral bdag_/'gro ba 'dul dang sdud pa'o/_/me tog sbyin dang 'gro ba'i 'od/_/mthun par smra dang pad+ma dang /_/ye shes 'dod dang bkod pas rol/_/don yod gnas dang gtan pa'i 'od/_/rgyal mtshan 'dzin dang bde ba'i gnas/_/rnam grol bzang dang bsam pa
[\[44b.7\]]shes/_/sems can 'dzin dang rin chen 'dzin/_/rgya mtsho dga' dang mi thub 'joms/_/dgra chen po dang 'dul ba dang /_/maN+Dal bsnams dang lha rnams mchod/_/dri ma spangs dang mchog gi mu/_/lha mo gsung snyan rin chen lha/_/pad+ma'i phyag dang bdud dgra 'joms/_/rtog spangs
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]don ni grub pa'o/_/'o na longs skus gang la mdzad pa ston zhe na/_'jig rten gsum po gom gcig ces pa ste/_sa brgyad pa dang bcu pa'i bar bgrod pa gcig pa mi 'gyur ba ste/_phyir mi ldog pa dang sa dang po mthong lam spyod pa la zhugs pa ni gsum rig
[\[45a.2\]]ste/_'das pa dang da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa la ma chags ma thogs par shes pa sa dang po dang /_sa gnyis pa la gnas pa spyod pa la zhugs pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa la sogs pa ni gtsang ma dag pa ste/_mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug_/byang chub sems
[\[45a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' che/_/gang gis ston par byed ce na/_rdzu 'phrul chen pos so/_/gang ston zhe na/_'jig rten 'dis shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha' ston to/_/gang gi phyir ston par byed ce na/_bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad ces pa'o/_/'bras bu gang zhe na/_shes rab
[\[45a.4\]]kyis ni de nyid thob ste chos sku'o/_/kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog ste sprul sku/_dper bya kun las 'das pa ste/_/shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog ste longs sku'o/_/de ltar ston par byed pa'i gang zag ni bcom ldan 'das te/_gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste/_/phyag rgya
[\[45a.5\]]bzhi'i don ston pa'o/_/de ltar ston pa des na gang la zhu/_gang gis zhus/_gang gi phyir zhu gang la dgongs nas te/_phyag rgya ni sa ma ya'am mu dra'o/_/de ltar ston par byed pa de la ni 'gro ba rnams kyis bsnyen bkur dang ri mo dang mchod pa'i gnas su 'os pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar
[\[45a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis nges par 'bras bu gsum thob pa'i phyir gang zag gsum gyi dbang du byas nas bgrod pa'i theg pa gsum gsungs te/_don gyi nang nas 'bras bu'i dam pa 'di ni rgyu rnam par dag pa 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di'o/_/_
[\[45a.7\]]'o na gang zag gsum pos thun mong du nus sam zhe na/_mi nus te/_'jig rten gsum na skal ba bzang ba phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog tu gyur pa'o/_/des rtogs pa ci zhe na/_dpal ldan 'byor pa ste/_snying rje dang shes rab gnyis dang ldan zhing sems can kun gyi don byed
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]pa la mos pas 'jam dpal 'bras bu dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog 'dis rtogs kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no/_/'jig rten zhes pas rin chen 'byung ldan la bstod/_mngon shes drug ldan zhes bya bas don yod grub pa la bstod pa'o/_/shes rab pha rol zhes bya bas rdo rje sems
[\[45b.2\]]dpa' la bstod pa'o/_/bdag rig gzhan rig ces bya bas snang ba mtha' yas la bstod pa'o/_/gtso bo chos kyi zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad la bstod pa'o/_/me tog mdzes dang yul don grub/_/smra ba'i zla dang brtul zhugs grub/_/mi g.yo ba dang blo gros dang /_/mar me
[\[45b.3\]]'bar dang sgra don rtogs/_/dam pa'i stobs dang gzi brjid stobs/_/blo yi sku dang zla ba dang /_/rin chen 'od dang yon tan rdzogs/_/ston rab mdzad dang gzi brjid bzang /_/ye shes stobs dang gzi brjid dge/_/rten pa'i stobs dang lha yi sku/_/rab zhi dang ni nyi ma'i zhal//_
[\[45b.4\]]grol ba'i 'od dang tshul khrims 'od/_/dka' thub rgyal dang dri ma bral/_/rgya mtsho'i sgra dang gzugs brnyan snang /_/kun las grol dang rgya mtsho 'od/_/dri ma med dang dran dbang 'od/_/zhal rab rgyas dang rgyal ba'i 'od/_/mchog don blo dang dpung rab zhi/_/dbang phyug chos
[\[45b.5\]]dang sna tshogs gsal/_/zhes pas ni mtshan ni dgu bcu rtsa lnga ste/_bcu dgu bcu dgur so sor sbyar/_/tshigs su bcad pa bco lnga'o/_/de ltar mtshan ni rab sbyar ro/_/'khrul 'khor dkyil 'khor so sor sbyar/_/sbyar thabs gzhan du shes par bya/_/de ltar bstod pa dang
[\[45b.6\]]mtshan bstan nas/_da ni yang dag pa'i bstod pa ni/_mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/_/ces pa'i bstod pa ni/_dang po bum pa de bzhin sbyin/_/gnyis pa gsang ba yang dag mtha'/_/gsum pa shes rab stong pa'i rgyu/_/bzhi pa sangs rgyas byang chub bo/_/de yi yan
[\[45b.7\]]lag rnam bshad don/_/yan lag so sor 'og tu sbyar/_/mchog ni sangs rgyas par 'dod pa'i shes rab sbyin pa ni sems can gyi don du thob par 'dod pa'i snying rje de gnyis dbyer med pa ni rdo rje'o/_/de ltar na shes rab dang snying rjes byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas lam thob
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]pa'o/_/yang dag mthar gyur ni sems bskyed la brten pa'i lam de bla ma la rag las so/_/lam shes byed do/_/lam thob pa ni stong pa nyid la ste/_goms pa las so/_/lam gyi 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo/_/mchog sbyin sems ma

[\[50b.3\]]sdug bsngal rab tu zhi ba'o/_/de mthong na yid tshim zhing thos na dga' ba'i stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir/_mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang /_/sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don grub pa/_/sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga'/_/sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can/_/zhes bya ba ni phyi nang
[\[50b.4\]]med pa bsku de las sprul pa dang po 'od dpag tu med pa byung nas sems can thams cad kyi don du shes rab dang snying rje gnyis kyi dga' ba dang bde ba'i gzi mdangs dang ldan te/_yum gyi nyes pa sbyangs te/_de ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dag pa'i sgo nas bstod pa'o/_/_

[\[55a.1\]]bstod pa'o/_/ye shes skar ma lam me ba/_/zhes bya bas ni gtso bo la bstod pa'o/_/rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed/_/ces bya bas ni ye shes sems dpa' nyid la bstod do/_/mtshan ni/_rgyal ba'i tog dang rab grub grags/_/brtson 'grus brtan
[\[55a.2\]]dang dpe bral grags/_/shin tu grags dang dgra bcom lha/_/mar me che dang 'jig rten 'od/_/dpa' bo dri dang yon tan 'dzin/_/mun pa bral dang seng ge spras/_/rin chen grags dang zhi rab sgron/_/yid skyes zla dang legs par ston/_/rgyal mtshan gzugs dang nor bu bzang /_/_
[\[55a.3\]]ri bo'i rtse dang chos 'byung gnas/_/don rnams pa dang chos sbyin pa/_/rin chen gnas dang dbang po rgyal/_/seng ge mnan dang ngo bo'i gnas/_/skal bral gdugs dang thams cad dpal/_/seng ge sgra dang thams cad 'phags/_/seng ge sgra dang yon tan phreng /_/me tog
[\[55a.4\]]ri dang dbyangs ldan no/_/dbang phyug dri dang shin tu dga'/_/stobs kyi lha dang bden par smra/_/klu yi phyag dang rgyal mtshan dang /_/rgyal ba'i blo dang ye shes khyab/_/bdud rtsi 'gro dang nyi ma 'chad/_/blo rab zhi dang gzugs mtha' yas/_/rgyal bas byin dang snang bar mdzad/_/_
[\[55a.5\]]rin chen tog dang don grub dang /_/legs par zhi dang rtogs pa 'chang /_/me tog dang ni dbang po rgyal/_/gzi brjid can dang don ston mdzad/_/tshe dpag med dang khro dbang phyug_/don gnas can dang mi shigs grags/_/mya ngan med dang dri ma bral/_/dri ma bral ba'i lha zhes pa'o/_/_
[\[55a.6\]]rdo rje 'jigs byed dur khrod bdag_/'joms mdzad rgyal dang rnam par 'phrul/_/khams gsum rgyal dang sgyu 'phrul dra/_/rnam par 'joms dang me ltar 'bar/_/bi lo ki dang gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o/_/mi g.yo ba dang rdo rje khu tshur zhes pa'o/_/de nas yum bzhi gtso bo 'khril
[\[55a.7\]]ba dkar po dang dmar po dang /_ser po dang ljang gu'i mdog go/_/glang po'i pags pa 'dzin pa'i phyag gi g.yon na ut+pa la'o/_/de la bstod pa ni/_sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes/_/zhes pas ni/_theg pa mchog gsum ston pa'o/_/zhes bya bas tshig rkang lngas
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]bstod pa'o/_/rigs lnga ni seng ge'i steng na rnam par snang mdzad mdog dkar po zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa/_phyag na gzhu bsnams pa ral pa'i thor tshugs can no/_/bstod pa ni/_don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal/_/zhes bya bas bstod pa'o/_/rin chen 'byung ldan
[\[55b.2\]]rta'i steng na mdog ser po zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa/_phyag na dur khrod kyi ras 'dzin pa ral pa'i thor tshugs can no/_/bstod pa ni/_ha la ha la gdong brgya pa/_/gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal/_/zhes pas bstod pa'o/_/snang ba mtha' yas rma bya dang chu
[\[55b.3\]]lha'i steng na zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa/_mdog dmar po phyag na mdung bsnams pa ral pa'i thor tshugs can no/_/bstod pa ni/_rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba/_/mi g.yo ral pa gcig gis bsgyings/_/zhes pas so/_/don yod grub pa ni mdog ljang gu shang shang dang gnod
[\[55b.4\]]sbyin gyi steng na zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa phyag na rdo rje'i tho ba bsnams pa ral pa'i thor tshugs can no/_/bstod pa ni/_rdo rje drag po rdo rje snying /_/zhes pas so/_/de'i mtshan ni/_'dod pa'i rgyal dang zla ba'i gtso/_/gnod mdzes dang ni hUM mdzad do/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin rdor lcags
[\[55b.5\]]kyu/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil dang pad+ma 'khyil/_/phyag na rdo rje rje khrag 'thung /_/rdo rje lcags sgrog stobs po che/_/rdo rje zhags pa rta mgrin dang /_/drag po che dang 'khor lo'o/_/dang pos mtshan dang yon tan dang kha dog go/_/gnyis pas ni mdog dang mtshan no/_/gsum pas mtshan dang
[\[55b.6\]]mdog dang sku dang /_thabs dang shes rab kyi gnas so/_/bzhi pas mtshan dang mdog dang rgyan cha'o/_/'khor lo'i rtsibs chen bzhi rnams la/_nang gi dur khrod de ag+ni pra b+ha dang /_ma ri ha ha kha dang /_b+he ra ba dz+wa la khar dang /_ma ru tse 'ga' na/_nang na ro'i steng na nyi ma la brkyang
[\[55b.7\]]bskum du bzhugs pa'o/_/nang gi lha mo bzhi ni/_dkar mo dang /_ser mo dang /_dmar mo dang /_ljang gu'i mdog can gyi khro mo zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa/_ro'i steng na rol pa'i tshul can phyag na mi'i mgo bo dang /_rgyu ma dang /_cang te'u dang /_rkang pa'o/_/nyi ma'i 'od can
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/_/grags chen ha ha zhes pa nas/_/rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs pa/_/zhes bya bas bstod de/_de'i mtshan ni 'di yin te/_dbyug sngon can dang 'jigs byed che/_/nam mkha'i mdog dang drag shul 'joms/_/rdo rje sku'i
[\[56a.2\]]bdag rdor dbang sgyur/_/bdud sde 'joms dang zhags pa che/_/nag po che dang zhe sdang 'joms so/_/de'i don ni 'di yin te/_'dod chags nga rgyal phrag dog dang /_/zhe sdang la sogs 'joms mdzad ma'o/_/'khor lo bcu drug la shes rab kyi sems dpa' bcu
[\[56a.3\]]drug ni/_gdan ni mi dang glang po che dang ma he dang bong bu bzhi'i steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa/_mdog dkar po phyag na rdo rje dang gri gug dang /_mda' dang /_lag pa rnams 'dzin pa'o/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/_
[\[56a.4\]]zhes bya ba nas/_mtshan du rdo rje mda' thogs pa/_/zhes bya bas bstod/_gdan ni rnga mo dang khyi dang lug dang wa'i steng na nyi ma'i steng du zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa/_mdog ser po phyag na chu gri dang ral gri dang 'khor lo dang shang lang bsnams pa'o/_/rdo rje ral gri
[\[56a.5\]]ma lus gcod/_/ces pa nas/_rdo rje gcig pu g.yul sel ba/_/zhes bya bas bstod/_gdan ni bya rgod dang 'ug pa dang bya rog dang ne tso'i steng du nyi ma la zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa mdog dmar po phyag na dbyug to dang kha T+wAM ga dang gsal shing dang thod tshal ba bsnams
[\[56a.6\]]pa'o/_/rdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzang /_/skra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste/_/zhes bya bas bstod/_gdan ni khra dang kang ka dang srin bya dang /_khrung khrung gi steng du nyi ma la zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa/_mdog ljang gu phyag na rtse gsum pa dang phub dang sta re dang gtun khung ngo /_/_
[\[56a.7\]]lus ni rdo rje'i ba spu can/_/rdo rje'i spu ni gcig pu lus/_/sen mo skyes pa rdo rje rtse/_/rdo rje snying po pags pa mkhregs/_/zhes bya bas bstod pa'o/_/de rnams kyi mtshan ni/_'od zer 'phro dang bdud sde 'joms/_/drag shul 'joms dang shugs chen mo/_/shin tu khros dang khrag
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]'dzag dang /_/thod pa 'chang dang ut+pa la mdog_/rdo rje 'dus dang phrin las mdzad/_/gtum khro 'bar dang rnga bo che/_/khams gsum 'joms dang drag po'i stobs/_/thal ba'i mdog dang ma he'i zhal/_/bdud rtsi phyag dang nam mkha'i mdog_/dra ba'i 'od dang mi shigs
[\[56b.2\]]bsnams/_/thugs rje'i zhags dang rin chen zhags/_/pad+ma khros dang rdo rje khros/_/zhes pas so/_/gru chad lha mo bzhi po ni/_phyi'i dur khrod de/_bi bi sha dang /_dz+wa la par pa ta dang /_'ga' na du kha dang /_pa ri khre ta dang /_bzhi'i nang na ro'i steng /_nyi ma la brkyang bskum du
[\[56b.3\]]bzhugs pa/_mdog shel gyi mdog dang /_gser btsom dang /_pad+ma rA ga dang /_in+d+ra nI la lta bu phyag na rlung gi ras dang 'phan rtse gsum pa dang me thab dang ka pA la bsnams pa'o/_/bstod pa ni/_/rdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan/_/rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/_/_
[\[56b.4\]]zhes pa'o/_/mtshan ni las kyi khros dang rin chen khros so/_/sgo ma bzhi ni nyi ma'i gdan la zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa'o/_/mdog nag po ser po dmar po sna tshogs pa'o/_/phyag na lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang sdigs mdzub dang dril bu bsnams pa'o/_/bstod pa ni/_
[\[56b.5\]]gad rgyangs ha ha nges par sgrogs/_/zhes bya bas so/_/mtshan ni/_'bar ba'i 'od dang dbyug pa sngo/_/zhes bya bas bstod pa'o/_/de'i don ni/_dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs bsgom dang /_/thams cad 'jam dpal skur bsdus nas/_/'jigs byed chen por gyur pa ni/_/rnam
[\[56b.6\]]thar brgyad ldan zhal brgyad pa/_/spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhir mdzes/_/thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/_/do shal do shal mi mgo brgya/_/phyag ni sum cu rtsa gnyis mdzes/_/byang chub phyogs rnams yongs su rdzogs/_/zhabs ni bcu drug gdug pa gdon/_/stong pa bcu drug yongs su
[\[56b.7\]]dag_/mtshan ma 'greng ba chags pa ste/_/khro bos shes rab shin tu gsal/_/rten gyi gzhal yas de bsgom bya/_/de ni shin tu khros pa'i gnas/_/shin tu 'jigs pa dur khrod gnas/_/thabs dang shes rab ye shes kyi/_/rol pa'i dkyil 'khor de la brten/_/zhi dang rgyas
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]dang dbang dang dgug_/bsad pa'i 'khrul 'khor bcu drug ste/_/sgrub pa rigs kyi 'khor lo lnga/_/bsdus pa'i 'khor lo der bsdus pas/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig 'khrul 'khor ni/_/gdams ngag gzhan du shes par bya/_/tshig rkang bcu bdun rkang pa gcig_/_
[\[57a.2\]]ma tshang mtshan ni brgya rtsa bdun/_/bcu bcu lhag la gtso bo la/_/rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'o/_/da ni 'jam dpal rol pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir/_de nyid kyi sku bskyed pa dang bsrung ba'o/_/da ni sku 'jig rten du byung ba'i tshul ston pa ni de ni 'di
[\[57a.3\]]yin te/_yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra/_/zhes pa nas/_phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che/_/zhes pas ni/_rigs pa dang chos gnyis ka las/_yon tan dpag tu med cing sdug bsngal sim par byed pa'i sgra 'byung bas bstod pa tsam thos pa tsam gyis de kho na lhan cig skyes pa'i ro rtogs
[\[57a.4\]]te/_rgyu mtshan ji lta bus rtogs pa ni/_/yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid/_/yang dag mtha' ni yi ge med/_/ces pa'o/_/gang gis bstan zhe na/_chos sna tshogs kyi ngo bor snang ba'i sgras bstod pas de kho na nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'i ye shes skad cig ma la
[\[57a.5\]]sbyor ba'o/_/'o na 'bras bu gang la sbyar zhe na/_lhan cig skyes pa mi gnas mya ngan las 'das pa la sbyor ba'o/_/rig pa'i bdag nyid chos can du gyur pa'i sgras ci ston zhe na/_gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste/_/sna tshogs gzugs can rig pa'i bdag_/_
[\[57a.6\]]ces bya ba ni 'dod pa ni gzugs du mar gnas pa'o/_/gang zag de rnams kyi bstod pa ni/_mtshungs pa med cing che bar grags/_/ye shes kyi sku de la bstod pa ni/_mtshungs pa med cing che bar grags/_/khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste/_/zhes bya ba'o/_/'o na 'bras
[\[57a.7\]]bu ci zhe na/_'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas/_/dar ba chen po chos kyi tog_/'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig_/gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan/_/sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes/_/dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]can/_/phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug par/_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs/_/zhes pa'o/_/'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pas khams gsum gyi dbang phyug ye shes kyi sku la de ltar bstod pa'o/_/'o na ye shes kyi sku gang zhe na/_'jig rten gsum
[\[57b.2\]]na gzhon lus gcig pa'i sku de la bstod pa'o/_/de'i don ni 'jig rten ni 'jig rten gsum du ye shes kyi sku bltams pa'o/_/ji ltar bltams par byed ce na/_yum gyi sku bstod/_shes rab shin tu yangs pa der 'od kyis 'jig rten gsum gsal bar mdzad nas/_
[\[57b.3\]]'khor thams cad bde ba'i rang bzhin du tshim par byed pa ste/_gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag po yon tan rnam smin gyi mtshan dang ldan pa'i brgya byin gyis/_'jig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med/_/mgon skyabs 'jig
[\[57b.4\]]rten yid gcugs pa/_/zhes bya ba ni yon tan de dang ldan pa'i dbyer med kyi sku de thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi tshul du blangs pa'o/_/'o na de'i don ci zhe na/_skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med/_/ces pa nas/_srid pa'i ri bo 'joms pa po/_/zhes bya bas ni 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa
[\[57b.5\]]dang bstun nas/_skye bas 'gro ba la skyob cing 'dren pa'i rtags su phyogs bzhir nam mkhar gom pa bdun gyis pad+ma bdun bdun no/_/ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa/_/srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po/_/nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin/_/ye shes
[\[57b.6\]]dbang bskur cod pan can/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs/_/sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi/_/gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum thob/_/sgrib pa kun las nges par grol/_/mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas/_/nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das/_/_
[\[57b.7\]]dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po/_/sems can kun gyi klu chen po/_/yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod/_/lus kun las ni rnam grol zhing /_/nam mkha'i lam la rab tu gnas/_/yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang /_/khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog_/dpag bsam shing
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]chen rgyas pa ste/_/bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog_/ces bya ba'i don ni/_ma rig pa'i dri ma dang /_srid pa'i dra ba dang /_nyon mongs pa zhi ba dang /_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir dbang bskur zhing khrus gsol ba'o/_/gang la zhe na/_ye shes kyi sku
[\[58a.2\]]de la'o/_/gang dang ldan pas she na/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis de kho na dang ldan pa dang /_sdug bsngal gsum ste/_lus ngag yid gsum gyi dri ma dag par byed pas so/_/de ji ltar dag ste/_mi dag ce na/_mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas/_/nyon mongs dri ma
[\[58a.3\]]kun las 'das pas so/_/ji ltar rgyu mtshan ci zhe na/_dus gsum dus med rtogs pa'o/_/gang gi las su byas she na/_klu chen pos sems can gyi ye shes kyi sku de la'o/_/ji ltar mdzad ce na/_yon tan gyi rgyan sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka can gyi klu'i gtso bo dga' bo dang
[\[58a.4\]]'jog po'o/_/de yang nam mkha' la lus sprin dang bcas pa dbu la rin chen 'bar bas brgyan pa/_rin po che'i rgyan du mas lus la brgyan pa/_des byang chub kyi shing 'bras bu spos kyi ngad dang ldan pa'i bum pa la/_thabs shes rab kyi chu rgyun gyis 'khru ba'i bum pa lag tu
[\[58a.5\]]thogs nas/_shing chen po de'i lag na bzung ba'i dus de nyid du khrus gsol ba'o/_/las kyi khyad par ci zhe na/_byed pa sems can kun don byed/_/phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa/_/bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la/_/bya ba bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan/_/dus
[\[58a.6\]]shes sems can dbang don shes/_/rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po/_/yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes/_/dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che/_/zhes bya ba'o/_/'o na las gang dang 'brel pas she na/_chos shes bkra shis bkra shis 'byung /_/bkra shis kun gyi bkra
[\[58a.7\]]shis pa/_/grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge_/zhes gong du bstan pa dang 'brel to/_/des ni bram ze dang /_rig byed ltar bkra shis pa'o/_/tshigs su bcad pa rkang pa gsum pa 'dir ni lus dge bar gyur cig_/ngag dge bar gyur cig_/sems dge bar gyur cig/_
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]ces pa'i don to/_/yon tan 'od dang khyad par che/_/rnam shes grags dang kun du grags/_/zla ba gang dang pad+ma'i 'od/_/dka' thub rgyal dang mar me rgyal/_/glog gi tog dang rgyal ba'i 'od/_/gsang ba ldan dang dpe bral grags/_/pad+ma grags dang me tog mtshan/_/spyan
[\[58b.2\]]mchog bzang dang grags med don/_/drag po sde dang bsod nams 'od/_/khyad par can dang thogs med blo/_/sgra gcan dang ni ye shes 'od/_/grags ldan dang ni ye shes ldan/_/skar ma ston dang rA hu la/_/sman chen po dang sman pa'i rgyal/_/bsod nams glang po dang rgyu stobs/_/_
[\[58b.3\]]skar ma rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sku/_/nyi 'od 'chang dang chos kyi mdzod/_/blo gros legs dang rgyal ba po/_/rdo rje sde dang shes rab brtsegs/_/legs par gnas dang rgyal ba'i blo/_/chags pa'i gnas dang klu dbang po/_/yon tan gsal dang ye shes dag_/tog gi 'od dang tshangs
[\[58b.4\]]pa'i dge_/sgra mi snyan dang rol par gar/_/klu yis sbyin dang bde ba'i tog_/mkhas pas dbyangs dang gzhan thub min/_/ri 'od sbyin dang gsung dbyangs can/_/seng ge dang ni sna tshogs nyid/_/ye shes dpal dang pad+ma chu/_/me tog dang ni rnam grol lus/_/bsod nams
[\[58b.5\]]spungs dang mtshan 'gyur blo/_/gsal ba dang ni zla mar me/_/mi bzad pa dang blo bzang spyan/_/yan lag mchog dang shes rab yul/_/mchog tu gyur dang rab 'joms zer/_/shes rab sbyin dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs/_/thogs med mdzod dang mthu sbyin dang /_/dag pa dang ni
[\[58b.6\]]ye shes gnas/_/bde gshegs 'od dang dbang po'i 'od/_/thub pa che dang lha chen dang /_/'od zer bzang dang gzugs mdzes dang /_/rgyal ba'i sku dang don yod ston/_/sing nga la dang dri ldan dang /_/grags pa'i mtshan dang bkra shis dang /_/snying po mchog dang bsod nams
[\[58b.7\]]dge_/nyan pa chags dang nyan 'dod pa/_/mar me rgyal dang rin chen brtsegs/_/tshogs med lha dang sa yi bdag_/grol bar 'gro dang gtsug bung gser/_/sgra gcan bzang dang mi thub ste/_/rang bzhin thub dang zla ba'i 'od/_/gser mdog bzang dang 'od dge ba'o/_/yon dbang lha
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]dang chos kyi gdugs/_/yon tan lag dang dran pa'i mtshan/_/ye shes rdzogs dang blo gros 'phro/_/'od rnams 'bar dang sman gyi skyabs/_/dga' chen rol mo chen po ste/_/bkur sti rim gro bya ba'i 'os/_/ji ltar de la bya bar 'os she na/_'jig rten dgra ste
[\[59a.2\]]rab kyi mchog_/'jigs pa ma lus sel ba'o/_/de'i phyir byin gyi rlabs kyi yon tan de rnams dang ldan pa'o/_/de gang gis rtogs she na/_gtsug phud phud pu lcang lo can/_/zhes pa nas/_tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog_/ces bya bas ni skye gnyis pa'o/_/ji ltar
[\[59a.3\]]rtogs pa'i rgyu gang dang ldan pas rtogs she na/_dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub can/_/gtsang gnas dam pa gau ta ma/_/ji ltar shes she na/_bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa shes/_/mya ngan 'das pa tshangs pa thob/_/grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus/_/rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba
[\[59a.4\]]nyid/_/ces bya ba ni rgyu khyad par can dang ldan par bram zes shes so/_/bram ze de yang dri ma dag pa'i phyir rtags la brten nas dpog pa ni/_mya ngan 'das pa mya ngan 'das/_/legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye/_/zhes bya bar rtogs pas so/_/bde sdug sel bar mthar gyur pa/_/_
[\[59a.5\]]chags bral lus las 'das pa po/_/rtags ni 'jig rten pa'i stobs kyis/_/thub pa med pa dpe med pa/_/mi mngon mi snang gsal byed min/_/de la brten nas ye shes kyi sku lhan cig skyes pa'i bdag nyid du rtogs te/_mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po/_/phra zhing zag med sa
[\[59a.6\]]bon bral/_/rdul med rdul bral dri ma med/_/nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa/_/shin tu sad pa sad pa'i bdag_/kun shes kun rig dam pa po/_/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das/_/ye shes gnyis med gzugs 'chang ba/_/rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub/_/de'i don ni
[\[59a.7\]]mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par rtags kyi sgo nas shes la/_'jig rten pa'i 'phong dang bzo dpe med cing gzhan gyis bskyod par mi nus pas kyang shes so/_/de gang gi phyir zhe na/_thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba phra ba dang /_dri ma bral ba dang /_nyes skyon thams
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]cad zad pa'i phyir/_'bras bu kun shes pa'i bdag nyid mngon sum du grub bo/_/de'i phyir/_dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa/_/sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa/_/ye shes mig gcig dri ma med/_/de lta bu'i rang bzhin du
[\[59b.2\]]gnas she na/_ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs/_/tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che/_/smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal/_/smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas/_/smra ba'i seng ge mtshungs pa med/_/kun du lta ba mchog tu dga'/_/gzi brjid phreng ba lta na sdug_/'od bzang
[\[59b.3\]]'bar ba dpal gyi be'u/_/lag na 'od 'bar snang ba po/_/sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste/_/zhes bya ba'i don ni ye shes kyi lus kyi bdag nyid ni rnam pa lngar gnas la/_sngags ni ye shes lnga'i brda ston pa'o/_/yid ni dpal be'u'i tshul du zhu ba'i bdag nyid du gnas so/_/_
[\[59b.4\]]de yang gzhon nu'i rol pa dang skyo bas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba dang /_zhi gnas kyi 'khor ba'i rgyu spangs pa/_shes rab kyi spyan gyis sems can la gzigs pa ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bsgrub pa'o/_/dka' ba'i gnas su zhi gnas bsgom
[\[59b.5\]]pa'i tshul du bzhugs kyang ye shes chen po dang po sangs rgyas ye shes lnga'i lus su chos kyi longs spyod pa dang /_gzi brjid dang ldan pas ni'o thug gsol bas mdangs dang ldan no/_/des ni sprul pa dang gzhi rten dang po sangs rgyas so/_/rnam grol tog dang shes rab mchog_/_
[\[59b.6\]]ye shes rgyal dang gzugs 'jigs pa/_/glo bur 'jigs dang thogs med grags/_/bde ba ldan dang ngag snyan rigs/_/grags dbang po dang chos kyi brtsegs/_/'gro ba'i 'od dang legs pa'i rgyal/_/rang bzhin lus dang ye shes gsung /_/sna tshogs pa dang nyon mongs sel/_/_
[\[59b.7\]]'gro ba'i mchog dang seng ge rig_/chos kyi mtshan dang skal ba bzang /_/mi bskyod gdong dang 'bar ba'i rgyal/_/rtog pa'i gsung dang spyan bzang po/_/rig don blo dang 'jigs pa bral/_/dri yi 'od dang dga' ba'i 'od/_/don yod 'gro dang khro thal mdog_/gzugs mchog dang ni brtan
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]pa'o/_/rtogs par byed dang shes rab spyan/_/don rig blo dang drag po'i bzhin/_/nyi ma'i lha dang shes rab gsal/_/shing rta 'gros dang gser btso ma/_/skal ldan gtsug dang dbang phyug dang /_/dga' ba brtan dang mos pa 'joms/_/tshangs par shes dang
[\[60a.2\]]tsan+dan dang /_/mya ngan 'joms dang sengs ge'i 'od/_/tog gi yul dang pad+ma'i snying /_/mtha' yas 'od dang snying po lha/_/me tog mdzes dang rig pa'i haM/_/shes rab 'bar dang tshangs dbang po/_/rin chen phyag dang dbang po ldan/_/dpe med dri dang the tshom bral/_/mchod par 'os
[\[60a.3\]]dang 'bar ba'o/_/pad+ma'i gdugs dang 'dum gyi mchog_/ye shes 'od dang bya brtsal grub/_/gsal ba'i mdog dang chos ldan pa/_/phan ldan gzugs dang ye shes dang /_/grags pa dang ni 'od zer 'bar/_/snying po baiDUr bye bai DUr+ya/_/rgyu skar tshogs dang lha nyid dang /_/zla ba'i 'od
[\[60a.4\]]dang dra ba'i 'od/_/dge ba'i 'od dang yon tan can/_/dam chos brjod dang mig las rgyal/_/smra ba'i stobs dang tshogs dbang sgyur/_/legs pa'i yid dang rigs kyi 'od/_/spyod lam zhi dang ye shes mchog_/chos dbang phyug dang ris lha sku/_/yon tan las dang 'khor lo
[\[60a.5\]]stobs/_/legs par sbyangs dang legs par rig_/don grub dpal dang gzi brjid dpal/_/thams cad snyoms dang bdud rtsi dbyangs/_/snang bde 'bar dang legs pa'i blo/_/rnam grol don dang dbang phyug 'phags/_/de la dang po'i sangs rgyas ye shes kyi lus de bzhin
[\[60a.6\]]gshegs pa'i gzugs su snang ba de'i thugs kar dpal gyi be'u ni 'khor lo ut+pala'i 'dab ma lta bu'o/_/de'i thugs kar a thung ngu bsgoms la/_lag pa 'od 'bar ba'i ral gri/_sman dang sman pa lta bus nad 'joms pa dang 'dra ba'i po ti shing ut+pala'i steng na mtshan pa/_
[\[60a.7\]]sku shin tu mdzes pa'i sku 'od zer gyi dra ba las skar mda' phog pa dang 'dra ba 'phro zhing sangs rgyas de'i lus las 'phro ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig_/de'i phyir/_dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can/_/phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i mthar thug pa/_/chos kyi rgyal
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]mtshan legs par 'dzugs/_/'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste/_/byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can/_/dpal ldan pad+ma gar gyi bdag_/khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor can/_/sangs rgyas
[\[60b.2\]]kun gyi bstan pa gcig_/rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal/_/zhes bya ba ni yang na gong dang 'dra ba'i ye shes kyi sku lnga'i bdag nyid de'i thugs kar ut+pa la'i 'khor lo skar ma'i 'od dam zla ba'i 'od dam nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu dkar po shin tu phra ba'i steng du zhu ba kun lta bu dmar
[\[60b.3\]]po'i mdog can bsams te/_de las 'od zer dkar dmar 'phros pas nam mkha'i khams thams cad du khyab ste/_sprul pa'i sku 'gro ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba dang bzhengs pa dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bsams nas/_de yang byams pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid
[\[60b.4\]]can du byas te/_pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs shing bde ba la longs spyod pa'i skur bsgom mo/_/yang na lte ba'i dkyil nyid du pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa'i steng du bsam pa ni a thung ngu'o/_/yang na khyab pa'i bdag po'i ze'u 'bru dang /_ze'u 'bru la nyi ma dang zla ba'i thig le bsams te/_
[\[60b.5\]]gzi brjid me'i rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid bsreg pa dang /_sangs rgyas kun gyis bsregs nas rnal 'byor ma yum lnga'i rang bzhin yang bsregs te smin mtshams su bton nas/_'gro ba dang bzhengs pa dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba la sogs pas sems can gyi
[\[60b.6\]]don byas/_sangs rgyas rnams mchod nas/_spyi gtsug tu zhugs te gsol ba btab par bsgom par bya'o/_/de ltar blta zhing rdo rje'i glu blang bar bya'o/_/rol pa'i mchog dang lhag mthong dang /_/nyes pa spangs dang nyi ma'i 'od/_/dgra rgyal blo dang pad+ma'i mchog_/nyi ma'i
[\[60b.7\]]'od dang so sor gsung /_/legs pa'i mu dang tshogs dbang po/_/'jigs pa bral dang ye shes sred/_/de ltar bstod pa de ni ye shes sems dpa'i rang bzhin brjod pa'o/_/'jam dpal rol pa'i dkyil 'khor la tshigs su bcad pa sum cu gcig go/_/mtshan nyis
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]brgya sum cu'o/_/de ni ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ston te/_rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal/_/zhes pa nas/_sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas/_/zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi sa bon bstan te/_byang chub sems so/_/de yang chos
[\[61a.2\]]kyi 'khor lo dang sprul pa'i 'khor lo'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sku yi mchog_/ces bya ba nas/_rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od/_/ces bya bas ni hUM dang a'o/_/de yang dmar po dang dkar po'o/_/chags bral la sogs chags pa che/_/kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/_/ces bya bas ni/_
[\[61a.3\]]'od zer lnga las ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi sku steng gi hUM las rdo rje 'od kha dog lnga las thabs kyi ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i ye shes sems dpa' bsgom pa ni/_rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes/_/kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa/_/rgyal po sgyu
[\[61a.4\]]'phrul sna tshogs 'chang /_/zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi lus la rdzogs pa nyid du bstan pa ni pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'i dang po'i sangs rgyas kun mkhyen pa'i zhal dang ldan pa/_shes rab dang ye shes kyi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o/_/de'i thugs kar thabs dang
[\[61a.5\]]shes rab kyi rang bzhin de bsgom par bya'o/_/de nyid gang zhe na/_rdo rje zab mo dzin dzika_/_rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig_/rdo rje rnon po ral gri che/_/yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag_/theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod/_/mtshon cha chen po rdo rje'i chos/_/zhes bya bas ni ye shes lnga lnga bcur
[\[61a.6\]]gyur pas shes par bya'o/_/'o na rgyu mtshan cis shes she na/_pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa/_/sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan/_/zhes bya ba ni/_pha rol phyin pa bcu'i bdag nyid dang /_sa bcu'i bdag nyid kyis bcu'o/_/de rnams kyang rgyan dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/'o na drug par
[\[61a.7\]]cis shes she na/_rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus ldan/_/ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang /_/zhes bya bas bstan te/_des ni drug pa rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin du bstan to/_/de bas na/_sa'i snying po 'gro ba 'dzin/_/kun du bzang po blo gros bzang /_/zhes bya ba ste thabs dang shes rab kyi rang
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]bzhin no/_/gnas gang du zhe na/_sprul ba'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang /_/dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog_/dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin/_/skye med chos te sna tshogs don/_/zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i gnas dngos po bskyed pa'i sa skye ba med kyang cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston
[\[61b.2\]]pa sprul pa'i gnas su'o/_/rnam pa ji lta bu zhe na/_chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba/_/chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste/_/thub pa blo mchog 'byung bo sel/_/mi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa/_/ye shes
[\[61b.3\]]me lce 'od 'bar gsal/_/'dod pa'i don grub dam pa'o/_/zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin du dag pa'i ye shes 'chang ba ni gang zhe na/_lhag mthong gi shes rab dang bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin ltar zhu ba de dbyer mi phyed pa'i shes rab mi g.yo ba rtogs pa'o/_/de kho na
[\[61b.4\]]bde ba chen po ye shes kyi sku'i bdag nyid du grub pa'o/_/ji ltar rtogs pas grub ce na/_mngon sum nyid du yul du byas pas grub pa'o/_/de bas na de rnams bsgom pa ni ut+pa la'am mar me'i rtse mo dang 'dra bar bsgom mo/_/'o na gzhan don ji ltar byed par 'gyur/_/ngan song
[\[61b.5\]]thams cad rnam par sbyong /_/mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog_/sems can thams cad rab grol byed/_/nyon mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba/_/mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms/_/zhes bya ba des ni gti mug gi mun pa 'joms pa'o/_/dpal ldan blo dang sgeg pa 'chang /_/_
[\[61b.6\]]brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba/_/zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'o/_/lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing /_/gom pa'i stobs kyis gar byed pa/_/dpal ldan lag pa brgyad gang la/_/nam mkha' khyab par gar byed cing /_/sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhi yi khyon/_/rkang pa ya gcig
[\[61b.7\]]mthil gyis gnon/_/rkang mtheb sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang /_/tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon/_/don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don/_/dam pa'i don ni 'jigs pa sel/_/zhes bya ba ni dang bo bsnyen pa sngon du song bas sa bsrung zhing sbyang ba dang /_sta gon la gnas pas bsrung
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]bar bya ba dang /_dkyil 'khor bri zhing sgrub pa ni ji ltar shes par bya'o/_/dbang bskur ba ni gang zhe na/_rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can/_/sems dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan/_/dngos don ma lus rnams la dga'/_/stong pa nyid dga' 'dod
[\[62a.2\]]chags blo/_/srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa ste/_/srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa/_/zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi sems can la dbang bskur ba'i phyir/_rdo rje dang drug pa rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbang la sogs pa bskur bar bya'o/_/spobs pa'i mtshan dang blo 'chang ba/_/_
[\[62a.3\]]zla ba dang ni rin chen zla/_/mi 'jigs pa dang me 'od che/_/tshangs pa'i sgra dang snyan pa'i gsung /_/shes rab ma dang kun mnyam blo/_/rdo rje tshig dang blo spobs lnga/_/nam mkha' dbang dang ngag dbang phyug_/yon tan mchog dang gnas kyi mchog_/'phags pa'i 'od dang gsang ba'i
[\[62a.4\]]ri/_/gsang ba'i don dang rnga yi sgra/_/'dod spyod sbyin dang ye shes legs/_/zhi bas bzhugs dang ye shes gsung /_/shin tu gdugs dang rgyal mtshan chos/_/dri ma bral dang ye dbang blo/_/skal bral brjod dang gzi brjid 'od/_/drang srong che dang shes rab bsags/_/'khor
[\[62a.5\]]lo spong dang zla ba'i zhal/_/nyi zla'i 'od dang yon tan no/_/yon tan sdud dang bla med rtogs/_/bsod nams rtogs dang yul spangs pa/_/rigs su skyes dang rgyal po'i rigs/_/rnam grol gsung dang dbang phyug po/_/mchog tu ye shes ye shes dbyings/_/nam mkha' dang ni mchod 'os
[\[62a.6\]]dang /_/dpung tshogs bcas dang rin chen 'phro/_/zla ba'i sku dang bdud rtsi 'od/_/pad+ma'i 'od dang 'od stobs dang /_/seng ge'i gdong dang ye shes sku/_/don grub dpal dang ye shes nyi/_/don yod grub dang ston pa'i stobs/_/rin chen brtsegs dang sgra 'byin dang /_/pad+ma dpal dang nyon
[\[62a.7\]]mongs 'joms/_/ye shes sems dang bde 'gro dang /_/bde bral bzhad dang dri yi 'od/_/mtha' yas ston dang rin chen dang /_/zla ba phyed dang seng ge mchog_/bsam gtan 'od dang dpa' bar 'gro/_/rin chen yon tan rnam par rol/_/don ston pa dang dgra bcom grags/_/rin chen 'od
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]dang srid bcings grol/_/spyod yul spangs dang nam mkha'i mdzod/_/spobs pa grags dang rdo rje nor/_/de ltar bum pa rdzogs pa yis/_/gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir rol bas bar du bcad de/_las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes dbab po/_/de ji lta bu zhe na/_sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du
[\[62b.2\]]dkar/_/'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od/_/nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes/_/sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar/_/cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse/_/skra mchog mthon ka chen po can/_/nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal/_/sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan/_/zhes bya ba des
[\[62b.3\]]bstan to/_/de dbul nas byin gyis rlabs nas dbang bskur ba ni/_'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod cing /_/rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan/_/byang chub yan lag me tog spos/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho/_/zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs nas slob ma'i
[\[62b.4\]]kha ru sbyin pa'o/_/tshe dpag med dang nor bzang bkod/_/dbang phyug che dang yon tan 'od/_/ri bo'i grags dang bcu 'od ldan/_/gnyis dang bral dang klu yi stobs/_/shin tu grags dang rin chen zla/_/shugs can dang ni gsal bar byed/_/dga' ba'i dbang phyug gtsug phud
[\[62b.5\]]'od/_/'jigs pa bral dang yon tan snying /_/'o na de la brten nas ji ltar rtogs she na/_lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig_/yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa'o/_/de ltar gsang ba'i dbang bskur nas/_slob ma'i spyod yul du bya ba'i phyir/_sems can kun la shas cher
[\[62b.6\]]chags/_/nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med/_/sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug_/sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs/_/sems can kun gyi dbang don shes/_/sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa/_/de'i phyir na sems kyi dri ma dag par byed do/_/de ltar bstan na chags
[\[62b.7\]]pa dang bral bas sems kyi dri ma ji ltar dag_/de las gzhan ji ltar yod ce na/_de nyid kyang sems kyi rnam pa'o/_/de ltar yin pas na dge slong gis kyang mi 'gal zhes/_'jam dpal grags pa gsung ngo /_/'o na dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa ji ltar mi 'gal/_
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]mi 'gal te/_'jig rten pa'i 'dod pa'i chags sems lta bu ni ma yin te/_rnam par rig pa tsam gyis te/_kun rdzob sgyu ma'i blos 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi zhen pas ni ma yin no/_/dper na rmi lam gyi bud med la spyad kyang sad na dga'
[\[63a.2\]]ba dang ldan na bden mod/_mi ldan na ma yin no/_/de bas na stong pa nyid dang ldan na mi 'gal lo/_/de bas na smad pa'i ltung bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/dri ma med dang gzi brjid gzhi/_/gdung ba grags dang lha yi gnas/_/legs par mnyam dang sangs rgyas 'byung /_/de ltar dbang
[\[63a.3\]]gsum pa bstan nas bzhi pa ni/_phung po lnga don de nyid shes/_/rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba/_/nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas/_/nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa/_/zhes bya bas ston te/_zhal las shes par bya'o/_/de yang dad dang shes rab dang ldan bla ma brten/_/dbang gi
[\[63a.4\]]da nyid cho ga ji bzhin bstan par nus/_/zhes bya bas bstan to/_/'o na khyad par ci yod ce na/_yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton/_/dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang /_/zhes bya bas ni rang rgyal bstan te/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i dbang du byas nas dag par
[\[63a.5\]]'dod la/_bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can/_/shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang /_/de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig_/ces bya bas theg pa chung ngu'i sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog pa lam bzhi dang /_de khyad par shes pas bstan to/_/des nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i dbang
[\[63a.6\]]du byas nas bstan to/_/rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa/_/rnam pa sangs rgyas kun rig mchog_/ces bya ba shes bya stong pa nyid bcu drug dang /_rnam par thar pa bzhi'i bdag nyid de nyid de nyi shus ni/_theg pa chen po byang chub sems dpa'i lam mo/_/'o na khyad ci yod ce na/_de
[\[63a.7\]]rnams ni spang bya dang gnyen po'i bdag nyid du rtogs la lam 'di nyid ni lam du byed pas na khyad par du gyur pa'o/_/de'i phyir na/_sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba/_/sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med/_/gsang sngags las byung yi ge med/_/gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa/_/_
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]gsang sngags don kun bskyed pa'o/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa'i de kho na nyid bstan la/_thig le chen po yi ge med/_/stong pa chen po yi ge lnga/_/thig le stong pa yi ge drug_/rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med/_/ces bya bas ni lus kyi de kho na nyid bstan nas/_da ni sems kyi de kho na nyid
[\[63b.2\]]bstan pa ni/_bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can/_/yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das/_/zhes bya bas sems kyi bdag nyid bde ba rig pa'i gsal ba'i rang bzhin du bstan te/_spang bya dang gnyen po gnyis su med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin no/_/bsam gtan
[\[63b.3\]]bzhi yi rtse mo can/_/bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing /_/zhes bya ba ni dga' ba bzhi dang skad cig ma bzhi'i bdag nyid du gnas pas na de'i bdag nyid do/_/de nyid gang zhe na/_ting 'dzin rig dang rgyud rig pa/_/ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog_/longs spyod rdzogs
[\[63b.4\]]sku kun gyi rgyal/_/sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog_/ces bya bas te/_de las byung ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/yang na/_sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku/_/zhes pa nas/_theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas/_/zhes bya bas ni theg pa gzhan drang don 'di nges don du'o/_/nyon mongs
[\[63b.5\]]khams zhes bya ba nas/_bag chags bcas pa gtan du spangs/_/zhes bya bas dri ma dag na/_de ltar dbang dang man ngag rtogs pas dag pa'i zhes pa'o/_/snying rje che dang zhes pa nas/_skad cig thams cad bye brag phyed/_/ces bya bas thabs de la brten nas ye shes kyi sku de
[\[63b.6\]]kho na nyid kyi 'bras bu'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba/_/sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med/_/ces bya bas ni chos sku thob par bya ba dang bcas pa'i don bstan la/_gzugs brnyan ma lus zhes bya bas ni/_gzugs sku ste 'bras bu'o/_/de yan chad skye ba kun rdzob kyi bden
[\[63b.7\]]pa'o/_/dri med grags dang gzi brjid gtso/_/gdung ba grags dang dbang chen po/_/yon tan 'od dang 'od ma gdugs/_/bcu 'od ldan dang gnyid dang bral/_/klu yi stobs dang shin tu grags/_/rin chen zla dang shugs can dang /_/gsal bar byed dang dga' dbang phyug_/_

[\[64a.1\]]gtsug phud 'od dang 'jigs pa bral/_/yon tan snying dang dri med grags/_/gzi brjid bzhi dang gdung ba sel/_/lha yi gnas dang legs par mnyam/_/sangs rgyas 'byung dang rin chen sku/_/sangs rgyas stobs dang rin chen khyab/_/grong khyer mthong

[\[72a.1\]]pu'i ye shes gtsug tor chen po ni mnyam pa nyid/_tshig gi bdag ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes sku bya ba grub pa rang 'byung chos kyi dbyings te de rnams ro gcig pa'i rang bzhin ni 'jam dpal gyi rang gi ngo bo'o/_/de la me long lta bu'i ye shes la ci'i

[\[72b.1\]]dbye na zab pa dang rgya che ba ste/_mdor bsdus pa dang rgyas par dbye na rigs bsdus pa la mtshan brgya brgyad cu rtsa drug la sogs pa'o/_/don zab don ni rgya che zhing /_/zhes 'og nas 'byung ba'o/_/de gnyis la ci'i phyir zab pa dang rgya che zhe na/_sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan ni

[\[73a.1\]]rgyal po yul 'khor skyong gi bu stong las che dag phyag na rdo rje'o/_/chung dag kun dga' bo de gnyis kyi theg pa che chung gi sdud mkhan byed de/_kun dga' bo'i sprul pa tshangs pa yin te des theg pa chung ngu sdud/_phyag na rdo rje ni theg pa chen po nas nyan

[\[78a.1\]]shes rab ye shes kyi spyi gtsug ces pa'i mtshan no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dz+nyA na kA ya ni ye shes kyi sku ste las kyi rigs kyi'o/_/wA gI shwa ra ni ngag gi dbang phyug ste rin po che'i rigs so/_/a ra pa tsa na zhes pa'i mtshan can ni byang sems rdo

[\[78b.1\]]don gyi sgo nas don dam du lha thams cad kyi thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes su bzhugs pa rtags kyi sgo nas kun rdzob tu rigs bdun gyi gtso bo'i thugs ka na zhal phyag gi rnam pa can du gnas so/_/de'i rgyu ni a ste/_de yang don gyi sgo nas don dam gyi ye shes sems dpa' de skye med kyi

[\[80a.1\]]lha yi skad dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad/_/ces pa la sogs pa de skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la de'i skad kyis de dang des so sor gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/mchod pa chen po nas mar tshig rkang bcu gnyis 'jam dpal rigs lnga'i mtshan brjod

[\[80b.1\]]yin te/_'bras bu sangs rgyas gzhan don byed pa'i yon tan yod do/_/des na rin chen 'byung ldan mjug tu bstan pa ste go rims 'chol ba'i skyon ni med do/_/yang mtshan 'di rnams ni rigs lnga'i mtshan du 'jug pas 'jam dpal la ci phan zhe na/_'jam dpal ye shes sems

[\[81a.1\]]nas sems can so sor phye nas chos nyid so sor mkhyen so sor rtogs/_sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas rtags nub kyi rtsibs la ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can/_dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje'i skyil mo krung ngo /_/gnyis med gcig po nyid kyis

[\[81b.1\]]can gyi don byed pa ste/_thun mong du dug lnga cha mnyam pa'i don bye brag tu pad+ma 'dod chags can de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/man ngag sgom thabs su shes so/_/de la mchod pa chen po zhes pa gnyis kyis 'jam dpal rdo rje chen po'i 'od dpag tu med pa'i mtshan nyid du ston to/_/_
