[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]pas des tha mal gyi gnyen po byed pa'i phyir na phrin las te de la de skad bya/_mchod pa chen po'i tshig gnyis ni 'jam dpal snang ba'i bdag nyid rin chen 'byung ldan gyi mtshan nas bstod pa ste/_mchod pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyis mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho sprul nas sangs

[\[82a.4\]]'thad pa dang gnyis/_thabs shes rab kyi 'brel pa dang gsum/_phrin las kyi khyad par dang bzhi/_lam gyi khyad par dang lnga/_sgom thabs dang drug_/'bru'i bshad pa dang bdun no/_/de la 'di rnams kyi mtshan nyid don gyi sgo nas dang rtags kyi sgo nas so/_/don gyi

[\[82a.7\]]nyid/_snod kyi 'jig rten la lhag par chags pas stong pa chen po stong pa nyid/_stong pa de bzhi la shar gyi rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po/_chags pa legs pa bzhi bya/_rtags kyi mtshan nyid ni thun mong gi mtshan nyid sku mdog bzhugs tshul gdan pad+ma zla ba rang gi bdag po'i
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]dbu rgyan rin po che'i rgyan zhal phyag gi mtshan nyid do/_/khyad par ni mtshan phyag mtshan bzhugs pa'i go rims so/_/gtso 'khor gyi 'thad pa ni/_me long lta bu la rag las sa stong pa bzhi la rag las pa ste gong mas bsgres te shes par bya'o/_/thabs shes rab kyi 'brel pa ni rdo rje
[\[82b.2\]]sems dpa' la sogs pa shes rab zab pa byams pa la sogs pa thabs te rgya che ba de gnyis zung du 'brel lo/_/gsang ldan nas shes rab bcu drug zer ba'i phyir ro/_/phrin las kyi nges pa ni sangs rgyas mchod pa dang 'gro ba'i don bya'o/_/sems dpa' 'di rnams sangs
[\[82b.3\]]rgyas yin pa la sems dpar 'byung ba'i 'thad pa ni 'bras bu'i chos lngas bsdus pa'i lam mtshon pa ste/_de la las mtshon pa ni shar phyogs stong pa'i sems dpa'/_lho mtshan ma med pa/_nub gzhan don/_byang mchod pa'i sems dpa' zhes bya ste/_gang zag gcig
[\[82b.4\]]'tshang rgya ba'i thabs sam lam du stong pa nyid rtogs dgos/_rtogs nas kyang mtshan ma med pa goms dgos/_mtshan ma med kyang gzhan don ma byas na 'tshang mi rgya bas gzhan don bya dgos/_gzhan don la gtsor dkon mchog mchod dgos te/_de ni lam mtshon pa'o/_/_
[\[82b.5\]]sgom thabs man ngag tu shes so/_/de la rdo rje sems dpa' la khyod ni 'dod pa chen po zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir de skad bya zhe na/_rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje rnams ni stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i rtags yin la/_stong pa nyid ni don dam pa byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa yin la/_
[\[82b.6\]]sems bskyed kyi mtshan nyid 'dod cing 'dun pa ste/_sems bskyed pa ni gzhan don phyir/_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod/_/ces gsungs so/_/stong pa nyid de mngon sum du rtogs par 'dod pa'o/_/bde ba che zhes pa rdo rje rgyal po la de skad ces bya ste/_ci'i phyir de skad
[\[82b.7\]]bya zhe na/_rdo rje rgyal po ni lcags kyu mi gtong ba'i brda ste/_rdo rje sems dpas stong pa nyid rtogs te/_rgyal pos bsgoms 'dris par byas nas ma btang bas zag med kyi bde ba chen po skye bas de skad bya'o/_/dga' ba chen po ni rdo rje chags pa la bya ste/_de ci'i phyir de skad bya
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]zhe na/_rdo rje rgyal po'i bde ba goms pa de la dga' ba chags pas de skad bya'o/_/mgu ba ni 'bras bu mngon du gyur pa ste 'bras bu la mgu ba'o/_/de ni rdo rje legs pa ste mgu ba'i rtags ni se gol brdeb pa'o/_/gzugs chen lus kyang che ba ste/_/kha dog che zhing
[\[83a.2\]]lus bong che/_/zhes pa na mar tshig rkang bzhis lho phyogs kyi sems dpa' bzhi mtshon te/_de la yang so so'i mtshan nyid nas sgom thabs kyi bar du sbyar te/_so so'i mtshan nyid ni chos can mnyam pa nyid kyis bye brag tu byas pa'i chos nyid stong pa nyid bzhi ste/_gnyis med gcig po
[\[83a.3\]]de la dgag byas stong par gzung ba dang /_don dam du gzung ba dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs su gzung ba dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs su gzung ba rnams kyis stong pa'i stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bzhi
[\[83a.4\]]la lho phyogs kyi sems dpa' rdo rje rin chen/_rdo rje gzi brjid/_rdo rje rgyal mtshan/_rdo rje bzhad pa dang bzhi la bya ste/_rtags kyi mtshan nyid gong dang 'dra'o/_/gtso 'khor gyi 'thad pa dang /_thabs shes rab kyi 'brel pa dang /_phrin las kyi khyad par dang /_lam mtshon pa
[\[83a.5\]]dang /_sgom thabs rnams gong dang 'dra'o/_/de la rdo rje rin chen la gzugs che zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir de skad bya na/_de'i sgras sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du snang zhing gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/rdo rje rin chen la lus che zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_rin po che las
[\[83a.6\]]bskrun pa'i lus yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rdo rje gzi brjid la kha dog che zhing zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyi ma'i 'od kha dog drug gi rang bzhin du gnas pas de'i phyir na de skad bya'o/_/'od drug lha gzhan la med dam zhe na/_yon tan phyogs re la dgongs so/_/rdo rje nyi ma la
[\[83a.7\]]lus bong che zhes kyang bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa'i thabs sam sgom thabs kyi shes rab las byung ba'i lus yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rdo rje rgyal mtshan ming yang che zhing zhes bya ste/_ci zhe na/_grags pa chen po dang ldan pas thams cad du grags pa'i phyir ro/_/rdo rje rgyal
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]mtshan la yang rgya che ba zhes bya ste/_ci zhe na/_sbyin pa mthar phyin pa las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/rdo rje bzhad pa la/_dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin/_/zhes bya ste/_ci zhe na/_dkyil 'khor ni snying po len pa'i don gyis so/_/yangs pa ni 'jig rten thams cad du khyab pa'i phyir
[\[83b.2\]]de skad bya ste/_dkyil 'khor yang yin la yangs pa yang yin pas mtshan gcig tu bsdus pa'o/_/de yan chad kun la yang 'jam dpal snang ba mtha' yas zhes pa nas/_yangs pa'i bar du thams cad du mtshams sbyar te de dang de nas bod pa'o/_/shes rab ces pa'i
[\[83b.3\]]tshig rkang bzhis nub phyogs kyi sems dpa' bzhi'i mtshan brjod do/_/de yang so so'i mtshan nyid nas sgom thabs kyi bar du sbyar te/_so so'i mtshan nyid ni chos can so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis bye brag tu byas pa'i chos nyid stong pa nyid bzhi ste/_gnyis med gcig po la dgag
[\[83b.4\]]bya sems can gyi don byed pa mtha' dag dang ldan par 'dod pas sems can 'khor ba la thog ma dang tha ma yod par 'dod pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba phung po lhag bcas dang /_lhag med du 'dor bar 'dod pa dang /_chos thams cad rkyen gyis stong gi rang bzhin gyis mi stong par
[\[83b.5\]]'dod pa'i dgag bya de rnams dgag_/sgro 'dogs chod par 'dod pa'i stong pa de bzhi la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyi dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya/_de bzhi la 'jam dpal rdo rje chos dang
[\[83b.6\]]rnon po dang 'khor lo dang smra ba bzhi bya ste/_don gzugs med la gzugs su bya ste/_don dam gyi mtshan nyid do/_/rtags kyi mtshan nyid thun mong dang khyad par gong bzhin no/_/gtso 'khor gyi 'thad pa nas/_sgom thabs kyi bar du gong ma bzhin no/_/de la 'jam dpal rdo rje
[\[83b.7\]]chos la 'jam dpal/_shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba po/_/zhes pa bstod pa ste/_ci'i phyir na de skad bya zhe na/_so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi shes rab kyi mtshon 'chang ba dang /_rdo rje 'dzin pas chos nyid rtogs par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal rdo rje rnon po la/_nyon mongs
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]lcags kyu che ba'i mchog_/ces pa bstod pa ste/_ci'i phyir de skad byan/_gzhi bsgyur ba dang /_spong ba dang /_shes pa las 'dir shes rab kyi ye shes kyi lcags kyus nyon mongs pa chos nyid du shes pas gzhi shes pa ste/_chen po yang yin mchog kyang
[\[84a.2\]]yin pas de la de skad ces bya'o/_/'jam dpal 'khor lo la grags chen zhes bya/_khyod ni snyan grags chen po dang ldan no zhes bstod pa ste/_ci zhe na/_chos kyi 'khor los sems can smin par byed pa las phyir mi ldog pas de skad ces bya'o/_/'o na phyin ci log gi grags pa
[\[84a.3\]]gcig yin nam snyam na snyan pa'i grags pa ste/_dkyil 'khor rnam pa bdun gyi 'khor los sgyur bas/_kun la khyab pas grags chen no/_/'jam dpal smra ba la khyod ni snang ba chen po zhes bya/_gsal ba che zhes mtshan nyid kyi yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa ste/_de ci zhe na/_
[\[84a.4\]]chos kyi dbyings kyis 'jig rten gsum du khyab pa'i 'od dang ldan pas sems can gyi rgyud la snang bar byed pas de la de skad bya/_tshig gi nyes pa grwa zur chag pa dang /_mi gsal ba med pas de la gsal ba che zhes bya'o/_/mkhas pa zhes pa'i tshig rkang bzhis byang phyogs kyi sems
[\[84a.5\]]dpa' bzhi'i mtshan 'chad de/_de yang so so'i mtshan nyid nas/_sgom thabs kyi bar du sbyar te/_de la so so'i mtshan nyid ni chos can bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis bye brag tu byas pa'i chos nyid stong pa bzhi ste/_de yang gnyis med kyi ye shes gcig po la dgag bya sgro 'dogs
[\[84a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang /_dpe byad dngos po'i ngo bor 'dod pa dang /_stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dngos po'i ngo bor 'dod pa dang /_gang zag gi bdag dang /_chos kyi bdag dngos po'i ngo bor 'dod pa dang /_stong pa nyid med zer
[\[84a.7\]]ba rnams dgag_/sgro 'dogs de rnams chod pa la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid/_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bzhi de bzhi la 'jam dpal rdo rje las dang /_srung ba dang /_gnod sbyin dang khu tshur dang
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]bzhi bya ste/_gzugs med gzugs can byung ba ste/_stong pa nyid de bzhi'i sems dpa' de bzhir 'byung /_sems dpa' de bzhi stong pa de'i mtshan nyid 'dzin te/_de bzhin du lha thams cad la sbyar ro/_/rdo rje ni don gyi mtshan nyid do/_/rtags ni thun mong dang bye brag ste gong du
[\[84b.2\]]bstan to/_/gtso 'khor gyi 'thad pa nas sgom thabs kyi bar du gong ma bzhin no/_/de la 'jam dpal rdo rje las la khyod ni mkhas pa che zhes sgyu 'phrul 'chang pa po zer/_bstod de ci'i phyir de la de skad bya na/_rdo rje las sangs rgyas mchod pa/_sems can gyi bsod
[\[84b.3\]]nams skyed pa'i phrin las kyi bdag nyid pas de la mkhas pas de skad bya la/_sprul pa'i sgyu ma de 'chad pas de skad do/_/rdo rje srung ba la/_sgyu 'phrul chen po don grub pa/_/zhes bya/_ci zhe na/_mchod pa 'bul ba la spro bar byed pa'i phrin las kyi bdag nyid dang /_rnal 'byor
[\[84b.4\]]lam le lo can srung ba'o/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba des gzhan don 'grub pas de skad bya'o/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin la/_sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga'/_/zhes bya ste/_de ci zhe na/_rdo rje gnod sbyin ni dgra za ba ste/_srung ba'i phrin las kyi bdag nyid yin pas mchod pa'i bar
[\[84b.5\]]chad kyi bgegs zhi bar byed/_sgyu 'phrul mchod pa sprul/_bgegs zhi bar spro bas kyang cher dga' ba 'byung bas de skad bya'o/_/rdo rje khu tshur la/_sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can/_/zhes bstod de/_rdo rje khu tshur ni thams cad 'dus pa'i phrin las kyi bdag nyid de mchod pa
[\[84b.6\]]de rnams stong par ro gcig par byed la/_sgyu 'phrul ni mchod pa sprul/_chen po ni gcig tu bsdus pa/_mig 'phrul ni yod pa 'jig pa med pa sprul pas de skad bya'o/_/sbyin bdag ces pa nas mar tshig rkang bzhis sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi'i
[\[84b.7\]]mtshan bstan te/_mtshan can de'i mtshan nyid thun mong dang /_bye brag gi mtshan nyid bcu'am bcu gcig brtsi/_ci la zer na/_kun rdzob tu rtags kyi sgo nas skra dang /_nu ma dang /_mtshan mas khyad par du byas pa'i sgo la sogs pa nang gi bzhi la shar lho nas rim pa bzhin
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]du gnas te/_'di ni stobs kyi mtshan nyid de/_de rnams kyang sgeg mo ni byang chub kyi sems kyi mchod pa dang ldan pa'i nyams dang /_de bzhin du phreng ba ma rin po ches/_glu ma glus/_gar ma gar gyi sa mchod pa'i nyams dang ldan pa ste rtags so/_/don gyi
[\[85a.2\]]mtshan nyid ni 'dir sbyin pa la sogs pa bzhi btang ba las gong du 'bras bu 'di bzhir 'chad de/_yon tan dang ldan no/_/yang na gnyis med gcig po de nyid la mi mthun pa'i phyogs ser sna la sogs pa bzhi med pa'o/_/ngos nas sbyin pa la sogs pa bzhir de nyid la lha mo
[\[85a.3\]]lA s+ya ma la sogs pa bzhi bya/_bzhi po sbyin pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid mtshan 'dzin te/_de ni don gyi mtshan nyid do/_/'di rnams ni g.yog mo longs spyod kyi lha mo yin te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_bzang ngan du 'ong ba'i nad ka ni ya kir 'bras bu'i chos la mtshon pa rigs
[\[85a.4\]]lnga ste shin tu bzang /_de thob par byed pa'i lam byang chub sems dpa' ste/_longs spyod kyi lha mo rnams lam gyi grogs te/_tshul khrims la sogs pa mi brtsi na des na 'dis lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa gcig go ba'i brda'o/_/'di rnams la gsang ba'i lha mor
[\[85a.5\]]'dogs pa'i 'thad pa ni/_me tog la sogs pa phyi'i rdzas yin la/_'di ni zag med sems kyi mchod pa de gzhan gyis mi mthong ba'o/_/gtso 'khor gyi 'thad pa ni spyi 'khor sum brtsegs pa'i spyi 'khor yin te/_'di rnams gnyis de'i yon tan gyi bye brag yin te/_
[\[85a.6\]]sgos 'khor ni mi bskyod pa'i 'khor sgeg mo des bsgres te/_'di rnams yon tan bye brag pa yin pas spyi la brten/_des na rten sa dang brten pas khyad par du byas so/_/thabs shes rab kyi 'brel pa ni 'di la med de g.yog yin pa'i phyir ro/_/phrin las ni 'phags pa
[\[85a.7\]]mchod sems can pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod pa'o/_/sgom thabs gzhan du shes so/_/de yang rang dga' bar bsgom pa ni mchog gi dngos grub tu mi rung gi thun mong man chad sgom du rung ste/_slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba ni bsgrub pa'i lha rigs lnga sems dpa' bcu
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]drug ste nyi shu rtsa gcig las med par bzhed do/_/slob dpon kun dga' snying po ni me tog gang la phog pa di sgom du bzhed do/_/slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rje ni longs spyod kyi lha lugs la sgom pa snga ma bzhed do/_/de ltar lha mo bzhi po de la so so'i mtshan nyid gsang ba'i lha mor
[\[85b.2\]]'thad pa dang /_g.yog dang gtso 'khor gyi 'thad pa dang /_phrin las dang /_sgom thabs drug ce'o/_/de la lha mo 'di rnams ming 'og tu bcug nas mnan te/_yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod de/_sgeg mo la khyod kyis sbyin bdag mo chen mo yin no zhes bstod de/_ji ltar zhe na/_
[\[85b.3\]]dad pas sangs rgyas la sbyin pa dang /_thugs rjes sems can la sbyin pa gtong ba'i bdag mo khyod yin pa'i phyir khyod de bskyed par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can no/_/chen po ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o/_/yang sgeg mo la gtso bo zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_sbyin pa
[\[85b.4\]]rnam pa bzhi gtong ba'i phyir de la dbang bas de skad bya'o/_/yang phreng ba ma tshul khrims chen po zhes bya/_'chang ba'i mchog ces bya/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshul khrims gsum las 'dir lus ngag yid sdom pa ste/_de la 'khor gsum dag pa chen po 'chang ba ni de 'dzin
[\[85b.5\]]pas de skad bya'o/_/glu ma la/_khyod ni bzod chen brtan pa po/_/zhes bya ste/_ci zhe na/_bzod pa ni gsum las zab mo'i don la bzod cing sran tshugs pa ste/_de yang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa che'o/_/de'i don 'dzin pa ni 'chang ba brtan pa ni mi 'gyur ba'o/_/gar ma la brtson
[\[85b.6\]]'grus chen po zhes pa dang brtul ba yin zhes bya ste/_ci zhe na/_'jig rten 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la spro zhing de rdzogs par byed la 'khor gsum dag pas chen po'o/_/'jig rten dang 'das pa'i dkar po'i yon tan thams cad la brtson 'grus kyis rdzogs par byed pas
[\[85b.7\]]brtul ba'o/_/de'i phyir khyod la de skad bya'o/_/bsam gtan zhes pa'i tshig gnyis dang thabs che ba smon lam rnams kyis phyi'i lha mo bzhi'i mtshan bstan te/_shes rab dang go bsnur la bshad/_'di rnams la'ang drug 'bru bshad pa dang bdun te/_mtshan nyid kun rdzob tu
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]mtshan ma la sogs pa'i khyad par du byas pa'o/_/bskal bzang gi grwa bzhi'i shar lho nas rim pas spos me tog mar me dri chab bzhi/_de bzhis mchod pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i lha mo/_/shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan
[\[86a.2\]]can du byung la/_don gyi sgo nas 'dir de bzhis sangs rgyas mchod pas 'bras bu de bzhir shar te yon tan yar ldan no/_/de bzhi der byung ba de'i mtshan nyid 'dzin no/_/yang na gnyis med gcig po de la shes rab 'chang ba dang /_rnam par g.yeng ba dang /_thabs chung ba
[\[86a.3\]]dang /_log pa'i smon lam la sogs pa med de/_de bzhi'i gnyen por shes rab bsam gtan thabs yang dag pa'i smon lam rnams su 'byung la de bzhi la lha mo bzhi bya/_de bzhi de'i mtshan nyid 'dzin te don gyi mtshan nyid do/_/longs spyod kyi lha dang /_phyi'i lha mor
[\[86a.4\]]bzhag pa dang /_las med de longs spyod yin no/_/gtso 'khor dang /_sgom thabs rnams gong dang 'dra'o/_/de la lha mo d+hUp+pe ma la khyod ni/_shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba/_/zhes pa'i yon tan dang ldan no zhes bstod de/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyis chos
[\[86a.5\]]thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i lus can ni d+hUp+pe ma yin la/_shes rab de 'chang ba'i shes rab kyi gnyen po yin pas chen po yang yin no/_/de'i lus 'dzin pas na d+hUp+pe ma de la de skad bya'o/_/me tog ma la/_bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas/_/zhes bya ste/_de ci'i
[\[86a.6\]]phyir zhe na/_me tog ma khyod ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi ngo bo rnam g.yeng gi gnyen por 'dug ste/_chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gong ma de mi gtong ba'i phyir du puSh+pe ma la de skad bya'o/_/mar me ma la thabs che zhes bya ste/_ci zhe na/_thabs ma lus pas sems
[\[86a.7\]]can thams cad kyi bsam pa rdzogs par byed de/_thabs chung ba'i mi mthun pa med cing de'i gnyen po bas de la de skad ces bya'o/_/dri chab ma la bsam pa'i zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_bsam pa ni smon lam la bya la/_yang dag pa'i smon lam gyis phyin ci log gi smon pa'i
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]gnyen por gyur pa'i cha nas de skad bya'o/_/stobs po che la zhes bya ba/_ye shes rgya mtsho zhes pa sgo ba bzhi'i mtshan ston te/_'di rnams mtshan nyid ni lcags kyu la sogs pa sgo ba bzhi thun mong dang /_bye brag gi sgo nas kun rdzob ste rtags kyi mtshan nyid do/_/don gyi mtshan nyid ni/_
[\[86b.2\]]'dir dad pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang bzhi rnams bsgoms pas gong du tshogs lam/_sbyor lam/_mthong lam/_bsgom lam bzhi'i yon tan yar ldan du 'byung /_de la sgo ba bzhi 'byung /_de'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'am/_yang na
[\[86b.3\]]sbyor lam gyi drod rtse mo gnyis la dad pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_de rnams bsgoms pas sems ma dad pa/_le lo/_/mi dran pa/_rnam g.yeng ba'i phyogs su 'dug la/_des dad pa/_brtson 'grus/_dran pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyi gnyen po bzhi kha
[\[86b.4\]]drag par 'dug pas de rnams kyi dus na ni dbang po bzhi zhes bya la/_bzod pa dang chos mchog gi dus na ma dad pa la sogs pa'i mi mthun pa med de/_gnyen po dad pa la sogs pa bzhi po sha stag tu 'dug pas dad pa la sogs pa stobs bzhi'o/_/de bzhi la sgo bzhi bya ste/_
[\[86b.5\]]mtshan gnyis las med kyang don bzhi char tshang ste/_stobs dang /_dad pa tshogs lam gyi ye shes sgo ba lcags kyu/_de bzhin du brtson 'grus sbyor lam gyi ye shes sgo ba zhags pa/_dran pa mthong lam gyi ye shes sgo ba lcags sgrog ting nge 'dzin stobs/_bsgom lam
[\[86b.6\]]gyi ye shes/_sgo ba ni dril bu zhes bya'o/_/rdo rje ni don gyi mtshan nyid do/_/gtso 'khor gyi 'thad pa nas sgom thabs kyi bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/byams chen rang bzhin zhes pa nas mar tshig rkang drug gis thabs kyi bskal bzang gi sems dpa'i mtshan te/_'di rnams kyi mtshan
[\[86b.7\]]nyid ni rtags kyi mtshan nyid kun rdzob kyi sgo nas ni thun mong khyad par gnyis te/_de la mtshan ni phyag mtshan rang rang bdag pos dbu brgyan/_sku mdog ni khyad par ro/_/bzhugs tshul gdan rgyan phrin las rnams thun mong ste/_phyogs kyi sku mdog dang /_phyogs kyi phyag mtshan
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]sngon po dang /_rdo rje la sogs pa'o/_/don gyi mtshan nyid ni gnyis med kyi ye shes gcig la ldog pa'i bye brag gis ye shes lnga/_de la ldog pa'i bye brag gis stong pa bcu drug_/de la shes rab kyi sems dpa' bcu drug bya la/_bskal bzang 'di
[\[87a.2\]]rnams ni stong pa bcu drug la dmigs pa'i rig pa ste/_nang stong pa nyid rig pa nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rig pa'i bar du bcu drug la thabs kyi sems dpa' bcu drug gzhag_/rig pa de rnams der byung ste/_de nyid de'i mtshan nyid 'dzin de ni don dam gyi
[\[87a.3\]]mtshan nyid do/_/gtso 'khor gyi 'thad pa dang /_lam brtson pa dang /_phrin las kyi khyad par dang /_sgom thabs rnams gong ma bzhin no/_/thabs shes rab kyi 'brel pa ni/_shes rab kyi sems dpa' bcu drug la/_thad kha thad khar dmigs shing 'brel lo/_/byams
[\[87a.4\]]chen zhes pa nas mar sems can bde ba la dgod pa'o/_/rang bzhin ni de'i dus su skye med du rtogs shing dmigs pa'o/_/dpag tu med pa ni skye med du dmigs shing 'jig rten thams cad la bu gcig pa ltar byams pa rgyun mi gcod de des na byams pa la de skad bya'o/_/snying rje
[\[87a.5\]]chen po zhes pa 'jam dpal ni mi dmigs pa'i thabs thugs rje chen pos sems can gyi don byed pas rgya che ba dang /_blo'i mchog ces pa skye med kyi blos gnyis med du rtogs pa ste/_khyod ni zab pa dang rgya che ba'i mtshan nyid can no zhes bstod do/_/shes rab chen po blo chen ldan/_/_
[\[87a.6\]]zhes pa spos kyi glang po la de skad bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyod ni chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i shes rab kyi bdag nyid la de skad bya la/_de'i khyod ni blo chen po dang ldan pa zhes kyang bstod do/_/khyod ni mkhas pa chen po zhes bya ste/_ci zhe na/_dbang po rab 'bring
[\[87a.7\]]tha ma'i sgo nas sems can 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas pas de skad bya la/_nyon mongs pa bag la nyal dang mthun pa'i chos ston pas thabs che ba zhes kyang bstod do/_/bzang skyong la/_rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs dang ldan/_/zhes bstod de/_rkang mtheb sen mos tshangs pa'i
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]g.yul sa gnon pa la sogs pa'i stobs sam rdzu 'phrul de mnga' ba'i phyir de skad bya'o/_/blo gros chen po la mgyogs pa chen po zhes bya ste/_sangs rgyas mchod pa dang srid zhu'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams du mar bskyod pa'i phyir/_shugs chen zhes bya zhe na/_ye shes kyi
[\[87b.2\]]shugs drag pos 'gro ba'i phyir de skad bya'o/_/blo gros mi zad pa la rdzu 'phrul chen po zhes bstod de/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/khyod ni cher grags pa zhes kyang
[\[87b.3\]]bya ste/_sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/spobs pa brtsegs pa la khyod ni/_stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po/_/zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa la sogs pa stobs bcu nyan
[\[87b.4\]]thos la sogs pa zil gyis gnon phyir de skad bya'o/_/mthu chen thob la/_srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms/_/zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_srid pa nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga 'jig dka' bas brag ri dang 'dra ste/_yang dag pa'i ye shes thob nas 'joms pa ste/_khyod
[\[87b.5\]]ni de dang ldan pa'i phyir de skad ces brjod do/_/ngan song kun 'dren la/_mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang /_/zhes bstod de/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyod ni kun du bzang po'i ye shes kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa ste/_de yang gzung 'dzin gyis mi phyed pas sra ba'i lus dang ldan pas na mkhregs
[\[87b.6\]]zhes brjod de/_mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros la drag po chen po zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyod ni gdul dka' ba'i gdul bya la khro bor sprul pa'i phyir de skad bya la/_bcos pa'i drag shul gyis 'dul ba'i phyir ro/_/dra ba can gyi 'od/_
[\[87b.7\]]'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po/_/zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_de yang 'jigs chen ni lha gsum ste/_tshangs pas sa bla ma hA de bas sa steng khyab 'jug gis sa 'og 'jigs te/_khyod ni de gsum yang 'jigs par byed pa po yin pa'i phyir de skad brjod do/_/zla
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]'od gzhon nu la mgon po zhes bstod de/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_gsang sngags kyi theg pa ni theg pa'i mchog ste/_sems can skyob pa'i phyir de skad bya la/_de la ni rigs mchog chen po zhes kyang bya ste/_d+ha ra zhes pa'i sgra rigs bzung ba dang 'chang ba
[\[88a.2\]]dang 'dzin pa la 'jug ste/_'dir ni tshig don sngags phyag rgya gzhung bzhis sems can skyong ba'i phyir/_mchog dang chen po yang yin pas de skad brjod do/_/'od dpag med la bla ma zhes bstod de/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyod ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'am dbang po
[\[88a.3\]]rab 'bring dang sbyar nas/_nyon mongs pa bag la nyal dang ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du shes nas/_de dang de'i lam nye bar ston pa'i phyir de skad bya la/_de yang skye med kyi rtog pa dang mi 'bral bas gsang sngags che ba'i mchog ces bya'o/_/nam mkha' mdzod la/_theg
[\[88a.4\]]pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/_/zhes bstod de/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyod ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i lam la gnas la tshul ni bgrod pa dang /_bzhon pa dang /_lam de la gnas pa yin pa'i phyir de skad brjod do/_/sgrib pa sel ba la/_theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi
[\[88a.5\]]mchog_/ces bstod de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gsang sngags kyi theg pa ni theg pa'i mchog ste/_skye med kyi don zab mo rtogs pas 'khor 'das mi phyed pa'i phyir te/_gzhi shes pas mchog go/_/de lta bu'i don ni 'jam dpal sgrib pa sel ba nyid yin no zhes yon
[\[88a.6\]]tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa'o/_/de lta bu khyod lags so zhes kun la sbyar ro/_/de la 'dir theg pa zer nas theg pa'i rnam pa gzhan cig kyang gzhag ste/_theg pa'i ngo bo ni shes rab kyi rtog pa'i khyad par dang /_thugs rjes gzhan don byed mi byed dang sbyar ro/_/byed pa ni
[\[88a.7\]]rgyu'i rang bzhin gyi theg pa dang rten nam thabs kyi rang bzhin de/_bskyed rim 'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang rdzogs rim 'das pa'o/_/thob par bya ba dang dmigs pa'i yul de 'bras bu'o/_/yang rgyu'am/_gzhi/_lam/_'bras bu yang sbyar ro/_/sgra 'jug pa'i
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]rgyu mtshan ni 'dis 'dod/_'dir 'dod pas theg pa'o/_/chen po la dbye na phan pa chen po ster bas che ste/_gang zhe na/_dmigs pa/_bsgrub pa/_ye shes/_brtson 'grus/_thabs/_yang dag par bsgrub pa/_phrin las che zhe'o/_/gzhan don dang rang don thams cad 'dir
[\[88b.2\]]man ngag gi sbyar ro/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo nas byang chub kyi sems rdo rje mngon par brjod pa'am spros pa'i le'u ste tshig bcu bzhi pa'i le'u lnga pa rdzogs so//_//sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che/_/zhes pa de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi sgo
[\[88b.3\]]nas 'jam dpal ye shes kyi sku la bstod pa ston te/_de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi go ba ni mi rtog pa'i ngang du cog bzhag la bya ste/_gnyis med kyi ye shes gcig po de la ldog pa'i bye brag gis ye shes lnga bya ste/_chos kyi dbyings la gsal la mi rtog pa'i ngos nas chos kyi
[\[88b.4\]]dbyings kyi me long lta bu la bya ste/_chos can gzugs brnyan sna tshogs shar yang shar ro snyam pa'i rtog pa med/_med kyang gzugs brnyan 'char ba/_rgyun mi 'chad pas gsal la mi rtog pas/_de la rgyun mi 'chad pas mi bskyod par byas so/_/de bzhin du
[\[88b.5\]]mi rtog pa de'i ngang du bdag dang sems can chos rnams mnyam pas chos kyi dbyings kyi mnyam nyid de la rin chen 'byung ldan bya/_mi rtog pa'i ye shes de gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du chos can so sor phye ba'i chos nyid so sor mkhyen so sor rtog pa de la snang ba mtha'
[\[88b.6\]]yas bya/_mi rtog pa de la gzhan don lhun grub tu gnas/_bya ba grub pa de la don grub gnas/_de bzhin du de'i dgag bya dngos po dang mtshan ma log pa'i smon pa phyin ci log gi mngon par 'du byed pa bzhi bkag_/rnam thar bzhi la yum bzhi byas/_de'i chos can ye shes lnga la nang
[\[88b.7\]]'dzin pa'i sems kyis stong pas na stong pa nyid ma grub par 'dod kyi bar du dgag bya bcu drug bkag_/stong pa bcu drug_/de la shes rab kyi sems dpa' bcu drug byas/_de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes de la mi mthun pa'i phyogs ser sna la sogs pa med pa'i sgo nas
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]sbyin pa la sogs pa brgyad/_de la sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad byas/_ma dad pa la sogs pa bzhi med pas stobs bzhi de la sgo bzhi byas/_de'i nang stong pa la sogs pa bcu drug rig pa'i rig pa la thabs kyi sems dpa' bcu drug bya ste/_chos kyi
[\[89a.2\]]dbyings kyi ye shes la ldog pa'i bye brag gis lha lnga bcu rtsa gnyis su gzhag go/_/de rnams kyang bsdu na chos kyi dbyings de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sum brtseg bya'o/_/de la sangs rgyas zhes pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste/_gtsang ma'i gnas ni nyams dga' bar/_/_
[\[89a.3\]]yang dag sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas/_/sprul pa po ni 'dir sangs rgyas/_/zhes 'byung ste/_'og min du sangs rgyas pa de la de skad bya'o/_/rnam par snang mdzad chen po ni chos sku la bya ste/_sems can kun gyi shes pa dang /_/chos dbyings rdo rje chen po dang /_/de bzhin
[\[89a.4\]]gshegs pa'i snying po gsum/_/thog ma tha ma med par bshad/_/ces 'byung ste/_saM gra ha nas gsungs pa'i rnam snang chen po srid pa snod bcud dang zhi ba snod bcud kyis bsdus pa thams cad la khyab pa'i bdag nyid de la de skad bya'o/_/thub pa chen po ni sprul pa'i sku
[\[89a.5\]]la bya ste/_shAkya'i rigs thub pa'am/_sku gsung thugs gsum dang gnas ngan len thub pas de skad bya'o/_/de gsum mnyam par gzhag pas chen po yang yin no/_/thub chen ldan pa'i sngags kyi lugs la rig 'dzin yod pa bzhin du mu stegs la drang srong
[\[89a.6\]]gnas 'jog dang /_grog mkhar dang /_mig dmar la sogs pa yod de/_de yang rje btsun nyid yin pas de skad bya ste/_de bas rje btsun 'jam dpal de la ni khyod ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa lags so zhes tshogs kyis bstod pa'o/_/gsang sngags tshul chen ni rdo rje
[\[89a.7\]]theg pa chen po'i tshul lam rang bzhin te/_lam de la byung ba khyod ni de skad bya ba'i mtshan nyid can lags so zhes bstod pa'o/_/gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can/_/zhes pa 'bras bu thob nas de'i bdag nyid du gyur la khyod lags so zhe'o/_/pha rol phyin bcu thob
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]pa ste/_/zhes pa 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam gzhag bcu ni/_spyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa dang /_sngags kyi theg pa'i khyad la paN+Di ta grub mtha' mi mthun pa mang ste/_kha cig ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam stegs tsam las sangs rgyas kyi mthong lam mi skyed de/_

[\[89b.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas ni da dung du slob pa'i lam par mthong zer ba dang /_yang sangs rgyas la rang rgyud pa'i sangs rgyas bzang ngan gnyis med de/_grub mtha' de ltar 'dod zer ba dang /_sangs rgyas rang rgyud pa rang la kha sbyor la sogs pa longs spyod che chung bzang ngan yod
[\[89b.4\]]zer ba dang /_yang mthong lam skye ba la lam nye ring yod de des na khyad par med zer ba'i lugs mang po yod do/_/'dir ni rje btsun 'jam dpal de gsang sngags kyi lam 'bras bu dang bcas par snang la pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas par snang bas rje
[\[89b.5\]]btsun khyod ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa'o/_/de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbye ba ni bcu'o/_/de ltar yang byams pa'i chos dbus mtha' las/_sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/_/zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so/_/_
[\[89b.6\]]ming ni sbyin pa nas ye shes kyi bar du bcu'o/_/zang zing dang chos dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa gsum pa bcur 'gyur ro/_/bsdu ba ni drug tu 'dus te/_bzhi shes rab kyi bye brag gis te drug kyang shes rab tu 'dus so/_/gsum gsum du dbye ba de yang bsod

[\[90a.1\]]las 'das pa'i skam sar phyin pa'o/_/de lta bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob pa ni 'jam dpal khyod lags so zhes bstod pa'o/_/pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/_/zhes pa rje btsun de la brten/_de'i ngo bor 'dug pa ste/_rten dang brten pa'i ngo bo pha
[\[90a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa bcu dag pa ste zhes pa shes rab med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dgu ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob ste/_des gzung ba'i 'khor gsum stong pa nyid du dag pa de nyid rje btsun no/_/pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul/_/zhes pa 'jig rten pa mos pa spyod pa bcu char sa dang po

[\[90a.5\]]'di ni slob pa'i sa bcu'o/_/ngo bo ni dngos gzhi dang rjes thob gnyis zhes bya ste/_sa dang po nas sa bcu'i bar du dngos po rang gi mtshan nyid la khyad med rjes thob mthu che chung la khyad yod de/_sa dang po mthong lam pa dang gnyis pa la chos nyid mthong ba la khyad med de/_de so
[\[90a.6\]]so skye bo mos pa tsam dang ni khyad yod de/_so so skye bo mos pa tsam sa rnams kyi sngon du myong so so skye bos nges shes ma skyes/_des 'khor bar 'khor/_'o na sa rnams chos nyid mngon du myong ba la khyad med na dang po nas sa bcu'i bar du khyad ci ste zhe na/_rjes thob mthu

[\[90b.1\]]thung /_gong ma gong ma yun ring ste/_snye ma dang ljang bu yang dang po pas phyis mthu dang nus pa che ba bzhin no/_/de ltar yang pha rol tu phyin pa kun rdzogs shing zhe'o/_/de lta bu'i sa bcu gnas pa de yang rje btsun nyid do/_/bcu gcig kun du 'od ni sa'i 'bras bu ste dbang phyug

[\[90b.5\]]dang /_rgyu ru 'dzin pa dang /_za bar dang /_byed pa po dang /_rang dbang dang /_bdag por dang /_rtag par dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_ma grol ba dang /_grol bar 'dzin pa ste/_rje btsun nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs bdag 'dzin bcur yang snang bas

[\[91a.1\]]nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la ltos na/_rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob dka' ba des rje btsun gyis 'thob pa'i phyir de la de skad bya'o/_/stobs bcu ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa la sogs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang rje btsun
[\[91a.2\]]ldan la khyab bdag ni nam mkha' bzhin te/_yon tan yongs la khyab pa dang /_rtsis las 'das pa'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid rje btsun no/_/kun gyis ni 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byed pa 'jam dpal lo/_/rnam bcu dbang ldan zhes pa tshe la dbang ba dang /_las dang /_yo byad
[\[91a.3\]]dang /_mos pa dang /_smon lam dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang /_skye ba dang /_chos dang /_sems dang /_ye shes la dbang ba dang /_bcu ni rnam bcu'o/_/de bcu dang ldan zhing de bcu la dbang thob pas gar yang bsgyur ba'i chos la mnga' brnyes pas chen po'o/_/thog ma zhes pa skye
[\[91a.4\]]ba med pa la spro ba ni phung po dang khams rnams rang gi ngo bos stong pas de med de nyid many+dzu'o/_/de bzhin nyid ni mi 'gyur ba/_'jam dpal de'i bdag nyid du gnas la de la glo bur gyi dri ma med pas dag pa'o/_/bden par smra zhes pa sdug bsngal la sogs pa rten 'brel
[\[91a.5\]]gyi rkyen gyis sna tshogs su snang ste rgyu rkyen du snang ba'i dus nyid ni stong par go/_/rkyen ni ngo bos ma grub rtag chad tsam du go/_/des stong pa go ba/_des rkyen dbang du ma song /_sna tshogs kyis rgya che ba go/_/de gnyis su med pa ni dngos po ma lus pa de bden na ni de'i don la ma yengs
[\[91a.6\]]par grol lo/_/de yang 'jam dpal lo/_/mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las/_'di la bsal ba ci yang med/_/gzhag par bya ba cung zad med/_/yang dag nyid la yang dag lta/_/yang dag mthong nas rnam par grol/_/zhes 'byung ste/_rje btsun de ni don de smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur

[\[91b.1\]]ces pa phyin ci log gi rtsa ba'i gzhi med pa ste many+dzu'o/_/de dang dbyer med pa'i phyir mtha' de'i rang bzhin du rje btsun gnas so zhe'o/_/tshigs bcad dang slob ma la bshad na de bzhin nyid bdag ni gnyug ma ma bcos pa dag pa'i 'bras bu ste/_sangs rgyas kyi dag pa rang ni
[\[91b.2\]]dri ma dang bcas la/_sangs rgyas dri ma med de/_dri med de spyan drangs nas rang gi ma dag pa dag par byin gyis rlob ste/_rang byin gyis rlob pa'i rdzogs rim dang sbyar ro/_/de la seng ge'i sgra zhes pa ni/_dper na seng ge'i sgras ri dwags la sogs pa zil gyis gnon pa bzhin du
[\[91b.3\]]mtshan ma med pas bdag med/_mi mthun pa dang bral bas bdag med/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pas bdag med/_de gsum ni seng ge'i sgra dang 'dra ste/_bdag med las 'das pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i mu stegs ngan pa/_'jigs/_klad/_'gems/_zil gyis gnon zhe'o/_/_
[\[91b.4\]]de yang rje btsun no/_/kun 'gro zhes pa reg pa dang tshor ba la sogs pa rnams ni kun du 'gro zhes te/_khams thams cad du 'gro/_/sems can thams cad du 'gro ste de yang rje btsun no/_/yang na sprul sku ni kun du 'gro ste/_khyab par 'gro mi 'gag par 'gro'o/_/don yod
[\[91b.5\]]stobs zhes pa bcings pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid ltar mgyogs/_/zhes gsungs te/_skad cig ma gcig la gzhal du med pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro ste/_des ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa mtshan so drug go/_/yang rje btsun de la rgyal
[\[91b.6\]]ba ces bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nas bod do/_/nyon mongs pa las rgyal lo/_/shes bya thams cad kyis rnam par rgyal lo/_/de gnyis dgra las rgyal ba gcig khyod lags so zhes bstod pa'o/_/'khor los sgyur ba zhes pa la/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor los sgyur
[\[91b.7\]]ba ni/_rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs drug gi 'khor los sgyur ba drug go/_/'jig rten pa'i gser dngul zangs lcags 'khor lo can/_de dag gling gcig dang /_gling gnyis dang /_gsum dang bzhi la mas rim bzhin/_/phas bsu rang 'gro g.yul bshams dang /_/_
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]mtshon brtsams pas rgyal gnod pa med/_/ces gsungs te/_de yang rje btsun no/_/de nyid kyi stobs dang ldan te/_bdud bzhi'i yan lag 'joms/_de yang rje btsun khyed lags so zhe'o/_/tshogs ni nyan thos rnams la 'tsham pa'i chos phyin ci ma
[\[92a.2\]]log pa ston pas rje btsun ni slob dpon no/_/tshogs ni rang rgyal rnams kyi gtso bos de la de skad bya'o/_/tshogs ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i rje'o/_/tshogs ni sangs rgyas de'i bdag po de'o/_/sangs rgyas la bdag po ci dgos she na/_de ni sangs rgyas byang chub
[\[92a.3\]]sems kyi bdag nyid yin pas de skad bya'o/_/mthu chen zhes pa ste mthu ni nus pa ste/_chen po yang de nyid pas nus pa des zab mo'i chos ma nyams par byed ces sras su byed nor du 'dzin pa'o/_/tshul ni thabs chen po'i bdag nyid de zab mo'i chos la gzhan gyis 'phrog pa ni
[\[92a.4\]]drin mnos pas mi 'jigs pa yang many+dzu'o/_/rje btsun de la tshig rje la sogs pa'i bstod pa ste/_tshig rje ni don so so yang dag par rig pa ste ming thams cad do/_/de bzhin du tshig bdag ni nges pa'i tshig rig pa ste/_gzugs su rung ba'i phyir gzugs zhes pa lta bu'o/_/smra
[\[92a.5\]]mkhas ni chos rig pa thob ste/_thams cad skye med du rtogs pa'o/_/tshig la dbang ba ni spobs pa rig pa ste ji lta ba'i lan dus su lon pa'o/_/tshig mtha' yas pa ni sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi skad shes pa'o/_/tshig bden bden par smra ba ste/_/zhes pa ni sangs
[\[92a.6\]]rgyas rnams kyi chos bstan pa/_bden pa gnyis la yang dag brten/_/zhes te kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa'i tshig la brten nas gzhan la bden pa de gnyis kyi chos ston pa ste/_de yang don dam pa gsum don dam pa ni de bzhin nyid de/_stong pa nyid bsgrub pa don dam
[\[92a.7\]]pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes te/_gnyis med thob par bya ba'i don dam pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu ste/_byang chub rnam gsum mtha' las 'das/_/don dang thob dang bsgrub pa dang /_/don dam rnam pa gsum du 'dod/_/ce'o/_/kun rdzob kyang gsum ste/_brtags pa'i kun
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]rdzob ni kun brtags pa'o/_/shes pa'i kun rdzob ni log shes thams cad do/_/brjod pa'i kun rdzob ni sgra dang brjod pas don dam pa ston par byed pa'o/_/de yang dbus mtha' las/_brtags pa dang ni shes pa dang /_/de bzhin brjod pa rgya che yin/_/zhe'o/_/de lta bu'i
[\[92b.2\]]don gzhan la smra ba yang rje btsun no/_/bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po/_/zhes pa ni kun 'byung ni rgyu/_sdug bsngal ni 'bras bu ste 'khor ba'i rgyu 'bras dang /_lam ni rgyu/_'gog pa ni 'bras bu ste/_myang 'das rgyu 'bras de gzhan la ston pa yang rje btsun khyod lags so zhe'o/_/_
[\[92b.3\]]phyir mi ldog pa ni rje btsun sa brgyad la dbang thob pa dman pa'i byang chub ste/_nyan thos rang rgyal du mi ldog go/_/phyir mi 'ong ni nyon mongs pa che 'bring dgu bsgoms pa'i ye shes dgus spangs pas mthong lam thob pa ste 'khor bar mi 'ong ba'o/_/de yang bzod thob ngan
[\[92b.4\]]song lhung mi srid/_/rtse mor phyin nas rtsa mi nyams/_/zhe'o/_/'dren pa rang rgyal tshogs na spyod pa ste/_rma bya dang ne tso ltar khyus lding ba bse ru ni gcig par gnas pa'i tshul de yang rje btsun khyod nyid do zhe'o/_/nges 'byung sna tshogs las byung ba/_/zhes pa ni nyan thos la
[\[92b.5\]]sogs pa'i nges 'byung gang dang gang gis 'dul ba de'i gzugs cha sna tshogs su 'byung ngo /_/phyir mi ldog zer ba dang 'gal lo zhe na/_'dul dbang la dgongs te skyon ni med do/_/'byung ba chen po zhes pa ni/_b+hu ta ko ta na zhes pa'i sgra 'byung ba chen po ni bzhi'o/_/rgyu
[\[92b.6\]]ni gnyis med kyi ye shes su gcig ste de yang rje btsun no/_/dge slong zhes pa bzhi ste/_slob pa'i don byed kyi dge slong ni nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum mam/_sum brgya drug cu'i khrims dang ldan pa'o/_/khas len pa ni med par khas len pa'o/_/ming gi dge slong ni rtogs
[\[92b.7\]]pa'o/_/de yang rje btsun no/_/dgra bcom pa ni nyon mongs pa'i dgra'o/_/zag pa zad ni dug gsum dang rtsa ba bzhi zad pa yang rje btsun no/_/'dod chags bral ba ni mthong spang gi sgo nas so/_/dbang po thul ni gzugs sdu gu la sogs pa la chags na 'ching ba la many+dzus
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]de rang stong par mkhyen pas dbang po rangs po rang lag pas thul lo zhe'o/_/bde ba rnyed pa ni lus kyi las so/_/'jigs pa med pa ni ngag gi las te skyon med pa'o/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi me long lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rdo rje'i rigs
[\[93a.2\]]mtshan so drug go/_/bsil bar gyur pa rnyog pa med/_/ces pa ni yid 'khrug pa med pas zhe mi sdang ste/_de ltar lus ngag yid gsum skyon med pas/_de la khyod ni rnyog pa med pa lags so zhes bstod pa'o/_/rig pa ni lhag pa'i shes rab mig dang 'dra bas/_dngos
[\[93a.3\]]po'i gnas lugs kyi yang dag pa'i lta ba mngon sum dang 'dra bar rtogs pa'o/_/rkang pa ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi rkang pa lta ba'i grogs te/_dam tshig dang ldan pa'i rten gyi gang zag mtshan no/_/lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rkang pa bskyed rdzogs gnyis lam du bya bar mtshon/_
[\[93a.4\]]de ltar rten gyi gang zag khyad par can gcig gis lam bskyed rdzogs gnyis la brten nas 'bras bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/bde gshegs zhes gsungs te/_spangs pa mthar thug pa ni/_tsha ba'i nad sbyangs pa dang 'dra la/_ye shes mthar thug pa ni bum pa gang ba dang
[\[93a.5\]]'dra ba de las bogs gdon du med pa thob po zhe'o/_/de yang de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs pa dang /_'gro ba dang gsungs pas de skad bya'o/_/'jig rten rigs ni nyan thos kyi skal ba dang ldan pa nas sngags kyi theg pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa'i bar du rig pa'o/_/mchog ni gang
[\[93a.6\]]'dzom pa'i lam de dgod pa'o/_/gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/bdag gir mi 'dzin zhes pa ni rig pa'i rgyas bshad de/_lhag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa'i lta ba de ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na/_bdag tu 'dzin pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ni ngar 'dzin pa ste/_
[\[93a.7\]]ma bkag par gzung 'dzin gnyis med par bgyis pa'o/_/bden pa gnyis ni don dam pa dang kun rdzob ste/_kun rdzob sna tshogs su snang tsam na de nyid btsal na cir mi rnyed kyang kun rdzob brtags tshod tsam rgyun mi 'chad do/_/tshul ni mtshan nyid la de gnyis su med de/_de ltar
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]rtogs par gyis she na/_/de ltar lhag pa'i shes rab dang ldan yang /_tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rkang pa med na gang du yang mi phyin la/_spyod lam ting nge 'dzin dang /_tshul khrims la'ang lta ba ste/_shes rab kyi mig med na long ba dang 'dra bas lta spyod zung du 'brel
[\[93b.2\]]dgos la ma 'brel na phan yon ni med do/_/'khor ba'i zhes pa nyon mongs pa lnga phung thams cad du khrid pa ste/_dngos po'i mtha' pha rol tu phyin pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste dngos med kyi mtha'o/_/son pa ni gnyis med kyi 'bras bu thob pa ste/_de yang lta spyod
[\[93b.3\]]lam gyi bya ba thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par byas pas/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i skam sa ste bde ba chen po'i gnas la gnas so zhe'o/_/de yang slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rje'i 'grel pas 'di ltar dbu ma ji lta bar bshad/_'khor ba zhes pa/_kun rdzob tu 'khor ba dang /_
[\[93b.4\]]pha rol zhes pa kun rdzob tu mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su snang la/_don dam par ni gnyis gang du yang mi 'byed pa ni mthar phyin pa'am son pa ste/_de ltar yang /_mya ngan las 'das de nyid gang /_/'khor ba'i mtha' yang de nyid do/_/zhe'o/_/de ltar rtogs na ye shes
[\[93b.5\]]'ba' zhig ces pa/_tha mal gyi shes pa ci skyes pa thams cad ye shes kyi bde bar 'byung ba'am/_yang na de las thams cad 'byung ngo zhe'o/_/de yang chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i shes rab ni mtshon rnon po dang 'dra ste nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod cing
[\[93b.6\]]'joms so/_/de rnams kyis ni lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i chos gcig bstan to/_/dam chos zhes pa chos kyi rnam gzhag gi nges tshig ni dam pa sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro/_/dbye na 'jig rten pa'i chos dang 'das pa'i chos so/_/_
[\[93b.7\]]'jig rten pa'i chos ni dge ba bcu ste/_'jig rten pa yi yang dag lta/_/zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/'das pa'i chos ni gtso bo'i chos dang gtso bo ma yin pa'i chos so/_/gtso bo'i chos ni dam chos zhes te stong pa skye med la bya/_gtso bo ma yin pa'i chos ni chos
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]rgyal zhes bya ste/_gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis theg pa ni gsum ste/_chos kyi dbang phyug kyang de'o/_/chos kyi las ni gsal bar ldan/_/zhes te phyi nang gi ma rig pa'i mun pa chos de gnyis kyis sel ba'i phyir ro/_/de yang 'jig rten snang byed
[\[94a.2\]]ces pas sgrub ste/_ma rig pas bsgrubs pa'i sems can la dngos po'i gnas lugs snang bar byed pas gtso bo'i chos de ni mchog go/_/chos kyi dbang phyug ni dge ba'i chos la dbang byed pas so/_/theg pa gsum gyi chos ni 'jig rten pa'i chos las rgyal bas na
[\[94a.3\]]rgyal ba'o/_/'jig rten gyi chos kyi 'bras bu ni lha dang mi dang chos rgyal te/_'das pa'i 'bras bu ni nyan thos dang rang rgyal dang byang chub sems dpa'o/_/'bras bu de rnams so/_/so sor legs par thob par byed pa ni lam ste/_de ston par byed pa yang 'jam
[\[94a.4\]]dpal lo/_/don grub ces 'dir mtshan nyid gsum dang sbyar te/_don grub ni kun brtags te dbye na gzung 'dzin gnyis so/_/de ni sgro btags kyi ngo bor yod de/_de la don grub ces dbye ba'i phyir zhe na/_don du snang ba ste phyi'i don du gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/'o na nang gi 'dzin
[\[94a.5\]]pa la don ci'i phyir zhe na/_yul gyi ming yul can la brtags te sgro btags kyi ngo bor grub pas grub ces bya'o/_/bsam pa grub ces pa gzhan dbang rnam rtog gi bsam pa ste/_gzung 'dzin du rtog_/rgyu rkyen gyi dbang gis rjes su grub pa'i phyir ro/_/kun du rtog pa
[\[94a.6\]]thams cad spangs/_/zhes pa yongs su grub pa ste/_de yang rgyan las/_'gyur med phyin ci ma log pa/_/yongs su grub pa rnam pa gnyis/_/zhes gsungs te/_mi 'gyur ba yongs su grub pa ni stong pa nyid do/_/phyin ci ma log pa yongs su grub pa ni mi rtog pa'i ye
[\[94a.7\]]shes te mi rtog pa'o/_/de ltar kun brtags ni sgro btags kyi ngo bor grub ste/_bsam pa 'grub pas yongs grub ni don dam du grub rtog pa spangs mi rtog pa grub ste/_mtshan nyid gsum la grub pa gsum gyi ming gis btags so/_/yang de gsum de ltar gyi shes pa
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]skyes la mi 'gags pa'i skad cig ma nyid la gnas skabs kyis gsum du gzhag ste/_dper na shes pa nyid chags shing lta bur sngon por skyes pa la yin pa shes pa'i sngon po yin bzhin du btags pa'i don gyi sngon por btags pa kun brtags so/_/shes pa sngon po nyid gong
[\[94b.2\]]gi ltar skyes pa de rgyu rkyen gzhan gyi dbang byas pa gzhan dbang ngo /_/shes pa'i sngon po de la don gyi sngon pos stong /_yongs su grub pa ste de yang many+dzu'o/_/rnam par mi rtog nas mar 'gyur ba yongs su grub pa'i rgyas bshad de/_gzung 'dzin gyi sa rnam par mi rtog dbyings
[\[94b.3\]]ni 'byung khungs te/_chos thams cad kyi rgyu'i dngos po'i phyir ro/_/de nyid dngos por ma grub pas mi zad la/_de la dmigs nas 'phags pa'i chos thams cad skye bas chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid de ni dam pa'o/_/yang na mu stegs dang /_nyan thos rang rgyal las
[\[94b.4\]]dam bar 'gyur pa'o/_/'dus ma byas kyi chos de las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa zad pa'i mtha' med pas zad mi shes te/_de yang 'jam dpal lo/_/bsod nams ni 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams mthar thug dang /_'jam dpal
[\[94b.5\]]ldan la yang bsod nams 'jig rten las 'das pa yang mthar thug pa'i tshogs bsags la ye shes ni nyan thos kyis te/_de yang 'jam dpal lo/_/khyad par can gyi ye shes chen po ni theg pa chen por shes te/_nyan thos pas khyad par che ba'i phyir ro/_/khyad par che ba de
[\[94b.6\]]gang zhe na/_rtogs pa dang /_thugs rje ste nyan thos gang zag la bdag med rtogs/_rang don las gzhan don med la/_theg pa chen pos chos dang gang zag gnyis ka la bdag med du rtogs/_thugs rjes tshogs thams cad gzhan don du bsngos des khyad med do/_/_
[\[94b.7\]]ye shes ldan zhes pa ni gong ma de gnyis dang 'jam dpal ldan no/_/de yan chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rin chen rigs la so drug go/_/theg pa chen po'i ye shes ni yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin par shes te de yang many+dzu'o/_/tshogs gnyis zhes pa
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]nyan thos dang theg pa chen po'i tshogs gnyis many+dzus bsags so zhe'o/_/man ngag tu ni sgrub thabs dang sbyar te/_bsod nams ldan pa zhes brten gyi gang zag dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom pa mtshon/_bsod nams tshogs kyis tshogs bsags pa'i
[\[95a.2\]]yul dang yan lag bdun mtshon/_ye shes kyis ye shes kyi tshogs stong par bsgom pa mtshon/_khyad par gyis ye shes lnga bsgom pa mtshon/_ye shes ldan gyis zhal drug pa bsgom par mtshon/_de bzhin du/_mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug_/ces gsungs pas
[\[95a.3\]]rdo rje rjes su dran/_sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba/_/zhes gsungs pas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ste mchod rten mtshon no/_/de rnams kyis bsgres te/_sgrub thabs dang sbyar ro/_/rtag pa zhes pa ni mi 'gyur ba yongs grub kyi stong pa la bya/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_brtags
[\[95a.4\]]pa'i mi mthun pa mi rtag pa yin te stong pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te stong pa de mi rtag na rgyu rkyen dang bcas par thal lo/_/'dod rtog zer na mi rtag par thal/_yang 'dod rtog zer na stong pa ma yin par thal lo/_/kun rgyal ni ming gi rnam grangs te stong pa de nyid g.yo ba dang /_mi g.yo
[\[95a.5\]]ba thams cad du byung sngon gyur rgyal zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi de gnyis med de/_gsang ba 'dus par/_thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa bzhi bsam pa yul du bzhag la blo ldan ni sems byed
[\[95a.6\]]do/_/yang na bsam du med pa'i bsam gtan ni/_bsam gtan gyi bsam bya ni gud na med blo ldan ni sems byed gud na med de/_mchog ces pa de rnams rje btsun nyid do/_/de yang so so'i chos thams cad skye med du rig pas bsam bya la sogs pa mi g.yo mchog
[\[95a.7\]]gi dang po zhes pa ni 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi chos lnga tshan lngas bsdus pa gcig ston te/_de yang sangs rgyas pa'i chos bden brdzun ji ltar 'dod ce na/_grub mtha'i dbang dang dngos po'i gnas lugs gnyis te/_grub mtha' ni sems tsam rnam bcas kyis/_sangs rgyas kyi
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]sa ni chos yod do cog bden pas 'dod/_rnam med drir bcas ni ye shes bden la gzugs sku brdzun te/_phyed bden phyed brdzun du 'dod de/_shAn+ti pa bzhin no/_/sgyu ma gnyis med kyi dbu ma ni/_sangs rgyas pa'i gnas lugs de 'di'i lta bas sangs rgyas sa na chos
[\[95b.2\]]bden brdzun gang du yang grub pa med par 'dod/_'o na sangs rgyas kyi sa na rgyun chad dam snyam pa la brtags tshod du rgyun ma chad do/_/'o na brtags tshod du ji ltar yin snyam na gnyis med kyi ye shes lnga po 'di nyid la gnas skabs kyi ldog pa'i bye brag gis sku lnga/_ye shes
[\[95b.3\]]pa/_rigs lnga/_spyan lnga/_mtshan lngar yod par 'dod do/_/de la sku lnga ni/_gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste/_/zhes pa'i skabs su 'og nas kyang ston na sku ni bsdu na gcig ste/_mchog gi dang po zhes pa chos sku ste de 'jam dpal nyid do/_/gnas skabs su
[\[95b.4\]]chos sku longs sku sprul sku ste/_gsum po de yang 'jam dpal nyid 'chad pa ste/_dbye na sku lnga ste/_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/_/sprul pa'i sku dang /_rnam par smin pa'i sku dang /_ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang /_chos sku'o/_/de la longs sku ni gnas khyad par can 'og min gyi
[\[95b.5\]]gnas pad+ma can dang /_bde ba can dang /_ston pa sku khyad par can mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan/_'khor khyad par can kun du bzang po la sogs pa la chos khyad par can gnyis med kyi chos ston te/_de lta bu nyid 'jol nyog longs spyod pas longs sku'o/_/sprul sku ni gnyis
[\[95b.6\]]med de nyid gzhan don btsal mi dgos par lhun grub tu byed pa'o/_/rnam smin ni mi 'dra bar smin pa ste/_gnyis med de nyid gnas ston pa 'khor chos la sogs pa mi 'dra bar smin pa'o/_/ngo bo nyid ni de rnams kyi don btsal na cir yang mi rnyed pa de'o/_/chos sku ni de ro
[\[95b.7\]]gcig pa'i bdag nyid do/_/de rnams la ye shes dang spyan lnga la sogs pa yang sbyor te/_sku ni longs sku/_ye shes ni so sor rtog pa/_spyan ni shes rab spyan no/_/rigs ni pad+ma'i rigs/_sangs rgyas ni snang ba mtha' yas so/_/de bzhin du sprul sku/_bya ba grub pa/_sha'i
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]spyan/_las kyi rigs/_don grub/_rnam smin/_mnyam nyid/_yon tan mi 'dra/_lha'i spyan rin chen rigs/_rin 'byung ngo /_/ngo bo nyid me long /_sangs rgyas kyi spyan/_rdo rje'i rigs/_mi bskyod pa/_chos sku/_chos dbyings/_chos kyi spyan/_bde
[\[96a.2\]]gshegs rigs/_rnam snang zhes bya'o/_/bdag nyid can zhe'o/_/khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag_/sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan 'chang /_/spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang /_/zhes pa rnams kyis de rnams kyang rje btsun 'jam dpal nyid yin par bstan to/_/sangs
[\[96a.3\]]rgyas thams cad ces pa ni/_'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams khyod la brten zhes 'byung ste/_rje btsun khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i yab kyang yin na/_byang chub sems dpar snang bas sangs rgyas kyi sras po yang yin no/_/nyan
[\[96a.4\]]thos dang rang rgyal ni sku dang gsung gi sras la byang chub sems dpa' thugs kyi sras yin pas dam pa zhes bya'o/_/bgrod par bya ba rnams kyi mchog go/_/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi rang bzhin shes pas srid pa las byung ba'i skye gnas kyi byed rgyu med de/_chos dang gang zag
[\[96a.5\]]gi bdag gis dben pa'i phyir 'khor ba'i srid pa des sel lo/_/gcig pu sra mkhregs zhes pa ni/_'jam dpal gyi sku de ni rdo rje las grub pa ste/_thams cad kyis mi shigs shing mi phyed pa'i phyir ro/_/skyes ma thag pa ni gdul bya dang 'tsho ba'i bsam pa skyes ma thag tu'am/_
[\[96a.6\]]mthong ma thag tu des 'dul/_'gro ba yang rje btsun nyid do/_/nam mkha' ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las byang sems rdo rje'i bdag nyid du rang byung ste 'jam dpal nyid do/_/shes rab ye shes zhes pa ni/_zab pa dang rgya che ba dbyer med du rtogs pa las ye shes kyi me

[\[100b.1\]]su gshegs pa'i tshe 'jam dpal gyis chos kyi dung gi sgra bsgrags te/_'dzam bu'i gling du sangs rgyas kyi chos 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes stong gi 'jig rten du grags pas che ba yang yin no/_/chos kyi gaN+DI zhes pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud bzhi 'dul nas zad pa dang mi skye ba

[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]pa ni lam thams cad ston cing mthong ba'i phyir te/_lam de yang gang zhe na/_lam yan lag brgyad de/_yang dag pa'i lta ba nas yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du'o/_/de la ni rje btsun de grags so zhe'o/_/thar pa zhes pa de las thar der gyur son zhes

[\[119a.2\]]spyod pa/_/yang dag sprul pa skye 'gyur de la phyag 'tshal nas/_/mchog tu dri med gzod nas zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid/_/sems can don la gsal 'gyur mtshan yang dag brjod pa/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' de la yon tan mnyam med pa/_/gzod nas grangs 'das kyis
[\[119a.3\]]gsungs pa yi mtshan don bri bar bya/_/de la dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul/_rgyud sde thams cad kyi rtsa ba/_bstan pa kun gyi dngos gzhi/_sde snod kun gyi me long /_nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'grel pa'o/_/dgos pa la sogs pa gang zhe na/_mtshan don
[\[119a.4\]]dkyil 'khor drug la sogs pa'i lta ba dang sgom pa'i bye brag ni brjod bya/_de bstan pa ni dgos pa/_khyad par du gyur pa las 'bras bu sku lnga thob pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa/_'brel pa ni thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i 'brel pa'o/_/de la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
[\[119a.5\]]gang la las sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi mtshan bzung na yon tan ji tsam zhe na/_de la tshad med dpag tu med do/_/gang la las 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mtshan bstan nas bzung na bsod nams ji tsam zhe na/_de ni gong ma las kyang dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las
[\[119a.6\]]'das pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'phags pa 'jam dpal ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/de nyid kyang cis she na/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bskal pa re re'i sems can gyi don byas pa de lta bu'i
[\[119a.7\]]dka' ba spyad pa ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyis kyang ma mdzad do/_/de nyid kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i smon lam grub pa tshad med do/_/'jam dpal gyi yon tan gyi khyad par la tshad med do/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]brgya stong gi yab dang yum lta bu'o/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la gdams ngag ston pa'o/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ming gi 'khor lo rgyas par byed pa'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni de bzhin
[\[119b.2\]]gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtam gyi skyes bur gyur pa'o/_/'jam dpal ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa'o zhes pa la sogs rgya cher 'byung ngo /_/de ltar phan yon che ba ji lta bu'i dka' ba spyad ce na/_'di'i tshul ni dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang nges
[\[119b.3\]]pa'i don gyi mdo las bstan te/_dang po so so'i skye bo mang du thos pa zhes bya bas chos thams cad rtag par go nas kun la de ltar bsgrags pas thams cad rtag par lta ba la btsud pa'o/_/dus tshod der khye'u thos sgrogs zhes bya bas chos thams cad med par go nas kun la med
[\[119b.4\]]par bstan te/_de ltar sde gnyis su chad nas rtsod pa byung ngo /_/de'i rnam smin gyis gnyis ka dmyal bar skyes so/_/de gnyis kyi 'khor rnams kyang lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba za bar 'gyur te/_'khor dang bcas pa de nas thar nas mthar 'dab chags byar skyes so/_/de yang
[\[119b.5\]]mang du thos pa me mar 'obs su grogs po cig gis zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bskyur ba las mang du thos pas dmyal dpon pa zhag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su ngo bor la 'di thos pa byas pas khyod rang gis bzod na rung zer nas/_des bskyur bas bsam pa bzang pos zhag bdun lon nas tshe
[\[119b.6\]]'phos nas khyim bdag gi bu sbyin pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/khye'u thos sgrogs ni grogs so cig dang gnyis dmyal dpon gyi shing rta 'dren pa la grogs pos ma nus nas/_dmyal dpon la 'di zhog ngas drang byas pas khyod kyis 'drongs sam zer nas mgo bo la tho ba brgyab nas tshe 'phos
[\[119b.7\]]nas rdza mkhan snang byed kyi bur skyes so/_/des shAkya thub pa la 'jam gang phul nas sems bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus khyim bdag gi bu de tshe snga ma dran pa'i shes pa byung nas sbyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'o/_/de nas dge slong ye shes rgyal por gyur nas tshul khrims rdzogs
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]par byas so/_/de nas bram ze dri med du gyur nas bzod pa rdzogs par byas pa'o/_/de nas rgyal po mu khyud kyi bur gyur nas brtson 'grus rdzogs par byas so/_/rgyal po dad yod du gyur pa'i dus su bsam gtan rdzogs par byas so/_/dge slong chos kyi rgyal
[\[120a.2\]]mtshan du gyur pa'i dus su shes rab rdzogs par byas so/_/rgyal po nam mkhar gyur pa'i dus su shes rab dang thabs rdzogs par byas so/_/drang srong rgyal po'i dus su ye shes rdzogs par byas so/_/'di nyid la/_pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar
[\[120a.3\]]yang nas yang du dka' ba spyad pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'di nyid la/_skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang /_/sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar sku nyid gnyis med kyi ye shes de
[\[120a.4\]]las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pas/_longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang /_/zhes gsungs te/_sum cu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lha dang lha mor snang ste/_dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin/_/kha
[\[120a.5\]]dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/_/ces gsungs so/_/de'i rjes kyi ye shes bya ba grub pa dang /_kha dog sems pa de la gzigs pa drug gi tshul du gzigs nas ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs na gnas pa'i don bya ba'i phyir/_don dam pa stong pa yi ge a dkar po'i rang bzhin las
[\[120a.6\]]lhun po rin chen gyi steng du byon la byin rlabs rdo rje chen po dang mchod rten chen po dang /_chos 'byung dang /_gzhal yas khang dkyil 'khor drug gi snang ba gdul bya la so sor byung ste/_de yang 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/_bde gshegs dri med ye shes nyid/_a li byin
[\[120a.7\]]rlabs chen po las/_/lhun po'i steng du rnam 'phrul snang /_/dkyil 'khor drug gi ji bzhin no/_/zhes gsungs te/_skal ba dang ldan pa'i gdul bya drug la snang ba'o/_/gzugs rnams ma lus 'chang ba po/_/gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun du ston/_/ji bzhin 'gro ba'i
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]don byed pa/_/sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang /_/zhes gsungs so/_/gang la cis ni 'dul mdzad pa/_/thabs kyis 'dren pa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/rim pa bzhin du 'jug bya'i phyir/_/skal ba ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin/_/de ltar rnam 'phrul mdzad pa'o/_/de
[\[120b.2\]]ltar phan yon che ba gang zhe na/_'di skad bdag gis zhes pa nas gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do zhes pas ston no/_/de gsungs pa'i gnas ni la la dag gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la sogs par gsungs par 'dod/_sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/_bya rgod ri yi gnas mchog
[\[120b.3\]]tu/_/gsang ba dam pa rab bshad pa/_/zhes gsungs pas na/_bya rgod phung po'i ri la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'dus nas so/_/de'i dus su lha'i bu rin chen gyis zhu ba'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/_'phags pa
[\[120b.4\]]'jam dpal 'di rnams yon tan dang byin rlabs dang /_ji ltar sgrub bar zhu bar 'dod pas gsung 'tshal zhes zhus pas/_'jam dpal na re nga rang la yon tan brjod na bdag la bdag gis bstod par mchi bas lha dang mi'i ston pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gsung 'tshal
[\[120b.5\]]zhes zhus so/_/ston pas cang mi gsung ba'i dus su byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje khro bo lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu zhus so/_/der ston pas 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba le'u khri drug stong rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud bka' stsal to/_/de'i rjes la zab pa dang rgya che ba'i rdo rje'i
[\[120b.6\]]glur blangs pa'i don dgrol ba'i phyir mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di rdo rje'i tshig tu gsungs so/_/de nas zhes pa ni de ma thag pa la sbyor ro/_/de yang sgyu 'phrul dra bar dkyil 'khor dang lha dang /_dbang dang rab gnas la sogs pa'i rim pa kun bstan nas/_rje btsun gyi rang bzhin
[\[120b.7\]]dang mdzad pa'i phrin las dang yon tan bstan pa'i phyir de nas so/_/'di la tshigs bcad sum brgya bcu gnyis kyis bstan pa 'di skabs bcu bzhir bstan pa de dang mi 'gal bar bya ba'i phyir dang /_sngon gyi lo rgyus kyi don dang dris lan phan yon 'thad pa dang bcas pa bstan par
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]bya'o/_/de la dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang nas zhu ba po dang 'khor rnams bstan te/_de yang sngon ston pa shAkya thub pa 'khor phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa bzhugs pa'i dus su sems can rnams kyi lo tog med/_tshe thung nad mang po byung nas sdug bsngal ba'i dus su ston

[\[121a.4\]]zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos rdo rje nam mkha' la gsor zhing rig pa brjod pas klu'i gnas dang khyim kun du me 'bar ro/_/der klu na re khyed dang nga gnyis stobs dgye yis zer nas da lta nyid du brlag par bya'o zer nas khros pa'i nga ro sgrogs so/_/_
[\[121a.5\]]de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje lan gsum du gsor nas ri khyim la bsnun pas me 'bar bar gyur te/_der klu'i rgyal po khyab 'jug rang gi gnas su bros so/_/der byon nas khyab 'jug btul lo/_/der sa blar ma hA de ba'i sar bros pas yang btul lo/_/_

[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]'jam dpal ye shes zhes pa brjod bya don gyi 'jam dpal ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du bstan no/_/ming ni nas rab zhi ba'i bar gyis rjod byed tshig gi 'jam dpal thun mong ma yin pa bstan no/_/de gang gi yul yin na thog ma nas yang nas yang du gsungs pa zhes pas

[\[121b.5\]]chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar zhal gyis bzhes so/_/de rnams kyi nang gi chen po lha tshangs pas nu bo tsho'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i zhu ba dbul bar byas/_tha chungs phyag na rdo rjes gsang sngags kyi sdud pa po bya bar byas te dam bca' byas pas gsang 'dzin no/_/nges par
[\[121b.6\]]'byung nas spyan sngar 'dug gis chos spyod pa'i tshul bstan/_zhus nas gnang ba'i tshul ni de nas bcom ldan 'das nas yid kyis nyon gyis bstan no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi byung tshul ni gong gi khye'u thos sgrogs rdza mkhan snang byed kyi bur gyur/_shAkya thub pa chen po la
[\[121b.7\]]'jam gang phul nas sems bskyed nas rim par sa bcu thob nas/_dam pa tog dkar du gyur nas lha rnams la chos ston cing bzhugs pa las nam mkha' nas sgra byung ste/_skyes bu chen po bcom ldan 'das/_/sems can kun la phan don du/_/mi yi yul du gshegs su

[\[122a.1\]]gsol/_/mi yi yul du gshegs nas kyang /_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol/_/zhes bskul te/_dga' ldan lha mi pham mgon po la dbu rgyan bskon nas ri rab kyi steng du byon nas gzigs pa bzhi la gzigs te/_yab dang yum dang rigs dang grong

[\[183a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po khong du chud par bya'o zhes dgongs pa can gyi mya ngan las 'das pa bstan pa yin no/_/'ga' zhig gis kyang gsungs pa/_sgrib pa kun las nges grol phyir/_/mdzad pa rnams kyang ma rdzogs phyir/_/sangs rgyas
[\[183a.5\]]rtag tu mya ngan 'das/_/mya ngan 'das pa'ang min par 'dod/_/kun kyang 'dres pa'i phrin las can/_/rgya mtsho'i chu 'dra rgyal ba rnams/_/byas so byed do bya'o zhes/_/gzhan gyi don la dgongs pa med/_/snod chag pa yi zla ba bzhin/_/rang gi nyes pas mi snang ngo /_/'jig rten kun la
[\[183a.6\]]nyi ma bzhin/_/de dag chos 'od khyab pa mdzad/_/la lar rdzogs pa'i byang chub ston/_/la lar me bzhin mya ngan las/_/nam yang med pa ma yin te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku/_/gang du'ang rnam par dpyod mi mda'/_/gnas rnams kun nas mthong mod kyi/_/dbang po
[\[183a.7\]]drug gi spyod yul min/_/nyon mongs thul la spangs pa med/_/sngags kyis gsad pa'i dug dang 'dra/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni nyon mongs pas/_/nyon mongs zad pas kun mkhyen zhes/_/thabs chen rnams ni ldan pa la/_/nyon mongs byang chub yan lag ldan/_/'khor bzhi ba'i
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]bdag nyid de/_/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs bsam yas/_/khams gcig na ni gnyis med phyir/_/dpag med lhan cig tshogs bsags phyir/_/rim gyis 'byung bar mi rigs phyir/_/sangs rgyas mang por rab tu grags/_/zhes so/_/mi gnas ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir de lta bu'i
[\[183b.2\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du rgyun mi 'chad par chos ston pa'i sgra'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir phyogs bcu'i chos kyi rnga bo che'o/_/chos kyi sku nyid kyis na gzugs med do/_/mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid kyi phyir
[\[183b.3\]]gzugs ldan no/_/dam pa ni mchog ces pa ste/_'jig rten gsum gyi gtso bo bzhin shin tu mdzes pa 'jam dpal gyi sku zhes pa'i don to/_/gdul bya'i skye bo sna tshogs dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs kyi skur sprul pa'i phyir sna tshogs gzugs can no/_/de ltar rnam pa gsum
[\[183b.4\]]dbyer med kyang phyi rol gyi don med pa'i phyir yid las skyes so/_/sems tsam du grags so zhes pa'i don to/_/yid kyi rang bzhin yin kyang gzugs sna tshogs pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs thams cad kun du snang bar byed pa'i dpal 'phro bar byed cing phun sum tshogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni
[\[183b.5\]]gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal lo/_/yang na gzugs rnams te khams su gtogs pa thams cad kun du snang bar byed cing so sor gsal bar byed pa gang yin pa de lta bu ni dpal te/_me long gi ngos bzhin dwangs shing dri ma med pa zab cing rgya che ba'i ye shes kyi sku grub pa gang yin
[\[183b.6\]]pa de de bzhin no/_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po/_/zhes pa ste gzhan du mos pa sna tshogs pa'i sems can gyi bsam pa dri ma med pa'i chu la de lta de ltar gzugs brnyan 'char ba'i snang ba skyed par byed pa'i phyir/_gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po/_/_

[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]las kyang dbang che ba nyid kyis na dbang che ba ste dbang che ba nyid kyis de ltar grags shing grags pa ltar grub pa gang yin pa de ni che bar grags pa'o/_/de nyid ni thams cad rjes su 'dzin pa dang tshar gcod pa'i rgyur gyur pa nyid kyis na khams gsum dbang phyug chen
[\[184a.2\]]po'o/_/'phags lam ni 'dir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad de de yang yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting

[\[184a.6\]]dang /_mchod par 'os pa nyid kyi phyir gnas brtan pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun thams cad las ye shes kyis bgres pa'i phyir rgan po'o/_/bsod nams kyi lam nye bar ston pas dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba gsum po rnams la tshangs
[\[184a.7\]]pa la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis yang dag pa'i don gyi chos bstan pas 'gro ba drug po rnams skyob par byed pa dang skye dgu'i bdag ste don dam par ni bcom ldan 'das nyid do/_/phyag zhabs 'khor los mtshan dang rus sbal zhabs/_/zhes pa la sogs pa ste/_mgon po byams pas gsungs
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]pa rnams te/_bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs las nges par 'khrungs pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams 'chang bas na mtshan 'chang ba'o/_/de bzhin du/_thub pa'i sen mo zangs mdog dang /_/mdog snum mtho dang sor mo rnams/_/zhes pa la sogs pa dpe byad brgyad cur
[\[184b.2\]]bshad pa rnams kyis yan lag thams cad brgyan pa'i rgyan 'jig rten gsum na mdzes pa'o/_/de nyid thams cad kyi thams cad du skye bo rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba'i phyir sdu gu'o/_/'jig rten ni sems can dang snod kyi rang bzhin no/_/shes pa ni dngos po thams cad de 'gro ba'i skye
[\[184b.3\]]gnas dang mdog dang dbyibs dang tshad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yongs su shes pa'o/_/yongs su shes pas 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa ni legs pa'o/_/de la slob dpon ni yang dag par ston par byed pa po ste/_de'i phyir 'jig rten slob dpon te 'jig rten

[\[184b.5\]]skyabs pa yang ngo /_/'di ji lta bu zhe na gsungs pa/_'jig rten gsum yid gcugs zhes pa ste/_'di ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi chos ston pa nyid kyis yid gcugs par bzung ste slu ba med pa'o/_/gzhan rnams ni log pa'i bdag nyid la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir ro/_/_

[\[184b.7\]]pa ni rang gis gzigs pa'i lam nye bar ston pa de 'di la yod pas na skyob pa'o/_/de skad du/_skyob pa nyid gzigs lam gsungs pa zhes pa ste/_nyid kyis gzigs pa'i lam nye bar ston pa po nyid kyi phyir de lta bu ni bla na med pa'o/_/gzhan las ni rgyun rtag pa nyid kyis rgyun
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]mi 'chad par mgon med pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams skyob par byed pa'o zhes rnam par bshad de/_/de ltar du yang /_tA yir rgyun dang skyong ba dag la'o/_/zhes byings klog par byed do/_/nam mkha' bzhin khyab pas yongs su gang zhing yangs pa nyid gang

[\[185b.1\]]zhes pa la sogs pa sdug bsngal 'khor can phung po de yang rnam pa gsum ste/_sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal ni dmyal ba dang yi dwags dang dud 'gro'i 'gro bar song ba rnams kyi'o/_/mngon du byas pas sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal ste/_de yang phal cher mi'i
[\[185b.2\]]'gro bar gtogs pa rnams kyi'o/_/rgyu gzhan la rag las pas sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin gyi phyir 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal te lha'i 'gro bar gtogs pa rnams kyi ste/_lha'i bde ba yang mthar sdug bsngal gyi rgyu can nyid kyi phyir ro/_/'di dag ni sdug bsngal gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi sdug bsngal

[\[185b.5\]]nyid kyi phyir rtag pa dang chad pa la sogs pa'i mtha' med pas na/_nyan thos la sogs pa'i grol ba dang lhog par grol bas gdul bya'i skye bo rjes su gzung ba'i phyir grol gsum son pa ste/_de'i snang ba skyed pa'i phyir rnam par bsgom pa'i byed pas na grol gsum son pa'o/_/_

[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]rtogs pa ste/_/bde gshegs gshegs pa spangs pa'o/_/zhes gsungs pa'i phyir te/_de rnams rtogs par gyur pa ni/_/dus gsum dus med rtogs par gnas/_/zhes pa ste chos nyid kyis sku gsum la khyab pa'i zhes pa'i don to/_/gdul dka' ba

[\[186a.4\]]zhe na/_nyan thos la sogs rnams kyi ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku nyid kyis de bzhin rnams kyang thod du byed pas/_yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod/_/ces te bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i dpal 'jam dpal lo/_/lhag ma kun ni 'gro ba

[\[186a.7\]]pa ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i nus pa ni phyi rol med par gyur pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mtshan nyid dang bral bas lhun gyis grub pa nyid kyis 'gro ba mtha' dag gi don phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhir gyur pas na/_yid bzhin nor bu chen po ste byang chub kyi sems so/_/_
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]de de'i bdag nyid du 'chang bas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po 'chang zhes pa'o/_/de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa/_khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog_/dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste/_/bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog_/ces pa ste/_rin chen kun gyi mchog ni yid bzhin gyi nor

[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]cad du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyis shes par mdzad pas na dge dang mi dge shes pa'o/_/gdul bya'i skye bo'i sems ji lta ba bzhin mkhyen pas bstan pa dang /_btang snyoms dang yongs su rgyal ba mngon sum du bya ba'i dus kyi rnam

[\[187a.3\]]kyis grub pa'i dam tshig dang ldan pas na dam tshig ldan pa'o/_/dus thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dbang 'byor pa'i phyir khyab bdag go/_/sems can rnams kyi dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams ni rtul po la sogs pa'i dbye bas so sor rnam pa

[\[187a.6\]]tan no/_/yon tan de rnams kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa la sogs pa yongs su smin pa'i phyir yon tan shes so/_/dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la sogs pa chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu la sogs pa'i tshul gyis mkhyen pas na chos shes pa'o/_/bsod nams dang ye
[\[187a.7\]]shes kyi sku rnams nyid kyi phyir lha dang lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyi yid du 'ong zhing rab tu bstod pa nyid kyis rab zhi ba'o/_/mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'joms shing phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs pa'i rgyu ni bkra shis so/_/'di las de 'dra ba dang brjod pa la sogs pa 'byung bas na bkra shis
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]'byung ngo /_/rang nyid bkra shis thams cad kyi bkra shis nyid kyi phyir bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa ste/_rang gi don la de phan gyi rkyen byin pa ste/_skye bo'i tshogs gzhan rnams la bsod nams skye ba'i rgyur gyur ba'i yang dag par brjod pa'i ngo bo de nyid ni grags pa'o/_/gzhan
[\[187b.2\]]rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyur gyur pa dang /_rang nyid phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dpal mo'o/_/de bzhin du rang dang gzhan gyi sde rnams la bsod nams rab tu skye zhing legs pa 'byung ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de nyid snyan grags
