[\[201a.1\]]'di dag kyang gar gyis 'dul ba'i skye po rjes su gzung ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o/_/don dam pa'i tshul gang yin pa de gsungs pa don gcig ces pa'o/_/de nyid gsungs pa/_gnyis med chos kyi don zhes so/_/tal gyi rkyen phyis pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i chos
[\[201a.2\]]nyid ces pa'i don to/_/de yang don dam pa ste de ni nam yang gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/de lta na yang thugs rje chen po dang smon lam gyi phan pa'i dbang gis gdul bya dang rjes su mthun par yongs su mkhyen pa skyed de/_rnam rig sna tshogs pa'i tshul gyis sems
[\[201a.3\]]can rnams kyi don mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can no/_/sems ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'o/_/de dag gi rgyud ni rgyun gyi 'jug pa ste/_don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi tshul gyis gdul bya rnams la
[\[201a.4\]]de ltar so sor snang bar mdzad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kho na sems dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan pa'o zhes gsungs pa'o/_/dngos po ma lus pa ni de lta bu'i char gyur pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ste/_rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi don gyi mtha' can no zhes pa'i don to/_/dngos po de
[\[201a.5\]]rnams la mngon par zhen pa'i skye bo gzhug pa'i phyir mngon par zhen pa med pa'i tshul gyis dga' bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni dngos don ma lus rnams la dga' ba'o/_/don dam par ni stong pa nyid la dga' ba'o/_/de su zhig ce na/_mchog gi blo ste blo'i mchog 'jam pa'i dpal lo zhes pa'i
[\[201a.6\]]don to/_/de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa/_srid pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste/_kha nang du phyogs nas 'jug pa'i phyir bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa rnams la 'ga' zhig mtha' par 'du shes pa bzlog pa'i phyir/_khams gnyis las skyes pa'i 'dod chags ni srid pa'i 'dod chags
[\[201a.7\]]yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/sogs kyi sgras 'dul ba'i khams las byung ba'i 'dod chags kyang gzung ngo /_/srid pa dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kun nas zhes pa ni srid pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa de las 'das pa'o/_/de nyid kyang ste shes rab kyi khyad par de
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]nyid dran pa'i rang bzhin las nges par skyes pa'i phyir ro/_/rtags kyi khyad par nyid kyis de nyid ces pa'i don to/_/dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal/_/zhes stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i dran pa'i rang bzhin ting nge 'dzin brgya stong
[\[201b.2\]]gi bdag por gyur pa nyid kyis mdzes pas de ltar bshad do/_/byang chub yan lag ces bya ba la sogs pa la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni 'di lta ste/_dran pa dang chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang dga' ba dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang btang
[\[201b.3\]]snyoms zhes bya ba rnams so/_/de rnams ni shin tu dga' bar 'os pa nyid kyi phyir me tog lta bu ste/_de rnams kyi dri'i khyad par 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rnams su khyab pa'i yon tan dang /_ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi dri'i khyad par gang yod pa de ni byang chub yan lag me tog
[\[201b.4\]]spos so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yon tan ni gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ma 'dres pa dang stobs bcu la sogs pa rnams te/_rin po che dang 'dra ba de rnams skye ba'i gnas dang 'phel ba'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir 'byung gnas su gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi chu
[\[201b.5\]]gter dang 'dra bas mtsho'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams kyang gzhan du rgyas par bshad do/_/lam gyi yan lag brgyad ni 'di'i yan lag rnams ni brgyad yin pa ste sngar bshad zin to//_//gdul bya'i skye bo'i rgyud la dmigs pa de 'dren par byed cing thabs gang
[\[201b.6\]]gis de'i tshul gang rig pa de ni lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig pa'o/_/de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa/_yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa/_/zhes so/_/sems can thams cad mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jog pa'i thugs rje chen pos mtha' gcig tu kun du chags pa
[\[201b.7\]]nyid kyi phyir sems can kun la shas cher chags so/_/de lta na yang chos thams cad rang bzhin med par thugs su chud pa'o/_/dri ma med pa'i ye shes rab tu bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'o/_/de nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' lta bu'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pas na sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug pa ste thugs su chud pa'o/_/'gro ba'i don ni rtogs pa'i don can gyi phyir gdul bya 'dul ba'i sems las mi 'da' bar skal ba ji lta ba bzhin ches myur bar cig car du gdul bya thams cad kyi
[\[202a.2\]]sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i chos bstan pa'i don du yid ltar mgyogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mnga' ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs zhes bya'o/_/sems can rnams kyi dbang bo rnams ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ste/_thar pa'i cha
[\[202a.3\]]dang mthun pa rnams dang /_dad pa dang brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab ces bya ba rnams so sor rtul po dang 'bring dang chen po'i dbye bas phye ba rnams so/_/de'i don ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi thabs kyi rnam pa ste/_dbang po de rnams dbang don ji lta
[\[202a.4\]]ba bzhin mkhyen pas na/_sems can kun gyi dbang don shes pa'o/_/dus thams cad du sprul pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba yang dag pa sgrub par mdzad cing yid 'phrog pas na/_sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa'o/_/phung po lnga don de nyid ni kun
[\[202a.5\]]rdzob tu/_gzugs ni dbu ba rdos pa 'dra/_/tshor ba chu yi chu bur bzhin/_/'du shes smig rgyu lta bu ste/_/'du byed chu shing sdong po 'dra/_/rnam shes sgyu ma lta bur ni/_/nyi ma'i gnyen gyis bka' stsal to/_/don dam par ni gdod ma nas skye ba med pa nyid phung po lnga'i don gyi de nyid de/_de mkhyen
[\[202a.6\]]pas na de ltar bshad do/_/rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bya ba ste/_phung po lnga'i rang bzhin 'chang bas na/_rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba ste rnam par dag pa'i phung po lnga 'dzin par
[\[202a.7\]]mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/nges par 'byung ba kun ni nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyi'o/_/mtha' ni mthar thug pa ste de la gnas pas na de ltar de bshad do/_/nges 'byung kun gyi rang bzhin rnam par mkhyen pa'i phyir/_nges par 'byung ba kun la mkhas pa'o/_/de lta na yang byang
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]chub sems dpa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad lam la gzhug pa'i phyir du/_nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas pa'o/_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa/_/zhes pa'o/_/ma rig pa dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_
[\[202b.2\]]skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi zhes bya ba rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi mtshan nyid can ni srid pa'i rtsa ba ste/_yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton/_/zhes pa srid pa'i yan lag
[\[202b.3\]]bcu gnyis drungs nas phyung ba zhes pa'i don to/_/ji lta bu zhe na gsungs pa/_dag pa rnam pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste/_thabs dang bcas pa'i shes rab rnam par bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis shin tu rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi srid pa'i yan lag rnams de'i
[\[202b.4\]]bdag nyid du 'chang bas na dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang ba ste/_rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang ba zhes pa'i don to/_/sdug bsngal la sogs pa bden pa bzhi'i tshul ni phyin ci ma log par lam du byed cing rnam par 'jog par byed pas na/_bden bzhi'i tshul
[\[202b.5\]]gyi rnam pa can no/_/sdug bsngal la chos shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal la rjes su rtog pa shes pa dang /_de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam rnams la so sor shes pa gnyis te/_shes pa brgyad po de rnams ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam gsum gyi gdul bya dang rjes
[\[202b.6\]]su mthun par thugs su chud pas rjes su mthun par rtogs pa de 'chang bar mdzad pas na/_shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang ba'o/_/'ga' zhig tu/_bden bzhi'i tshul dang 'dra ba yi/_/shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang /_/zhes mtha' dag klog pa ni dgongs min te/_de la bden pa bzhi'i
[\[202b.7\]]tshul ni nyan thos la sogs pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa bcu drug go/_/de rnams ji lta ba bzhin bsgoms pas rim gyis bden pa so so la chos shes pa dang rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa 'byung bas na/_dri ma med pa'i rtogs pa 'chang ba'i phyir/_/_
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]bden bzhi'i tshul dang 'dra ba yi/_/shes pa brgyad po'i rtogs pa 'chang /_/zhes pa'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis kyi rnam pas bden pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyis skye mched bcu gnyis rnam par dag nas sa bcu gnyis kyi mthar thug pa'i bden pa'i
[\[203a.2\]]dgos pa dang ldan pas na/_bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan pa'o/_/nang stong pa nyid la sogs pa nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid kyi mthar thug pa'i stong pa nyid rnam pa bcu drug gi de nyid rig pa'i phyir de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig pa'o/_/de la gzhan yang dngos po dang
[\[203a.3\]]dngos po med pa dang rang bzhin dang /_gzhan gyi dngos po ste stong pa nyid bzhi dang lhan cig pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid rnam pa nyi shu ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gang yin pa de don dam par dbye ba med kyang de nyid rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir/_rnam pa nyi shu
[\[203a.4\]]byang chub pa/_/zhes gsungs so/_/thabs la mkhas pas thar pa ji lta bar nyan thos la sogs pa'i tshul gyis sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir sna tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan ston pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rnam pa mang po rab tu ston pa'i phyir rnam
[\[203a.5\]]par sangs rgyas so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyi phyir kun rig go/_/de nyid thams cad las phul du byung ba'i phyir mchog go/_/mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'am mtha' klas pa'i sems can rnams
[\[203a.6\]]kyi don mdzad pa'i phyir sku mtha' yas pa bye ba 'gyed par mdzad pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku/_/bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po/_/zhes bya'o/_/sdug bsngal la chos dang bzod pa la sogs pa mthong ba'i lam gyi sems kyi skad cig ma bcu drug po thams cad mngon par
[\[203a.7\]]rtogs pa ste legs par khong du chud pas na/_skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs pa'o/_/sems kyi skad cig ma thams cad kyi don ni skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa la sogs pa'i tshul lo/_/de ji lta ba bzhin rig pas na sems kyi skad cig don kun rig pa'o/_/theg pa sna
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]tshogs ni 'jig rten pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang 'brel pa rnams so/_/de rnams kyi tshul ni rnam par grol ba'i khyad par te/_de nyid ni thabs so/_/de 'gro ba'i don du rnam par sgom par byed cing yang dag par sgrub par
[\[203b.2\]]byed pas na de ltar bshad do/_/ci las she na gsungs pa/_theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung zhes pa ste/_'di yang sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang las yin gyi don dam par ni theg pa gcig kho na ste 'di lta ste theg pa chen po'o/_/de'i 'bras bu ste yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[203b.3\]]sangs rgyas nyid la gnas pa'o/_/de ltar yang ting 'dzin rgyal po las/_sems ni zhum zhing rgyud kyang zhan gyur la/_/thos pa'i mod la skrag par 'gyur rnams la/_/nga yis 'jigs pa spang phyir theg gsum bstan/_/theg pa gcig ste gnyis pa yod ma yin/_/zhes
[\[203b.4\]]gsungs so/_/dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar por yang gsungs pa/_don dam par ngas yang dag par gsungs pa ni 'di yin te/_nyan thos tshul kun gyis ni mya ngan 'das/_/'di dag byang chub mchog gi spyod spyad de/_/nyan thos byang chub sems kun sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/theg pa gcig
[\[203b.5\]]ste gnyis pa yod ma yin/_/gsum pa nam yang yod pa ma yin no/_/skyes mchog 'jig rten tshul ni tshul gzhan gyis/_/theg pa sna tshogs nye bar ston par byed/_/ces gsungs so/_/rnam par rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs so zhes pa'i rig pas/_byang chub sems
[\[203b.6\]]dpa' rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa nyid nyon mongs te/_de rnams kyi khams ni rig ste/_chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i tshul gyi rang bzhin nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i bdag gang yin pa de ni nyon mongs khams rnams rnam dag bdag go/_/dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma
[\[203b.7\]]bstan pa'i las kun nas slong bar byed pa'i sems ni las kyi khams te/_de yang bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pas 'jug pa ste/_de skye ba dang bral ba'i chos ston pa'i sgo nas zad par byed pas na/_las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa'o/_/sems can rnams kyi
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]legs ba 'khyer zhing 'phrog pas chu bo'i shugs dang 'dra zhing chos mthun pas chu bo'o/_/chu bo de yang bzhi ste 'dod pa'i chu bo dang srid pa'i chu bo dang lta ba'i chu bo dang ma rig pa'i chu bo rnams so/_/de nyid rgal dka' bas rgya mtsho ste/_de yang dag par rgal bas
[\[204a.2\]]na/_chu bo rgya mtsho kun las rgal ba'o/_/chu bo kho na khams dang 'gro ba dang skye gnas rnams su sems can rnams sbyor bar byed pas na sbyor ba ste/_de nyid shin tu bgrod par dka' zhing sdug bsngal gyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir dgon pa'o/_/de rnams la nges par thon pas na sbyor ba'i
[\[204a.3\]]dgon pa las byung ba'o/_/nyon mongs nye ba'i kun nyon mongs/_/zhes pa la sogs pa la nyon mongs pa ni rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba la sogs pa'o/_/nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ni sgyu dang rgyags pa dang rnam par 'tshe ba la sogs pa rnams so/_/de nyid kyis sam ba li tAHyang dag
[\[204a.4\]]par nyon mongs par byed pas na kun nas nyon mongs pa'o/_/bag chags dang lhan cig pas na bag chags dang bcas pa'o/_/de rab kyi mthar phyin pas legs par spangs pas na/_nyon mongs nye ba'i kun nyon mongs/_/bag chags bcas pa gtan spangs pa/_/zhes pa'o/_/_
[\[204a.5\]]sgra 'di lta bur rnam par gnas pa ni gtsug lag gi phyir te/_shin tu rab spangs bag chags bcas/_/nyon mongs nye nyon kun nyon mongs/_/zhes pa'i don to/_/shes rab dang thabs dang snying rje chen po ni shes rab thabs dang snying rje che'o/_/de rnams kyi don yod 'bras bu med pa ma yin
[\[204a.6\]]par 'gro ba'i don byed pas na de ltar bshad do/_/'du shes ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid de/_de 'gro ba dang khams dang skye gnas thams cad du gtogs pa ni 'du shes kun te sems can thams cad kyi rgyud du gtogs pa de rnams chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes kyis spong
[\[204a.7\]]ba'o/_/de nyid don te dgos pa gang yin pa ni 'du shes kun gyi don spangs pa'o/_/rnam shes don ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa khong du chud pa'o/_/de 'gog par byed pa ni shes pa dang shes bya'i de kho na nyid skye ba med pa nyid du rtogs par byed pas na rnam shes don ni 'gog par byed
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]pa'o/_/'gog pa 'chang zhes klog pa yang mthong ste de ni go sla'o/_/skal ba dang ldan pa dang mi ldan pa nyid kyi don thugs su chud pa'i don gyis dang dmigs pa med ba nyid kyis na sems can kun gyi yid kyi yul gang yin pa de de ltar bshad do/_/rnon po dang 'bring dang rtul po'i dbye bas
[\[204b.2\]]sems kyi spyod pa so sor rtogs pa'i don gyis na/_sems can kun gyi yid rig pa dang rtogs pa dang khong du chud pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni sems can kun gyi yid rig pa'o/_/nang du song zhing gnyis su med par khong du chud pa'i rnam pas sems can kun gyi yid kyi nang du 'jug pa'i
[\[204b.3\]]phyir sems can kun gyi yid nang gnas so/_/sems can thams cad la rkang gi khong nas snying rje ba nyid kyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal mtshungs pa'i phyir/_de dag sems dang mnyam nyid son pa ste thob pa'o/_/de nyid kyi phyir sems can kun gyi yid tshim byed pa'o/_/sems can
[\[204b.4\]]thams cad kyi mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir/_sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba'o/_/nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo'i tshad ma dam pas grub pa yang 'di yin la/_'di las gzhan pa'am lhag pa med pas mthar thug pa yang yin pas grub pa'i mtha' ste don dam pa'i tshul gyis
[\[204b.5\]]g.yo ba med cing brten pa zhes pa ji srid pa'o/_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_'khrul pa ldan pa min zhes pa ste/_'di la yang gtan tshigs gsungs pa/_'khrul pa thams cad rnam par spangs/_/zhes pa'o/_/'di nyid ji lta bu zhe na gsungs pa/_the tshom med pa'i blo zhes pa ste/_
[\[204b.6\]]the tshom med pa yang 'di yin la blo gros kyang 'di yin pas the tshom med pa'i blo ste/_de nyid ni the tshom med pa'i blo gang yin pa zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro/_/de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa/_bud med don zhes pa la bud med ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/don ni bsgrub bya ste
[\[204b.7\]]'bras bu bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi rang bzhin te/_'di nyid bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal lo/_/yang na 'jam dpal gang yin pa gsum gyi sgra ni gsum rnams te 'dod pa la sogs pa'i khams rnams so/_/don ni rgyu'o/_/de nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje'i rang bzhin
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]yin pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi lus su bskyed pa'o/_/de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa/_kun gyi don ni zhes pa ste/_'dod pa'i khams la sogs pa thams cad kyi rgyur gyur pa zhes pa'i don to/_/yang na don rnam pa gsum
[\[205a.2\]]ste spang bar bya ba dang /_blang bar bya ba dang /_btang snyoms su bya ba'o/_/de la spang bar bya ba ni phyi dang nang gi mi dge ba'i phyogs so/_/blang bar bya ba ni chos bdag med pa'i ye shes dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs so/_/btang snyoms su bya ba ni lung du ma bstan pa'i
[\[205a.3\]]chos rnams te/_'di dag thams cad ni gdul bya dang rjes su 'tsham pas na don gang yin pa ste de ltar bshad do/_/snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa ste 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi rang bzhin yon tan gsum gyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyis 'dul ba'i sems can
[\[205a.4\]]gdul ba'i phyir de'i bdag nyid can de bzhin gshegs pa rigs gsum gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ni yon tan gsum gyi bdag nyid can no/_/phung po lnga'i don gyi tshul ni dus gsum ste/_phung bo lnga don dus gsum pa/_dus kyang phung po
[\[205a.5\]]rnams las gzhan du yod pa ma yin te/_phung po rnams nyid la dus su brtags pa ste/_ji skad du/_chos mngon pa mdzod las/_de dag nyid dus gtam bzhi dang /_/nges par 'byung bcas gzhi dang bcas/_/zhes so/_/de de'i bdag nyid du yod pa gang yin pa de ni/_phung po
[\[205a.6\]]lnga don dus gsum pa/_/zhes so/_/a sha sogs kyi phyir ata'o/_/gsum gyi sgra las rnam pa dang bcas pa brjod pa'i lung ngo /_/phung po lnga don dus gsum pa/_/zhes klog pa la ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yang dus dang gsum nyid kyang dus gsum mo zhes bshad par bya ste snga ma bzhin
[\[205a.7\]]ata'o/_/skad cig ma bcu drug gi mtshan nyid mthong ba'i lam gyi sems kyi skad cig ma thams cad bye brag phyed pa rim gyis gsal bar byed pa'i phyir/_skad cig thams cad bye brag phyed pa'o/_/rang nyid las ni goms pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa thob pa'i phyir dang po la sogs pa'i rim pa med
[\[205b\]]

[\[210a.3\]]so/_/spyi las spyi khas blangs pa'i phyir dngos po'i rkyen las kyang dngos po'i rkyen la 'gal ba med do/_/rang gi rgyud dang tha mi dad pa'i so so rang rig pa'i chos nyid yongs su shes pa'i phyir bdag rig go/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i rang gi sems dang tha mi dad pa nyid kyis gzhan rnams la
[\[210a.4\]]go bar byed pas na gzhan rig go/_/de ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes sna tshogs gzugs can nyid kyis de lta de ltar snang ba'i phyir/_de nyid thams cad pa ste sna tshogs gzugs can yin pa'i phyir rdo rje 'chang ba zhes pa'i don to/_/sar+b+ba zhes klog pa ni rang gi don can gyi
[\[210a.5\]]aN rkyen du byin pa'o/_/sems can thams cad la mtha' gcig tu phan pa'i phyir kun la phan pa'o/_/de nyid kyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo'i skyes bu nyid kyi phyir gang zag mchog go/_/de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid phyir gyis de dang 'dra ba cung zad kyang med pa'i phyir

[\[246a.2\]]do/_/srid pa'i 'jigs pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi mgon mdzad cing rigs kyi bye brag mang po rnams kyi nang na ye shes chen po 'di dam par gyur pas na/_mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste/_/bla ma gsang sngags chen po'i mchog_/ces bya ba ni 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i ming nyid nges par bzung ba
[\[246a.3\]]ste/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bla ma chen po ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de yin la khams gsum pa thams cad kyi yid skyob par byed pas na/_de nyid spyod pa kun ston pa'i mchog tu gyur pa de la de skad ces bya ste/_theg pa chen po'i tshul la
[\[246a.4\]]gnas/_/theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog_/ces bya ba ni gong du bstan pa ltar khams gsum pa'i sems can thams cad rjes su 'dzin pa ni theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas pa yin la/_de nyid byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa zhes bya'o/_/theg pa thams cad kyi rab mchog chen por gyur pa ni/_
[\[246a.5\]]gsang sngags kyi theg pa nyid ye shes lnga dang /_rigs lnga dang /_sku gsum dang /_snod nges par gyur pa thams cad ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yin pas na de'i tshul du bshad pa ni nges pa lnga'i tshul du bshad pa ste dang po'o//_//de ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ni gsang ba'i
[\[246a.6\]]chos 'byung ba'i nang du bdud bzhi dang /_log par 'dren pa'i bgegs mtha' dag bcom pas na ye shes chen po zhes bya la/_de bas na rang nyid nges par brtan zhing pha rol gyi tshogs mtha' dag 'joms pas na rdo rje zhes bya ste/_'gro ba nye bar 'dul ba'i tshul gyis sku'i rigs rnam pa sna
[\[246a.7\]]tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i dbyings zhes bya ba nyid do/_/ye shes chen po de nyid snying po yin la/_de rang gis rang rig pa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba nyid do/_/ye shes chen po de nyid kyi dbyings yang dag par rig pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes zhes bya ste/_de yang le'u dang po
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]las/_ye shes chen po nges ldan pas/_/shes pa med phyir shes pa ni/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te/_/yul dang yul can gcig par bshad/_/ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar gong du bstan pa'i ye shes chen po ni shel gyi snying po dag pa ltar dri ma dang bral zhing kun gyi snang ba'i
[\[246b.2\]]gzhir gyur pas na rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya la/_'gro ba rnam par nges pa ston pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi ye shes rnam par snang mdzad du ston pa ni/_sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi ston pa ni sangs
[\[246b.3\]]rgyas zhes bya la shes bya mtha' dag dang bral ba nyid rnam par snang mdzad ces bya'o/_/thub pa chen po thub chen ldan/_/zhes pa ma dag pa'i nyon mongs pa rnam par bcom pa dang /_nye bar 'tshe ba'i bdud kyi tshogs drag po mi bzad pa rnams bcom pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya la/_de nyid
[\[246b.4\]]thag pa rnams kyi rab mchog chen por gyur pa sngags kyi theg pa la brten nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bstan pa ni/_gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba/_/zhes bya'o/_/gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can/_/zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bde ba spros pa
[\[246b.5\]]dang bral ba ston ka'i zla ba rgyas pa ltar dri ma dang bral zhing mtha' yas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku bzhugs zhes bya ba nyid do/_/ci ste gsang sngags kyi tshul gyis las 'byung bas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang mi ldan nam zhe na ma yin te/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang ldan par
[\[246b.6\]]bstan pa ni/_pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_de la pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni gong du bstan pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa dang ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du nges par thob pa nyid de/_de nyid dbul pos nor bu rin po che rnyed nas slar bral ba ltar ma yin
[\[246b.7\]]zhing pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i tshul gyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa bstan pa ni/_pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/_/zhes bya'o/_/pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste/_/zhes bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i bdag nyid theg pa chen por sems bskyed pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa la sogs nges par spyod pa ni pha rol tu

[\[247a.1\]]phyin la de nyid zag pa med pa'i tshul gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o/_/'gro ba rnams la nges par sbyin pa la sogs pa nges par ston pa ni/_pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul/_/zhes bya ba nyid do/_/de ltar chos kyi dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa ni chos kyi sku
[\[247a.2\]]yin pa de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa nyid sa bcu'i dbang phyug tu gyur pa dang sa bcu la nges par gnas pas ni/_mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste/_/sa bcu la ni gnas pa po/_/zhes bya zhing de nyid gzugs kyi skus gdul bya nges par dag par shes pa bcu la sogs par bcu rnam par dag
[\[247a.3\]]pa dang /_de'i bdag nyid du ldan pas ni/_/shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can/_/shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba po/_/zhes bya ba nyid do/_/rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don/_/zhes pa ni gong du bstan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi bcu dang sa nyi shu dang shes pa nyi shu dang stobs bcu dang dbang bcu ni rnam
[\[247a.4\]]pa bcu ste brgya'o/_/de nyid bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don gyi tshul gyis nyis brgya'o/_/thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag_/ces pa ni zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs bcu'i bdag nyid kyis khams gsum pa thams cad khyab par gnas pa nyid de de nyid nges par bstan pa nyid do/_/kun
[\[247a.5\]]gyi don ni ma lus byed/_/ces bya zhing gong gi dbang bcu bstan pa ni/_rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po/_/zhes pa ste sems la dbang ba la sogs pa'i dbang tshogs pa'i bdag nyid chen po dang ldan par bstan pa nyid do/_/de lta bu'i yon tan mtshungs pa med pa rnams glo bur ba nyid kyis bskyed
[\[247a.6\]]dam 'on te ngo bo nyid kyis gnas snyam pa la/_thog ma med pa spros med bdag_/ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dpag tu med pa thams cad ni thogs pa med pa nas spros pa dang bral ba las mtshan nyid du gnas pa nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams
[\[247a.7\]]cad kyi yon tan mtshan nyid de ni chos kyi dbyings de bzhin nyid kyi bdag por gyur pa dang /_rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid gnas pa ni/_de bzhin nyid dag dag pa'i bdag_/ces bya'o/_/rgyu rnam par dag pa las 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyis lam rnam par dag pa ston pa ni/_bden
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur/_/zhes bya la lam nges pa las 'bras bu nges par 'byin pa ni/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/_/ces bya zhing de nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba las dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par lhun gyis grub par ston pa nyid de/_gnyis med
[\[247b.2\]]gnyis su med par ston/_/zhes bya ba nyid do/_/de ltar bya ba la sogs pa dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas/_zhing khams chen po yang dam pa'i mtha' spros pa dang bral ba yin la/_de la rnam par gnas nas gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par mdzad
[\[247b.3\]]pa ni/_yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas/_/zhes bya ba nyid do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams chen po bdag nyid ji lta bu zhig gnas snyam pa la/_bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs la/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni bdag dang
[\[247b.4\]]bdag gir 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral zhing /_sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs las gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa ni chos kyi sku zhes bya'o/_/bya ba de dang cha mthun pa'i zhing khams 'og min na rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzhal yas khang dang /_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga
[\[247b.5\]]rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid dang /_chos kyi longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa chen pos sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes bya'i dri ma cha phra ba'i yang phra ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la 'dod pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa ni seng
[\[247b.6\]]ge'i rgyal po ltar gzhan gyi sgrib pa 'phrog cing sun 'byin pa rnams skrag par byed pas ni/_mu stegs ri dwags ngan 'jigs byed/_/ces bya ste de dag ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o/_/kun du 'gro ba'i don yod stobs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid ltar mgyogs/_/zhes pa ni stong gsum
[\[247b.7\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba'i don yod pa sgrub cing sprul pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs kyis gdul bya rnams kyi mos pa gang yin pa de la de dang de'i nges pa 'byung bas nges par 'byin pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste/_de nyid sprul pa'i sku'i de ltar yongs su
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]dag pa'i zhing khams chen po ni/_chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /_/sprul sku'i ston pa de bzhugs so/_/zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/bdag nyid chen po'i ston pa de dag yon tan ji lta bu dang ldan zhe na/_rgyal ba dgra rgyal rnam par rgyal/_/zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs
[\[248a.2\]]te/_bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pa ni gnod par byed pas dgra bo yin la/_de la ston pa chen po rnam par rtog pa mi skye ba'i tshul gyis rab tu rgyal la/_de sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad dang /_sems can gyi zhing khams thams cad du yongs su dag pa'i tshul gyis chos
[\[248a.3\]]kyi 'khor lo bskor bas na/_'khor los sgyur ba stobs po che/_/zhes bya'o/_/tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mchog_/tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan/_/zhes pa la gong du bstan pa'i chos kyi sku ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa ni mang po 'dus pa rnams kyi
[\[248a.4\]]mchog yin la/_des 'gro ba'i phan pa'i rgyu legs pa'i spyod pa kun ston pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'byung ba la de skad ces bya zhing /_de sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rje bor gyur pa dang /_khams gsum la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir bya ba rdzogs par yongs su grub pa nyid
[\[248a.5\]]do/_/mthu chen gces par 'dzin pa ste/_/zhes pa ni sku gsum la ye shes chen po'i bdag nyid las dus gzhan yid du 'ong ba med do/_/de nyid nyams su myong ba med pas nges par 'dzin pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bdag nyid
[\[248a.6\]]nges pa'i tshul gyis yongs su rdzogs shing gzhan du bstan du med la gzhan la rag ma lus pa nyid de/_de'i phyir na/_tshul chen gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog_/ces bya ba nyid do/_/tshig rje tshig bdag smra mkhas pa/_/zhes pa ni 'jam dpal nyid nges par 'byung ba ste/_chos kyi dbyings kyi
[\[248a.7\]]ye shes kyi tshul gyis 'di yang 'jam dpal gyi bdag nyid yin par dgongs so/_/sprul pa'i gsung de nyid tshig gi tshogs thams cad la dbang zhing tshig gi brjod pa mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i don ston pa dang /_sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa bzhis 'phags pa nyan thos rnams 'dul
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]bar ston pa ni/_tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas/_/tshig bden pa dang bden par smra/_/bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po/_/phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong /_/zhes bya ba nyid do/_/de nyid 'gro ba mtha' dag gi 'dren pa mdzad cing rang byung gi ye shes 'ba' zhig pa spros pa'i ngo bo thams cad dang bral ba la gnas
[\[248b.2\]]pa'o/_/'dren pa rang rgyal bse ru'i tshul/_/zhes bya ba la de dag skad cig ma'i rgyun gong nas gong du khyad par du 'phags pa mang bar sgrub pas na/_nges 'byung sna tshogs las byung ba/_/zhes bya ba nyid de/_'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po/_/zhes so/_/dge slong dgra bcom zag pa zad/_/ces pa ni
[\[248b.3\]]'byung ba med pa'i 'byung ba thams cad kyi rgyur gyur pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa btab pa'i tshul gyis thob cing rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs mtha' dag bcom pa gang la mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o/_/yon tan che ba chen po de dag dang ldan pa de nyid gang las she na/_'dod chags
[\[248b.4\]]bral ba dbang po dul/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_mchog tu gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi las kyi phyag rgya la phyi rol gyi mngon par zhen pa dang bral bar gnas pa la de skad ces bya zhing /_de nyid pad+ma dang rdo rje snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba rnyed pa la so so la sogs pa'i mngon par shes pas
[\[248b.5\]]ngan 'gro'i rgyur gyur cing 'bras bu 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i bde ba thob pa ni/_bde ba rnyed pas 'jigs med thob/_/ces bya ba nyid do/_/las kyi phyag rgya'i bde ba des rnam par rtog pa 'ching ba'i mdud pa med pa dang 'dra bar bdag gi rgyur gdung zhing sreg par byed pa 'jigs par mdzad pa dang /_phyin ci
[\[248b.6\]]log gi shes pa nub par mdzad pas na/_bsal bar gyur pas rnyog pa med/_/ces bya zhing phyi rol gyi rig pa thabs su ldan pas na nang gi shes rab dang thabs bskyed ba ni/_rig pa dang ni rkang par ldan/_/zhes bya'o/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po de'i rang gi ngo bo ji lta bu zhe na/_
[\[248b.7\]]bde gshegs 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog_/ces bya ba gsungs te zag pa med pa'i bde ba rtogs pa dang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi dus gsum dang /_khams gsum pa thams cad gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid rig cing 'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes pa las gong du 'gyur bas na de skad ces

[\[249a.1\]]bya zhing /_de nyid la thabs dang shes rab kyi rnam par dbye ba'i chos rjes su 'gro ba med par rang rig pa'i ngo bor gnas pas na/_bdag gir mi 'dzin ngar mi 'dzin/_/zhes bya ba nyid do/_/ci don dam pa'i bden pa yin zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid de gzhan
[\[249a.2\]]gyi don brtson pa dang bral lam zhe na ma yin te/_bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas/_/zhes gsungs te/_de la bden pa gnyis ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa yin la/_kun rdzob ni gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis ni rgyu byang chub rnam pa gnyis kyis sems can kun+da lta bu nyid dang /_don dam pa ni bde ba
[\[249a.3\]]chen po ngag gi brjod pa las 'das pa nyid yin par gsungs te de yang le'u dang po las/_kun rdzob don dam dbye ba las/_/byang chub sems ni rnam pa gnyis/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi don grub phyir/_/kun+da lta bur dbye ba yin/_/zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/de nyid 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las pha rol tu
[\[249a.4\]]phyin cing kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba thams cad dang bral bas yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas pa ni/_'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son pa/_/bya ba byas pa skam sar gnas/_/zhes bya ba nyid do/_/de lta bu'i bde ba chen po de ye shes kyi ngo bor gsal bas shes bya mtha' dag la spyod cing pha rol
[\[249a.5\]]gyi tshogs 'joms pas gzhan bskyod pas na/_shes pa 'ba' zhig nges gsal ba/_/shes rab mtshon chen rnam 'joms pa/_/zhes bya ba nyid do/_/de chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ston par gyur cing bde ba gsal bar gyur pa ni/_dam chos chos rgyal
[\[249a.6\]]gsal bar ldan/_/zhes bya la rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid gsum ma rig pa'i rkyen las nges par bzlog pa ni/_'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog_/ces bya ste de nyid chos kyi mdzod zad mi shes pa dang /_phyag rgya chen po lam bra phab pa lta bu rtog pa dang bral ba nyid rang nyid la ston par byed
[\[249a.7\]]pa ni/_chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal la sogs/_legs pa'i lam ni ston pa po nyid do/_/don grub bsam pa grub pa ste/_/zhes pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul gyis phyag rgya chen po nyid don dam pa yin la/_de nyid bsam pa grub cing de las gzhan bsgrub bya med pas de skad ces bya'o/_/de nyid

[\[249b.1\]]'jig rten pa'i gnas dang lus dang longs spyod du rnam par rtog pa spangs pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa nyid ye shes dpag tu med pa rnams 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pas skad cig ma'i ye shes ltar zad pa med pa'i phyir/_kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs/_/rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad/_/ces bya'o/_/_

[\[249b.3\]]mchod pa dang /_bdud rtsi mtha' dag gi gnas su gyur pas na/_bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams tshogs/_/zhes bya zhing de las kyi phyag rgya las 'byung ba skad cig gcig ma'i ye shes dang /_chos kyi phyag rgya las 'byung ba dus kyi ye shes dang /_phyag rgya chen po las 'byung ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i
[\[249b.4\]]ye shes nyid du gnas pa'i phyir/_ye shes ye shes 'byung gnas che/_/ye shes ldan pa yod med shes/_/zhes bya ba nyid do/_/de bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mnyam pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa na/_tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa po/_/zhes bya la skad cig ma'i ye shes ltar mi
[\[249b.5\]]rtog pa ma yin pa dang /_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan chen po yongs su bsngags shing dus gsum gyi ye shes ltar mnyam par gzhag pa dang ma gzhag pa mi mnga' bas na/_rtag pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor can/_/zhes bya ste de'i bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dang sgrub pa po
[\[249b.6\]]gnyis su rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid dbyer mi phyed par gyur pa ni/_bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan bdag_/ces bya ba nyid do/_/de ltar chos kyi sku yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid de ni spros pa thams cad dang bral ba rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa bon du gyur pa
[\[249b.7\]]rigs gcig pa'i bdag nyid yin pas na/_so so rang rig mi g.yo ba/_/mchog gi dang po zhes bya ba nyid do/_/bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa nyid rigs gcig phun sum tshogs pa'i nges pa yin yang bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid las gdul bya rnams kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang

[\[250a.1\]]dang gti mug rnams 'dul ba'i tshul gyis sku gsung thugs su bstan pa ni rnam par snang mdzad dang /_'od dpag med dang /_mi bskyod pa rnams te/_sku gsum 'chang zhes bya ba nyid do/_/de nas yang gdul bya rnams la theg pa chen por sems bskyed pa dang /_sems bskyed
[\[250a.2\]]pa la gsang ba gsum gyi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa rnams nyid kyi mtshan nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos grub pa dang /_chos grub pa las 'gro ba sgrol ba'i phrin las mdzad pa dang /_de nyid 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo gnas pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad dang /_mi bskyod pa dang /_
[\[250a.3\]]rin chen 'byung ldan dang /_'od dpag tu med pa dang /_don yod grub pa rnams su bstan pa ni rigs lnga ste/_sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can/_/zhes bya zhing da dag nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid du gnas pas na/_khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi
[\[250a.4\]]bdag_/ces bya ba nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lnga nyid ni rigs kyi bdag po yin la/_de rnams ni nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po ches dbang bskur zhing rin po che rtse gsum gyis mtshan pas dbu brgyan pa yin la/_de rnams kyi sprul pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu
[\[250a.5\]]med pa rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam lngas cod pan du byas shing /_lha'i spyan la sogs pa lnga rnam par dag pas 'gro ba rnams 'dul bar mdzad pas na/_sangs rgyas mnga' bdag cod pan can/_/spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang /_/zhes bya ba nyid do/_/sangs rgyas thams cad
[\[250a.6\]]skyed pa po/_/zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs pa rnams kyi yongs 'dzin dag pa rnams rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bdag nyid du bskyed pa ni de skad ces bya zhing /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sras po dam par gyur pas na/_sangs rgyas sras po
[\[250a.7\]]dam pa'i mchog_/ces bya'o/_/shes pa srid 'byung skye gnas med/_/ces pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pas na/_'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'gro ba rnams nges par 'byung ba'i don du srid pa len par mdzad kyang /_srid pa'i nyes pas mi gos pa yin la de dag
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]las byung bas ngan 'gro las skyob par mdzad pa nyid kyis kyang /_chos las 'byung ba srid pa sel/_/zhes bya'o/_/ye shes kyi lus nyid srid pa la sogs pa'i gnod pas dbyer mi phyed cing /_'bras bu'i bdag nyid yongs su rdzogs pa ma skyes pa nyid na 'gro ba rnams la phan par

[\[250b.3\]]rang 'byung de nyid shes rab phun sum tshogs pa stong pa nyid dang /_ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin snying rjes sems can rnams kyi ngan 'gro'i rgyud sreg par byed pas na de skad ces bya'o/_/de lta bu las mi shes pa'i bdag nyid sel bar byed pas ni/_'od chen rnam par snang bar byed/_/ye

[\[250b.5\]]sogs pa la gsang zhing don gyi mchog phun sum tshogs par byed pa ni/_gsang sngags mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal/_/gsang sngags rgyal bo don chen byed/_/ces bya ba nyid do/_/gtsug tor chen po rmad 'byung gtsug_/ces pa ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin la sogs pa ste

[\[259a.1\]]ma dang bral ba gsal bar gyur pa dang sprul pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa 'byung ba'i rten du gyur pa dang /_dngos grub rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rten du gyur pa dang /_ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir na/_ye shes mig gcig dri ma med/_/ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs/_/zhes bya ba nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs
[\[259a.2\]]pa'i gsung rnam par dag pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes de yang 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nyid yin par bstan pa ni/_tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che/_/zhes bya ba gsungs te/_'jam dpal zhes bya ba brdas mtshon pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phul du byung ba'i bdag nyid don nges par rdzogs pa'i tshig gi tshogs
[\[259a.3\]]thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu gyur la shes rab de nyid ye shes yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o/_/de ltar rdo rje de nyid rab tu brjod pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa dang /_'khor gyi skye bo thams cad kyi nang na smra ba'i rgyal po ltar gyur pa dang /_tshig 'bru bzang po thams cad kyi 'byung ba'i gnas su gyur pa dang /_ri
[\[259a.4\]]dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge ltar phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'i phyir na/_smra ba'i khyu mchog smra ba'i rgyal/_/smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas/_/smra ba'i seng ge tshugs pa med/_/ces bya ba nyid do/_/ye shes chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku de ni khams gsum thams cad kyi lta bas chog mi shes pa dang gang
[\[259a.5\]]dang gang gis bltas pa de dag thams cad kyi sems kyi gdung ba sel ba'i phyir na/_kun du lta ba mchog tu dga'/_/zhes bya la sku de nyid las 'od zer sna tshogs pas stong gsum thams cad khyab pa'i phyir na/_gzi brjid phreng ba lta na sdug_/ces bya'o/_/de ltar yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku dang gsung bshad nas/_
[\[259a.6\]]yongs su rdzogs pa'i thugs bshad pa'i phyir/_'od bzang 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u/_/zhes gsungs te/_de la dpal be'u ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa bzhin pad+ma'i lcags kyu ltar snying po kha phyir bltas pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs de yang rnam par rtog pa dang bral zhing mi 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid du gnas pa las gdul
[\[259a.7\]]bya rnams mngon par 'dul ba'i tshul gyis rigs bzhi'i dag nyid du 'gro ba rnams snang bar gyur pa de la de skad ces bya ste/_lag na 'od 'bar snang ba po/_/zhes bya'o/_/de dag gi yon tan bshad pa ste/_lag nas lag tu ster ba dang 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid bzhin nor bu rin po che ltar dgos pa'i
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]don thams cad sgrub pa de la de skad ces bya'o/_/nad thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa rnam par rtog pa yin la de nyid rtog pa dang bral ba'i tshul bde ba chen pos sel bar mdzad pa'i gtso bor gyur pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni gzir ba'i phyir zug rngu yin la de rtsa ba nas 'byin pas na/_sman pa
[\[259b.2\]]che mchog gtso bo ste/_/zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med/_/ces bya ba nyid do/_/sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing /_/zhes pa ni mkhris pa dang bad kan dang 'dus pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams la sman ni chu dang ljon shing la sogs so so yin la/_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba chen pos kyang 'dod chags
[\[259b.3\]]dang zhe sdang dang gti mug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nad rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams zhi bar byed pa gang yin pa de la skad ces bya zhing /_de nyid rnam par rtog pas ma bskyed pa'i nad thams cad dgrar gyur pas/_nad do cog gi dgra che ba/_zhes bya'o/_/'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i
[\[259b.4\]]khams thams cad sngags pa chen po mchog tu gyur pas ni/_sdu gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog_/ces bya'o/_/khams gsum pa thams cad kyi sgrol ba'i gtso bor gyur pa dang /_de'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang lha mo'i tshogs dang stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pas 'gro ba rnams sgrol bar mdzad pa ni/_dpal
[\[259b.5\]]ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can/_/zhes bya la 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su nam mkha'i khams dang 'dra bar thugs rjes khyab pa ni/_phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug par/_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs/_/zhes bya ba nyid do/_/'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste/_/zhes
[\[259b.6\]]bya ba de la nyi ma gcig ni skad cig ma'i bye brag mi shes pa rnams la myur ba'i dpe bstan pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi skad cig ma gcig la nam mkha'i mthar thug thams cad bgrod par gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /_de nyid byams pa dang thugs rje'i bdag nyid kyis 'gro ba rnams la
[\[259b.7\]]snying po'i don ston pa ni/_byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can/_/zhes bya'o/_/dpal ldan pad+ma gar gyi bdag_/ces bya ba 'dis ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi bdag nyid so sor rtog pa'i ye shes nyid nges par gzung ba nyid do/_/de la le'u dang po las/_dpal ldan gsung gi bdag nyid can/_/dpal ldan gar gyi dbang
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]phyug dang /_/so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te/_/chags pa chen por rab tu bstan/_/zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs/_/zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa chen po ni 'gro ba mtha' dag gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa las skyob par mdzad do/_/de nyid grang ba'i
[\[260a.2\]]gdung ba dang tsha ba'i gdung ba ltar gnas pas na de las skyob pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /_de la sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje chen po 'byung ba'i chos kyi 'khor los bag chags kyi sa bon thams cad bsregs pa dang /_ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pas na/_sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid
[\[260a.3\]]che/_/zhes bya zhing dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed par byed pa'i rten du gyur pas na/_sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba/_/zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che/_/zhes pa ni de la rnal 'byor ni chos thams cad rang bzhin thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po ste de'i
[\[260a.4\]]rjes su 'jug pa de la de skad ces bya'o/_/de nyid dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos rigs gcig pa'i skye bo rnams la ston par gyur pa yin pas na/_sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig_/ces gsungs te de la le'u dang po las/_dus gsum bde
[\[260a.5\]]gshegs thams cad kyi/_/theg pa gcig tu gyur pa ste/_/gnyis dang gsum du dbyer med cing /_/'bras bu'i rten la rab tu 'bad/_/ces gsungs te bstan pa dang theg pa zhes bya ba gcig tu dgongs so/_/rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal/_/zhes pa ni ye shes chen po'i mtshan nyid gsal bar mdzad pa ni bdud kyi tshogs
[\[260a.6\]]mtha' dag 'joms pa dang 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa dang /_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir na de skad ces bya zhing /_de las sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun 'byung ba'i bdag por gyur pas na/_rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste/_/zhes bya'o/_/de ltar de bzhin
[\[260a.7\]]gshegs pa'i bdag nyid chen po ni sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi bdag nyid rtags kyi byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa ni/_'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag_/ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te/_de la 'jig rten dbang phyug ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yin la/_rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje/_/zhes pa ni 'phags
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]pa phyag na rdo rje yin la 'dir ston pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_rdo rje sems dpa' rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi ngo bo yin te de nyid bstan pa ni/_sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba/_/zhes gsungs te me long lta bu'i ye shes so/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas/_/zhes
[\[260b.2\]]pa ni ye shes kyi bdag nyid rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yin la/_sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba/_/zhes bya ba ni chos dbyings ye shes kyi bdag nyid yin zhing /_sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin/_/zhes pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid yin par gsungs te mnyam pa nyid dang /_/bya ba grub pa dang phrin
[\[260b.3\]]las kyi bdag nyid ni sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi yon tan dang phrin las yin pa'i phyir gud du mi bgrang ba nyid do/_/de lta bu'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi bdag nyid de dag rnam par dag pa'i gsang ba'i dbang la ltos par bstan pa ni/_rdo rje nyi ma bde ba che/_/zhes pa la sogs pa
[\[260b.4\]]gsungs te/_de la rdo rje nyi ma ni shes rab kyi bde ba spros pa dang bral ba 'byung ba rang byung gi me tog ces bya ste thabs kyi bsam pa las byung ba dang /_kha dog dmar ba'i phyir na nyi ma zhes bya zhing /_rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od/_/ces bya ba ni thabs kyi bde ba chen po rtog pa dang bral ba las byung ba byang chub kyi sems
[\[260b.5\]]zhes bya ste/_de nyid shes rab kyi bsam pa las byung zhing kha dog dkar po'i zla ba zhes bya ste/_de nyid rtog pa'i dri ma dang bral bas dri ma med pa'i 'od dang dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba nyid do/_/de nyid rdo rje slob dpon gyi dga' bral las byung zhing de'i gong na lhan cig skyes pa dang mchog tu dga' ba dang po rnams
[\[260b.6\]]yod pa'i phyir na/_chags bral la sogs chags pa che/_/zhes gsungs la de nyid skad cig ma sna tshogs pa dang /_rnam par nyed pa dang rnam par smin pa dang mtshan nyid dang bral ba las byung zhing skad cig ma rnams me 'bar ba bzhin du 'dod chags 'bar ba las byung ba'i 'od 'bar ba las byung bas na/_kha dog
[\[260b.7\]]sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/_/ces bya ba nyid do/_/de nyid sbyor ba chen po ji lta bu las byung zhe na/_rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/zhes byung ste ji ltar sprul pa'i sku shAkya thub pa rdo rje'i gdan la rdo rje'i skyil krung du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du rdo rje rtse lnga'i mtshan nyid rdo rje rgya gram gyi
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]tshul du thabs dang shes rab kyi yan lag phan tshun du bsnol ba las rtog pa dang bral ba'i bde ba chen po rtogs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /_de lta bu'i bde ba chen po nyid kyi mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' dag 'dzin par mdzad pa ni/_sangs rgyas 'gro
[\[261a.2\]]ba'i chos 'dzin pa/_/zhes gsungs te/_de nyid bdun pa'i don la dang po'i tshig go/_/dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes/_/zhes pa ni pad+ma ni rtag can te/_sku gsung thugs yongs su rdzogs par byed rgyu'i rgyu byang chub kyi sems de la gnas shing /_de nyid rtog pa chen po'i tshul gyis lnga pa dang bdun pa 'dom
[\[261a.3\]]pa'i tshig ste/_pad+ma las skyes shing pad+ma ru skyes zhes bya la/_de nyid kyi steng gi pad+ma dang /_'og gi pad+ma dang zhes grags so/_/kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa/_/zhes pa ni gsang ba'i dbang gi yon tan bshad pa ste/_de la mdzod ni rdzas kyi dngos po thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa yin la/_de ji lta ba
[\[261a.4\]]bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa nyid do/_/de nyid dngos gzhi ni/_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis ting 'dzin dra ba dpag tu med pa 'chang bas na/_rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang /_/zhes bya ba nyid do/_/che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags rgyal/_/zhes pa ni de ltar
[\[261a.5\]]gong du bstan pa'i gsang ba'i dbang ni/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rig pa'i rtsa ba chen por gyur pa/_nyan thos la sogs pa'i gtso bor gyur pas de skad ces bya la/_de lta bu'i gsang ba'i mtshan nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa dang /_srid pa'i dra ba thams
[\[261a.6\]]cad gcod pa dang /_mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po rnam par dag pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i lam gyi tshul gyis sdug bsngal rnams gcod par mdzad pas na/_rdo rje rnon po ral gri che/_/yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag_/theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod/_/ces bya ba nyid do/_/mtshon cha chen po rdo rje'i chos/_/zhes
[\[261a.7\]]bya ba ni gong du theg pa'i tshul nyid rtog pa dang bral ba'i bde ba chen po bsgom pa'i phyir dang /_sdug bsngal mtha' dag gcod pa'i phyir de skad ces bya zhing /_rtogs par dka' zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku 'dzin par 'dod pas na/_rdo rje zab mo dzi na dzika_/_ces bya'o/_/de lta bu'i bde ba chen
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]po ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyi sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i don mtha' dag phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa ni/_rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig_/ces bya la de nyid pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang /_gsang ba'i pad+ma chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan
[\[261b.2\]]nyid dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i sa rab tu dga' ba nas rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po go 'phang gi sa dang mthun par cha phra zhing lto ba yangs pa/_ston ka'i dus zla ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba ltar dri ma dang bral bar gnas pa ni gsang ba'i rdo rje mnyam par sbyar ba'i gnas skabs ni gong nas
[\[261b.3\]]gong du bde ba 'phel ba'i phyir na/_/pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa/_/sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan/_/zhes bya la/_de nyid dri ma dang bral zhing rnam par dag pa'i chus yang dang yang du 'khrud cing gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral bar byed pa ni/_rnam par dag
[\[261b.4\]]pa bdag med chos/_/zhes bya'o/_/yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang /_/zhes pa ni/_byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i bum pa'i nang na gnas pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar rnam par rtog pa'i 'ching ba gdung ba chen po rims dang 'dra ba sel bar mdzad pa gang
[\[261b.5\]]yin pa de la de skad ces bya la/_des myur ba nyid du ye shes chen po'i mtshan nyid thob par byed cing phyag rgya bzhi'i bdag nyid dang ldan pa ni gzhon nu ma'i pra phab pa dang 'dra bar gnas pa na/_de bya ba dang /_spyod pa dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_gnyi ga'i rgyud thams cad bdag nyid
[\[261b.6\]]blta ba dang /_lag pa bcangs pa dang /_'khyud pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshul du kun gyi rgyur gyur pa na/_rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog_/ces bya ba nyid do/_/rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus ldan/_/zhes bya ba ni dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par sangs
[\[261b.7\]]rgyas pa'i gnas gsang ba'i pad+ma yin te/_rnam par rtog pa'i bdud kyi dpung thams cad 'joms pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /_rgyud dang bral ba'i ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs pa ma lus pa 'chang bar gyur pas na/_ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang /_/zhes bya'o/_/_
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]ye shes kyi sku de rnams nyid nges par ston pa ni/_kun du bzang po blo gros bzang /_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_de la kun du bzang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kun du bzang po shes rab chen po'i ngo bo ni sangs rgyas kyi sku rnams kyi gtso
[\[262a.2\]]bo dang bzang po zhes bya ste de nyid chos kyi sku zhes bya'o/_/de ltar chos kyi sku las byung ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying por gyur cing /_rnam par dag pa'i 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i phyir na/_sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin/_/_
[\[262a.3\]]zhes bya ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku las byung ba'i sprul pa'i sku ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po yin te drag po la sogs pa'i gzugs ni rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che/_/zhes bya zhing /_sprul pa'i sku rnam pa sna tshogs de nyid srid
[\[262a.4\]]pa gsum po thams cad rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba rnams grol bar mdzad pas na/_sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang /_/zhes bya ba nyid do/_/de ltar so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la yang sku gsum gyi bdag nyid du bshad nas/_sku gsum bdag nyid ye shes chen po
[\[262a.5\]]de ni sku dang ye shes dang rta dang glang po che la sogs pa srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa dang /_dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin du 'byung ba'i phyir na/_dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog_/dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin
[\[262a.6\]]'dzin/_/zhes bya ba nyid do/_/de ltar chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i tshul las 'gro ba rnams kyi bsam pa'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyi mthu chen po dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ba ni/_skye med chos de sna tshogs don/_/zhes bya la de nyid zag pa
[\[262a.7\]]dang bcas pa'i chos dang zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid du ston pa ni/_chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba/_/zhes bya ba nyid do/_/shes rab chen po skad cig la/_/zhes bya zhing rgyu'i ye shes rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba bde ba chen po'i skad cig
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]ni shes pa thams cad kyi gtso bo'am dam par gyur pas na/_shes rab chen po zhes bya la yongs su dag pa'i skad cig ma de la kun rdzob kyi dngos po thams cad bde ba chen po'i dngos por rtogs pa ste dngos zhes bya ba nyid do/_/thub pa blo mchog 'byung po sel/_/zhes pa ni de la
[\[262b.2\]]de lta bu'i ye shes chen po des phyin ci log gi rtog pas bskyed pa'i bag chags ni sreg par byed pa'i phyir 'byung po yin la/_shes rab chen po'i mtshan nyid kyis sel bar byed pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya la/_phyi rol gyi rnam par rtog pa g.yeng ba la sogs pa bkod par
[\[262b.3\]]mi nus pa dang /_yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang ba ltar dri ma dang bral ba'i bdag nyid du gnas pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid du gnas shing rab tu dang ba'i mtshan nyid de des yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir na/_mi g.yo
[\[262b.4\]]rab tu dang ba'i bdag_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang /_/zhes pa nyid do/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa/_/zhes pa ni de nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi don dam pa mngon sum gyi shes pa 'dra bas rtogs par byed pa'i phyir na/_rab tu rtogs
[\[262b.5\]]pa mngon sum pa de la de skad ces bya la/_de nyid spros pa dang bral ba'i ye shes chen po ni rnam par rtog pa'i bud shing thams cad sreg par byed pa'i phyir na me yin la/_ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba dang nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel ba'i phyir na/_ye shes
[\[262b.6\]]me lce 'od 'bar ba/_/zhes bya ste de ltar so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni gsung nye bar 'dzin pa yin te/_yon tan las ni de'i yon tan dang las yin la/_de bas na mnyam pa nyid dang bya ba grub pa'i sngon du 'gro bas kun gyi dus su bshad pa yin la/_de nyid nges pa lnga'i
[\[262b.7\]]tshul du bshad pa ste bzhi pa'o/_/de ltar ye shes dang sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams bstan nas/_da ni de rnams yon tan du 'gyur ba mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid du bshad pa ni/_'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste/_/zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te de nyid nga rgyal chen po'i gang zag rnams
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]'dul ba'i don du nga rgyal chen po'i sku rin chen 'byung ldan ni/_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyis gdul bya'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i don thams cad grub par mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya zhing /_de nyid kyi nga rgyal nye bar mtshon nas 'dod chags la sogs pa
[\[263a.2\]]thams cad nyon mongs pa nga rgyal 'gro ba'i rgyu yin la/_de nyid yang dag par sbyong ba'i phyir na/_ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba/_/zhes bya'o/_/mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog_/ces pa ni de ltar nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yid yongs su dag pa las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni bdag gzhan gyi
[\[263a.3\]]rgyud mnyam ste/_de sems can thams cad dang mtshungs pa med pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi mgon du gyur pas na de skad ces bya zhing /_de nyid gdul bya'i skye bo rnams nges par grol bar mdzad pas na/_sems can thams cad grol bar byed/_/ces bya ba la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa rnams
